question.en: How many heads of the departments are older than 56 ?
question.pl: Ilu szefów działów ma więcej niż 56 lat?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM head WHERE age  >  56
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM head WHERE age  >  56

question.en: List the name, born state and age of the heads of departments ordered by age.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska, stan urodzenia i wiek szefów departamentów uporządkowanych według wieku.

query.en: SELECT name ,  born_state ,  age FROM head ORDER BY age
query.pl: SELECT name ,  born_state ,  age FROM head ORDER BY age

question.en: List the creation year, name and budget of each department.
question.pl: Wymień rok utworzenia, nazwę i budżet każdego działu.

query.en: SELECT creation ,  name ,  budget_in_billions FROM department
query.pl: SELECT creation ,  name ,  budget_in_billions FROM department

question.en: What are the maximum and minimum budget of the departments?
question.pl: Jaki jest maksymalny i minimalny budżet działów?

query.en: SELECT max(budget_in_billions) ,  min(budget_in_billions) FROM department
query.pl: SELECT max(budget_in_billions) ,  min(budget_in_billions) FROM department

question.en: What is the average number of employees of the departments whose rank is between 10 and 15?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia liczba pracowników działów o randze od 10 do 15?

query.en: SELECT avg(num_employees) FROM department WHERE ranking BETWEEN 10 AND 15
query.pl: SELECT avg(num_employees) FROM department WHERE ranking BETWEEN 10 AND 15

question.en: What are the names of the heads who are born outside the California state?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się głowy, które urodziły się poza stanem Kalifornia?

query.en: SELECT name FROM head WHERE born_state != 'California'
query.pl: SELECT name FROM head WHERE born_state != 'Kalifornia'

question.en: What are the distinct creation years of the departments managed by a secretary born in state 'Alabama'?
question.pl: Jakie są poszczególne lata utworzenia działów zarządzanych przez sekretarza urodzonego w stanie "Alabama"?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.creation FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T3.born_state  =  'Alabama'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.creation FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T3.born_state  =  'Alabama'

question.en: What are the names of the states where at least 3 heads were born?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się stany, w których urodziły się co najmniej 3 głowy?

query.en: SELECT born_state FROM head GROUP BY born_state HAVING count(*)  >=  3
query.pl: SELECT born_state FROM head GROUP BY born_state HAVING count(*)  >=  3

question.en: In which year were most departments established?
question.pl: W którym roku utworzono większość działów?

query.en: SELECT creation FROM department GROUP BY creation ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT creation FROM department GROUP BY creation ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the name and number of employees for the departments managed by heads whose temporary acting value is 'Yes'?
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę i liczbę pracowników w działach zarządzanych przez kierowników, których wartość tymczasowego działania wynosi "Tak"?

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.num_employees FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id WHERE T2.temporary_acting  =  'Yes'
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.num_employees FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id WHERE T2.temporary_acting  =  'Tak'

question.en: How many acting statuses are there?
question.pl: Ile jest statusów aktorskich?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT temporary_acting) FROM management
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT temporary_acting) FROM management

question.en: How many departments are led by heads who are not mentioned?
question.pl: Ile działów jest kierowanych przez szefów, którzy nie są wymienieni?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM department WHERE department_id NOT IN (SELECT department_id FROM management);
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM department WHERE department_id NOT IN (SELECT department_id FROM management);

question.en: What are the distinct ages of the heads who are acting?
question.pl: W jakim wieku są działające osoby?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.age FROM management AS T2 JOIN head AS T1 ON T1.head_id  =  T2.head_id WHERE T2.temporary_acting  =  'Yes'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.age FROM management AS T2 JOIN head AS T1 ON T1.head_id  =  T2.head_id WHERE T2.temporary_acting  =  'Tak'

question.en: List the states where both the secretary of 'Treasury' department and the secretary of 'Homeland Security' were born.
question.pl: Wymień stany, w których urodzili się zarówno sekretarz Departamentu Skarbu, jak i sekretarz Departamentu Bezpieczeństwa Wewnętrznego.

query.en: SELECT T3.born_state FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T1.name  =  'Treasury' INTERSECT SELECT T3.born_state FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T1.name  =  'Homeland Security'
query.pl: SELECT T3.born_state FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T1.name  =  'Skarb Państwa' INTERSECT SELECT T3.born_state FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T1.name  =  'Bezpieczeństwo wewnętrzne'

question.en: Which department has more than 1 head at a time? List the id, name and the number of heads.
question.pl: Który dział ma więcej niż 1 kierownika jednocześnie? Wymień identyfikator, nazwę i liczbę kierowników.

query.en: SELECT T1.department_id ,  T1.name ,  count(*) FROM management AS T2 JOIN department AS T1 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id GROUP BY T1.department_id HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.department_id ,  T1.name ,  count(*) FROM management AS T2 JOIN department AS T1 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id GROUP BY T1.department_id HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: Which head's name has the substring 'Ha'? List the id and name.
question.pl: Która nazwa głowy ma podciąg "Ha"? Wymień identyfikator i nazwę.

query.en: SELECT head_id ,  name FROM head WHERE name LIKE '%Ha%'
query.pl: SELECT head_id ,  name FROM head WHERE name LIKE '%Ha%'

question.en: What are the ids of all students for courses and what are the names of those courses?

query.en: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.course_name FROM student_course_registrations AS T1 JOIN courses AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.course_name FROM student_course_registrations AS T1 JOIN courses AS T2 ON T1.course_id = T2.course_id

question.en: What is detail of the student who most recently registered course?
question.pl: Jakie są dane studenta, który ostatnio zarejestrował kurs?

query.en: SELECT T2.student_details FROM student_course_registrations AS T1 JOIN students AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id ORDER BY T1.registration_date DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T3.course_name ,  count(*) FROM students AS T1 JOIN student_course_registrations AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id JOIN courses AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id GROUP BY T2.course_id
query.pl: SELECT T3.course_name ,  count(*) FROM students AS T1 JOIN student_course_registrations AS T2 ON T1.student_id = T2.student_id JOIN courses AS T3 ON T2.course_id = T3.course_id GROUP BY T2.course_id

question.en: Return the unique name for stations that have ever had 7 bikes available.
question.pl: Zwróć unikatową nazwę dla stacji, na których kiedykolwiek dostępnych było 7 rowerów.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id WHERE T2.bikes_available  =  7

question.en: Which start station had the most trips starting from August? Give me the name and id of the station.

question.en: What is the latitude, longitude, city of the station from which the shortest trip started?

question.en: What are the ids of stations that are located in San Francisco and have average bike availability above 10.
question.pl: Jakie są numery stacji w San Francisco, które mają średnią dostępność rowerów powyżej 10.

query.en: SELECT id FROM station WHERE city  =  "San Francisco" INTERSECT SELECT station_id FROM status GROUP BY station_id HAVING avg(bikes_available)  >  10

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.id FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id GROUP BY T2.station_id HAVING avg(T2.bikes_available)  >  14 UNION SELECT name ,  id FROM station WHERE installation_date LIKE "12/%"
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.id FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id GROUP BY T2.station_id HAVING avg(T2.bikes_available)  >  14 UNION SELECT name ,  id FROM station WHERE installation_date LIKE "12/%"

question.en: List the name and the number of stations for all the cities that have at least 15 stations.
question.pl: Wymień nazwy i liczbę stacji dla wszystkich miast, które mają co najmniej 15 stacji.

query.en: SELECT city ,  COUNT(*) FROM station GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  15
query.pl: SELECT city ,  COUNT(*) FROM station GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  15

question.en: What is the name of every city that has at least 15 stations and how many stations does it have?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się każde miasto, które ma co najmniej 15 stacji i ile stacji ma to miasto?

query.en: SELECT city ,  COUNT(*) FROM station GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  15
query.pl: SELECT city ,  COUNT(*) FROM station GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  15

question.en: Find the ids and names of stations from which at least 200 trips started.
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikatory i nazwy stacji, z których rozpoczęto co najmniej 200 przejazdów.

query.en: SELECT start_station_id ,  start_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY start_station_name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  200
query.pl: SELECT start_station_id ,  start_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY start_station_name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  200

question.en: What are the ids and names of all start stations that were the beginning of at least 200 trips?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory i nazwy wszystkich stacji początkowych, które były początkiem co najmniej 200 podróży?

query.en: SELECT start_station_id ,  start_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY start_station_name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  200
query.pl: SELECT start_station_id ,  start_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY start_station_name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  200

question.en: Find the zip code in which the average mean visibility is lower than 10.
question.pl: Znajdź kod pocztowy, w którym średnia średnia widoczność jest niższa niż 10.

query.en: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_visibility_miles)  <  10
query.pl: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_visibility_miles)  <  10

question.en: For each zip code, select all those that have an average mean visiblity below 10.
question.pl: Dla każdego kodu pocztowego wybierz wszystkie te, które mają średnią widoczność poniżej 10.

query.en: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_visibility_miles)  <  10
query.pl: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_visibility_miles)  <  10

question.en: List all the cities in a decreasing order of each city's stations' highest latitude.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie miasta w kolejności malejącej według największej szerokości geograficznej stacji każdego z nich.

query.en: SELECT city FROM station GROUP BY city ORDER BY max(lat) DESC
query.pl: SELECT city FROM station GROUP BY city ORDER BY max(lat) DESC

question.en: For each city, list their names in decreasing order by their highest station latitude.
question.pl: Dla każdego miasta wymień ich nazwy w porządku malejącym według największej szerokości geograficznej.

query.en: SELECT city FROM station GROUP BY city ORDER BY max(lat) DESC
query.pl: SELECT city FROM station GROUP BY city ORDER BY max(lat) DESC

question.en: What are the dates that had the top 5 cloud cover rates? Also tell me the cloud cover rate.
question.pl: Jakie są daty, w których odnotowano 5 najwyższych wskaźników zachmurzenia? Podaj również wskaźnik zachmurzenia.

query.en: SELECT date ,  cloud_cover FROM weather ORDER BY cloud_cover DESC LIMIT 5
query.pl: SELECT date ,  cloud_cover FROM weather ORDER BY cloud_cover DESC LIMIT 5

question.en: What are the dates that have the 5 highest cloud cover rates and what are the rates?
question.pl: Jakie są daty, w których występuje 5 najwyższych wskaźników zachmurzenia i jakie są te wskaźniki?

query.en: SELECT date ,  cloud_cover FROM weather ORDER BY cloud_cover DESC LIMIT 5
query.pl: SELECT date ,  cloud_cover FROM weather ORDER BY cloud_cover DESC LIMIT 5

question.en: What are the ids and durations of the trips with the top 3 durations?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory i czasy trwania podróży z 3 najlepszymi czasami trwania?

query.en: SELECT id ,  duration FROM trip ORDER BY duration DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT id ,  duration FROM trip ORDER BY duration DESC LIMIT 3

question.en: What are the ids of the trips that lasted the longest and how long did they last?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory podróży, które trwały najdłużej i jak długo trwały?

query.en: SELECT id ,  duration FROM trip ORDER BY duration DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT id ,  duration FROM trip ORDER BY duration DESC LIMIT 3

question.en: For each station, return its longitude and the average duration of trips that started from the station.
question.pl: Dla każdej stacji zwróć jej długość geograficzną i średni czas trwania podróży rozpoczętych z tej stacji.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.long ,  avg(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id GROUP BY T2.start_station_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.long ,  avg(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id GROUP BY T2.start_station_id

question.en: For each start station id, what is its name, longitude and average duration of trips started there?
question.pl: Dla każdego identyfikatora stacji początkowej, jaka jest jej nazwa, długość geograficzna i średni czas trwania rozpoczętych tam podróży?

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.long ,  avg(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id GROUP BY T2.start_station_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.long ,  avg(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id GROUP BY T2.start_station_id

question.en: For each station, find its latitude and the minimum duration of trips that ended at the station.
question.pl: Dla każdej stacji znajdź jej szerokość geograficzną i minimalny czas trwania podróży, które zakończyły się na tej stacji.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.lat ,  min(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.end_station_id GROUP BY T2.end_station_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.lat ,  min(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.end_station_id GROUP BY T2.end_station_id

question.en: For each end station id, what is its name, latitude, and minimum duration for trips ended there?
question.pl: Dla każdego identyfikatora stacji końcowej, jaka jest jej nazwa, szerokość geograficzna i minimalny czas trwania zakończonych tam podróży?

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.lat ,  min(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.end_station_id GROUP BY T2.end_station_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.lat ,  min(T2.duration) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.end_station_id GROUP BY T2.end_station_id

question.en: List all the distinct stations from which a trip of duration below 100 started.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie różne stacje, z których rozpoczęła się podróż o czasie trwania poniżej 100.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT start_station_name FROM trip WHERE duration  <  100
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT start_station_name FROM trip WHERE duration  <  100

question.en: What are all the different start station names for a trip that lasted less than 100?
question.pl: Jakie są różne nazwy stacji początkowych dla podróży, która trwała mniej niż 100?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT start_station_name FROM trip WHERE duration  <  100
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT start_station_name FROM trip WHERE duration  <  100

question.en: Find all the zip codes in which the max dew point have never reached 70.
question.pl: Znajdź wszystkie kody pocztowe, w których maksymalny punkt rosy nigdy nie osiągnął 70.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather WHERE max_dew_point_f  >=  70
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather WHERE max_dew_point_f  >=  70

question.en: What are all the different zip codes that have a maximum dew point that was always below 70?
question.pl: Jakie są różne kody pocztowe, które mają maksymalny punkt rosy zawsze poniżej 70?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather WHERE max_dew_point_f  >=  70
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT zip_code FROM weather WHERE max_dew_point_f  >=  70

question.en: Find the id for the trips that lasted at least as long as the average duration of trips in zip code 94103.
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikator podróży, które trwały co najmniej tak długo, jak średni czas trwania podróży w kodzie pocztowym 94103.

query.en: SELECT id FROM trip WHERE duration  >=  (SELECT avg(duration) FROM trip WHERE zip_code  =  94103)
query.pl: SELECT id FROM trip WHERE duration  >=  (SELECT avg(duration) FROM trip WHERE zip_code  =  94103)

question.en: What are the ids of all trips that had a duration as long as the average trip duration in the zip code 94103?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory wszystkich podróży, których czas trwania był tak długi, jak średni czas trwania podróży w kodzie pocztowym 94103?

query.en: SELECT id FROM trip WHERE duration  >=  (SELECT avg(duration) FROM trip WHERE zip_code  =  94103)
query.pl: SELECT id FROM trip WHERE duration  >=  (SELECT avg(duration) FROM trip WHERE zip_code  =  94103)

question.en: What are the dates in which the mean sea level pressure was between 30.3 and 31?
question.pl: Jakie są daty, w których średnie ciśnienie na poziomie morza wynosiło od 30,3 do 31?

query.en: SELECT date FROM weather WHERE mean_sea_level_pressure_inches BETWEEN 30.3 AND 31
query.pl: SELECT date FROM weather WHERE mean_sea_level_pressure_inches BETWEEN 30.3 AND 31

question.en: What are the dates that have an average sea level pressure between 30.3 and 31?
question.pl: Jakie są daty, w których średnie ciśnienie na poziomie morza wynosi od 30,3 do 31?

query.en: SELECT date FROM weather WHERE mean_sea_level_pressure_inches BETWEEN 30.3 AND 31
query.pl: SELECT date FROM weather WHERE mean_sea_level_pressure_inches BETWEEN 30.3 AND 31

question.en: Find the day in which the difference between the max temperature and min temperature was the smallest. Also report the difference.
question.pl: Znajdź dzień, w którym różnica między temperaturą maksymalną i minimalną była najmniejsza. Podaj również tę różnicę.

query.en: SELECT date ,  max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f FROM weather ORDER BY max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT date ,  max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f FROM weather ORDER BY max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the days that had the smallest temperature range, and what was that range?
question.pl: Które dni charakteryzowały się najmniejszym zakresem temperatur i jaki był ten zakres?

query.en: SELECT date ,  max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f FROM weather ORDER BY max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT date ,  max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f FROM weather ORDER BY max_temperature_f - min_temperature_f LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the id and name of the stations that have ever had more than 12 bikes available?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i nazwa stacji, na których kiedykolwiek dostępnych było więcej niż 12 rowerów?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id WHERE T2.bikes_available  >  12
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id WHERE T2.bikes_available  >  12

question.en: What are the different ids and names of the stations that have had more than 12 bikes available?
question.pl: Jakie są różne identyfikatory i nazwy stacji, na których dostępnych jest więcej niż 12 rowerów?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id WHERE T2.bikes_available  >  12
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id WHERE T2.bikes_available  >  12

question.en: Give me the zip code where the average mean humidity is below 70 and at least 100 trips took place.
question.pl: Podaj mi kod pocztowy, w którym średnia wilgotność wynosi poniżej 70 i odbyło się co najmniej 100 podróży.

query.en: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_humidity)  <  70 INTERSECT SELECT zip_code FROM trip GROUP BY zip_code HAVING count(*)  >=  100
query.pl: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_humidity)  <  70 INTERSECT SELECT zip_code FROM trip GROUP BY zip_code HAVING count(*)  >=  100

question.en: What are the zip codes that have an average mean humidity below 70 and had at least 100 trips come through there?
question.pl: Jakie są kody pocztowe, które mają średnią wilgotność poniżej 70 i przez które przeszło co najmniej 100 podróży?

query.en: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_humidity)  <  70 INTERSECT SELECT zip_code FROM trip GROUP BY zip_code HAVING count(*)  >=  100
query.pl: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code HAVING avg(mean_humidity)  <  70 INTERSECT SELECT zip_code FROM trip GROUP BY zip_code HAVING count(*)  >=  100

question.en: What are the names of stations that are located in Palo Alto city but have never been the ending point of trips more than 100 times?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się stacje, które znajdują się w mieście Palo Alto, ale nigdy nie były punktem końcowym podróży więcej niż 100 razy?

query.en: SELECT name FROM station WHERE city  =  "Palo Alto" EXCEPT SELECT end_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY end_station_name HAVING count(*)  >  100
query.pl: SELECT name FROM station WHERE city  =  "Palo Alto" EXCEPT SELECT end_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY end_station_name HAVING count(*)  >  100

question.en: What are the names of the stations that are located in Palo Alto but have never been the ending point of the trips
question.pl: Jak nazywają się stacje, które znajdują się w Palo Alto, ale nigdy nie były punktem końcowym podróży?

query.en: SELECT name FROM station WHERE city  =  "Palo Alto" EXCEPT SELECT end_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY end_station_name HAVING count(*)  >  100
query.pl: SELECT name FROM station WHERE city  =  "Palo Alto" EXCEPT SELECT end_station_name FROM trip GROUP BY end_station_name HAVING count(*)  >  100

question.en: How many trips started from Mountain View city and ended at Palo Alto city?
question.pl: Ile podróży rozpoczęło się w mieście Mountain View i zakończyło w mieście Palo Alto?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 JOIN station AS T3 JOIN trip AS T4 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id AND T2.id  =  T4.id AND T3.id  =  T4.end_station_id WHERE T1.city  =  "Mountain View" AND T3.city  =  "Palo Alto"
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 JOIN station AS T3 JOIN trip AS T4 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id AND T2.id  =  T4.id AND T3.id  =  T4.end_station_id WHERE T1.city  =  "Widok z góry" AND T3.city  =  "Palo Alto"

question.en: How many trips stated from  a station in Mountain View and ended at one in Palo Alto?
question.pl: Ile podróży rozpoczęło się na stacji w Mountain View i zakończyło na stacji w Palo Alto?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 JOIN station AS T3 JOIN trip AS T4 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id AND T2.id  =  T4.id AND T3.id  =  T4.end_station_id WHERE T1.city  =  "Mountain View" AND T3.city  =  "Palo Alto"
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 JOIN station AS T3 JOIN trip AS T4 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id AND T2.id  =  T4.id AND T3.id  =  T4.end_station_id WHERE T1.city  =  "Widok z góry" AND T3.city  =  "Palo Alto"

question.en: What is the average latitude and longitude of the starting points of all trips?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia szerokość i długość geograficzna punktów początkowych wszystkich podróży?

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.lat) ,  avg(T1.long) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id
query.pl: SELECT avg(T1.lat) ,  avg(T1.long) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id

question.en: What is the average latitude and longitude of all starting stations for the trips?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia szerokość i długość geograficzna wszystkich stacji początkowych dla podróży?

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.lat) ,  avg(T1.long) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id
query.pl: SELECT avg(T1.lat) ,  avg(T1.long) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id

question.en: What are the titles of the books whose writer is not "Elaine Lee"?

query.en: SELECT Title FROM book WHERE Writer != "Elaine Lee"
query.pl: SELECT Title FROM book WHERE Writer != "Elaine Lee"

question.en: What are the dates of publications in descending order of price?

query.en: SELECT Publication_Date FROM publication ORDER BY Price DESC
query.pl: SELECT Publication_Date FROM publication ORDER BY Price DESC

question.en: What are the distinct publishers of publications with price higher than 5000000?
question.pl: Jacy są wydawcy publikacji o cenie wyższej niż 5000000?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT Publisher FROM publication WHERE Price  >  5000000
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT Publisher FROM publication WHERE Price  >  5000000

question.en: List the publisher of the publication with the highest price.
question.pl: Wymień wydawcę publikacji z najwyższą ceną.

query.en: SELECT Publisher FROM publication ORDER BY Price DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Publisher FROM publication ORDER BY Price DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: List the publication dates of publications with 3 lowest prices.

query.en: SELECT Publication_Date FROM publication ORDER BY Price ASC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT Publication_Date FROM publication ORDER BY Price ASC LIMIT 3

question.en: Show the title and publication dates of books.
question.pl: Pokaż tytuły i daty publikacji książek.

query.en: SELECT T1.Title ,  T2.Publication_Date FROM book AS T1 JOIN publication AS T2 ON T1.Book_ID  =  T2.Book_ID
query.pl: SELECT T1.Title ,  T2.Publication_Date FROM book AS T1 JOIN publication AS T2 ON T1.Book_ID  =  T2.Book_ID

question.en: Show writers who have published a book with price more than 4000000.

query.en: SELECT T1.Writer FROM book AS T1 JOIN publication AS T2 ON T1.Book_ID  =  T2.Book_ID WHERE T2.Price  >  4000000
query.pl: SELECT T1.Writer FROM book AS T1 JOIN publication AS T2 ON T1.Book_ID  =  T2.Book_ID WHERE T2.Price  >  4000000

question.en: Show the titles of books in descending order of publication price.
question.pl: Pokaż tytuły książek w kolejności malejącej według ceny publikacji.

query.pl: SELECT T1.Title FROM book AS T1 JOIN publication AS T2 ON T1.Book_ID  =  T2.Book_ID ORDER BY T2.Price DESC

question.en: Show publishers that have more than one publication.

query.en: SELECT Publisher FROM publication GROUP BY Publisher HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT Publisher FROM publication GROUP BY Publisher HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

question.en: Return the characters and durations for each actor.
question.pl: Zwróć znaki i czas trwania dla każdego aktora.

question.en: What are the names of musicals with nominee "Bob Fosse"?

question.en: What are the distinct nominees of the musicals with the award that is not "Tony Award"?

query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT Nominee FROM musical WHERE Award != "Nagroda Tony"

question.en: Show names of actors and names of musicals they are in.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska aktorów i nazwy musicali, w których występują.

query.en: SELECT T1.Name ,  T2.Name FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID
query.pl: SELECT T1.Name ,  T2.Name FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID

query.pl: SELECT T1.Name ,  T2.Name FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID

question.en: Show names of actors that have appeared in musical with name "The Phantom of the Opera".
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska aktorów, którzy wystąpili w musicalu "Upiór w operze".

question.en: Show names of actors in descending order of the year their musical is awarded.

question.en: Show names of musicals and the number of actors who have appeared in the musicals.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID GROUP BY T1.Musical_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID GROUP BY T1.Musical_ID

query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID GROUP BY T1.Musical_ID

question.en: Show names of musicals which have at least three actors.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID GROUP BY T1.Musical_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  3
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID GROUP BY T1.Musical_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  3

query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM actor AS T1 JOIN musical AS T2 ON T1.Musical_ID  =  T2.Musical_ID GROUP BY T1.Musical_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  3

question.en: Find the name and email of the users who have more than 1000 followers.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę i adres e-mail użytkowników, którzy mają ponad 1000 obserwujących.

query.en: SELECT name ,  email FROM user_profiles WHERE followers  >  1000
query.pl: SELECT name ,  email FROM user_profiles WHERE followers  >  1000

question.en: Find the names of the users whose number of followers is greater than that of the user named "Tyler Swift".
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy użytkowników, których liczba obserwujących jest większa niż liczba obserwujących użytkownika o nazwie "Tyler Swift".

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 GROUP BY T2.f1 HAVING count(*)  >  (SELECT count(*) FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 WHERE T1.name  =  'Tyler Swift')
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 GROUP BY T2.f1 HAVING count(*)  >  (SELECT count(*) FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 WHERE T1.name  =  'Tyler Swift')

query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.email FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 GROUP BY T2.f1 HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: Find the id of users who are followed by Mary and Susan.

query.en: SELECT T2.f1 FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f2 WHERE T1.name  =  "Mary" INTERSECT SELECT T2.f1 FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f2 WHERE T1.name  =  "Susan"
query.pl: SELECT T2.f1 FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f2 WHERE T1.name  =  "Mary" INTERSECT SELECT T2.f1 FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f2 WHERE T1.name  =  "Susan"

question.en: What are the entry names of catalog with the attribute possessed by most entries.

query.en: SELECT t1.catalog_entry_name FROM Catalog_Contents AS t1 JOIN Catalog_Contents_Additional_Attributes AS t2 ON t1.catalog_entry_id  =  t2.catalog_entry_id WHERE t2.attribute_value  =  (SELECT attribute_value FROM Catalog_Contents_Additional_Attributes GROUP BY attribute_value ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

question.en: Find the last name and age of the student who has allergy to both milk and cat.

query.en: SELECT lname ,  age FROM Student WHERE StuID IN (SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Milk" INTERSECT SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Cat")

question.en: What are the allergies and their types that the student with first name Lisa has? And order the result by name of allergies.
question.pl: Jakie alergie i ich rodzaje ma uczeń o imieniu Lisa? Uporządkuj wyniki według nazw alergii.

query.en: SELECT T1.Allergy ,  T1.AllergyType FROM Allergy_type AS T1 JOIN Has_allergy AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy JOIN Student AS T3 ON T3.StuID  =  T2.StuID WHERE T3.Fname  =  "Lisa" ORDER BY T1.Allergy
query.pl: SELECT T1.Allergy ,  T1.AllergyType FROM Allergy_type AS T1 JOIN Has_allergy AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy JOIN Student AS T3 ON T3.StuID  =  T2.StuID WHERE T3.Fname  =  "Lisa" ORDER BY T1.Allergy

query.en: SELECT T1.Allergy ,  T1.AllergyType FROM Allergy_type AS T1 JOIN Has_allergy AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy JOIN Student AS T3 ON T3.StuID  =  T2.StuID WHERE T3.Fname  =  "Lisa" ORDER BY T1.Allergy

query.en: SELECT fname ,  sex FROM Student WHERE StuID IN (SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Milk" EXCEPT SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Cat")
query.pl: SELECT fname ,  sex FROM Student WHERE StuID IN (SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Mleko" EXCEPT SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Kot")

question.en: What are the first name and gender of the students who have allergy to milk but can put up with cats?
question.pl: Jakie są imiona i płeć uczniów, którzy mają alergię na mleko, ale mogą znosić koty?

query.en: SELECT fname ,  sex FROM Student WHERE StuID IN (SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Milk" EXCEPT SELECT StuID FROM Has_allergy WHERE Allergy  =  "Cat")

question.en: Find the average age of the students who have allergies with food and animal types.
question.pl: Znajdź średni wiek uczniów, którzy mają alergie na pokarmy i zwierzęta.

query.en: SELECT avg(age) FROM Student WHERE StuID IN ( SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "food" INTERSECT SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "animal")
query.pl: SELECT avg(age) FROM Student WHERE StuID IN ( SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "jedzenie" INTERSECT SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "zwierzę")

question.en: How old are the students with allergies to food and animal types on average?
question.pl: Ile średnio lat mają uczniowie z alergiami na pokarmy i zwierzęta?

query.en: SELECT avg(age) FROM Student WHERE StuID IN ( SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "food" INTERSECT SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "animal")
query.pl: SELECT avg(age) FROM Student WHERE StuID IN ( SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "jedzenie" INTERSECT SELECT T1.StuID FROM Has_allergy AS T1 JOIN Allergy_Type AS T2 ON T1.Allergy  =  T2.Allergy WHERE T2.allergytype  =  "zwierzę")

question.pl: Wymień imię i nazwisko uczniów, którzy nie mają alergii pokarmowej.

question.en: Find the different first names and cities of the students who have allergy to milk or cat.
question.pl: Znajdź różne imiona i miasta uczniów, którzy mają alergię na mleko lub kota.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.fname ,  T1.city_code FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Has_Allergy AS T2 ON T1.stuid  =  T2.stuid WHERE T2.Allergy  =  "Milk" OR T2.Allergy  =  "Cat"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.fname ,  T1.city_code FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Has_Allergy AS T2 ON T1.stuid  =  T2.stuid WHERE T2.Allergy  =  "Mleko" OR T2.Allergy  =  "Kot"

question.en: A list of the top 5 countries by number of invoices. List country name and number of invoices.
question.pl: Zwróć listę 5 najlepszych krajów pod względem liczby faktur. Wymień nazwę kraju i liczbę faktur.

query.en: SELECT billing_country ,  COUNT(*) FROM invoices GROUP BY billing_country ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;
query.pl: SELECT billing_country ,  COUNT(*) FROM invoices GROUP BY billing_country ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 5;

question.en: Find out 5 customers who most recently purchased something. List customers' first and last name.
question.pl: Znajdź 5 klientów, którzy ostatnio dokonali zakupu. Wymień imiona i nazwiska klientów.

query.en: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN invoices AS T2 ON T2.customer_id  =  T1.id ORDER BY T2.invoice_date DESC LIMIT 5;
query.pl: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN invoices AS T2 ON T2.customer_id  =  T1.id ORDER BY T2.invoice_date DESC LIMIT 5;

query.en: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM customers AS T1 JOIN invoices AS T2 ON T2.customer_id  =  T1.id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10;

question.pl: Wskaż najpopularniejszy wiek edytorów.

query.en: SELECT Age FROM editor GROUP BY Age ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Age FROM editor GROUP BY Age ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the distinct themes of journals.
question.pl: Pokaż różne tematy czasopism.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT Theme FROM journal
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT Theme FROM journal

question.en: Show the names of editors and the theme of journals for which they serve on committees.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska redaktorów i tematy czasopism, w których zasiadają w komitetach.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Theme FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Theme FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID

question.en: For each journal_committee, find the editor name and the journal theme.
question.pl: Dla każdego journal_committee znajdź nazwę redaktora i temat czasopisma.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Theme FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Theme FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID

question.en: Show the names and ages of editors and the theme of journals for which they serve on committees, in ascending alphabetical order of theme.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T2.age ,  T3.Theme FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID ORDER BY T3.Theme ASC
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T2.age ,  T3.Theme FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID ORDER BY T3.Theme ASC

question.en: Show the names of editors that are on the committee of journals with sales bigger than 3000.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska redaktorów, którzy są w komitecie czasopism o sprzedaży większej niż 3000.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID WHERE T3.Sales  >  3000
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM journal_committee AS T1 JOIN editor AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID JOIN journal AS T3 ON T1.Journal_ID  =  T3.Journal_ID WHERE T3.Sales  >  3000

question.en: Show the id, name of each editor and the number of journal committees they are on.
question.pl: Pokaż identyfikator, imię i nazwisko każdego redaktora oraz liczbę komitetów czasopism, w których zasiada.

query.en: SELECT T1.editor_id ,  T1.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM editor AS T1 JOIN journal_committee AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID GROUP BY T1.editor_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.editor_id ,  T1.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM editor AS T1 JOIN journal_committee AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID GROUP BY T1.editor_id

question.en: Show the names of editors that are on at least two journal committees.

query.en: SELECT T1.Name FROM editor AS T1 JOIN journal_committee AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID GROUP BY T1.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.Name FROM editor AS T1 JOIN journal_committee AS T2 ON T1.Editor_ID  =  T2.Editor_ID GROUP BY T1.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: List the names of editors that are not on any journal committee.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska redaktorów, którzy nie są członkami żadnego komitetu czasopisma.

query.en: SELECT Name FROM editor WHERE editor_id NOT IN (SELECT editor_id FROM journal_committee)
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM editor WHERE editor_id NOT IN (SELECT editor_id FROM journal_committee)

question.en: List the date, theme and sales of the journal which did not have any of the listed editors serving on committee.

query.en: SELECT date ,  theme ,  sales FROM journal EXCEPT SELECT T1.date ,  T1.theme ,  T1.sales FROM journal AS T1 JOIN journal_committee AS T2 ON T1.journal_ID  =  T2.journal_ID
query.pl: SELECT date ,  theme ,  sales FROM journal EXCEPT SELECT T1.date ,  T1.theme ,  T1.sales FROM journal AS T1 JOIN journal_committee AS T2 ON T1.journal_ID  =  T2.journal_ID

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.sales) FROM journal AS T1 JOIN journal_committee AS T2 ON T1.journal_ID  =  T2.journal_ID WHERE T2.work_type  =  'Photo'

query.en: SELECT Name FROM ARTIST EXCEPT SELECT T2.Name FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN ARTIST AS T2 ON T1.ArtistId  =  T2.ArtistId
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM ARTIST EXCEPT SELECT T2.Name FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN ARTIST AS T2 ON T1.ArtistId  =  T2.ArtistId

question.en: What are the names of artists who have not released any albums?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwiska artystów, którzy nie wydali żadnego albumu?

query.en: SELECT Name FROM ARTIST EXCEPT SELECT T2.Name FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN ARTIST AS T2 ON T1.ArtistId  =  T2.ArtistId
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM ARTIST EXCEPT SELECT T2.Name FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN ARTIST AS T2 ON T1.ArtistId  =  T2.ArtistId

question.en: What is the average unit price of rock tracks?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia cena jednostkowa gąsienic skalnych?

query.en: SELECT AVG(T2.UnitPrice) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  "Rock"
query.pl: SELECT AVG(T2.UnitPrice) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  "Skała"

question.en: Find the average unit price of tracks from the Rock genre.
question.pl: Znajdź średnią cenę jednostkową utworów z gatunku Rock.

query.en: SELECT AVG(T2.UnitPrice) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  "Rock"
query.pl: SELECT AVG(T2.UnitPrice) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  "Skała"

question.en: What are the duration of the longest and shortest pop tracks in milliseconds?
question.pl: Jaki jest czas trwania najdłuższego i najkrótszego utworu pop w milisekundach?

query.en: SELECT max(Milliseconds) ,  min(Milliseconds) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  "Pop"
query.pl: SELECT max(Milliseconds) ,  min(Milliseconds) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  "Pop"

question.en: Find the maximum and minimum millisecond lengths of pop tracks.

query.en: SELECT max(Milliseconds) ,  min(Milliseconds) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  "Pop"

question.en: What are the album titles for albums containing both 'Reggae' and 'Rock' genre tracks?
question.pl: Jakie są tytuły albumów zawierających zarówno utwory z gatunku "Reggae", jak i "Rock"?

query.en: SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Reggae' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Rock'
query.pl: SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Reggae' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Skała'

question.en: Find the titles of albums that contain tracks of both the Reggae and Rock genres.
question.pl: Znajdź tytuły albumów zawierających utwory z gatunków reggae i rock.

query.en: SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Reggae' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Rock'
query.pl: SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Reggae' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Skała'

question.en: Which policy type has the most records in the database?
question.pl: Który typ polisy ma najwięcej rekordów w bazie danych?

query.en: SELECT policy_type_code FROM available_policies GROUP BY policy_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT policy_type_code FROM available_policies GROUP BY policy_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which policy type appears most frequently in the available policies?
question.pl: Który typ polisy pojawia się najczęściej w dostępnych polisach?

query.en: SELECT policy_type_code FROM available_policies GROUP BY policy_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT policy_type_code FROM available_policies GROUP BY policy_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are all the customer phone numbers under the most popular policy type?
question.pl: Jakie są wszystkie numery telefonów klientów w ramach najpopularniejszego typu polisy?

query.en: SELECT customer_phone FROM available_policies WHERE policy_type_code  =  (SELECT policy_type_code FROM available_policies GROUP BY policy_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

question.pl: Znajdź numery telefonów klientów korzystających z najpopularniejszego typu polisy spośród dostępnych polis.

query.en: SELECT policy_type_code FROM available_policies GROUP BY policy_type_code HAVING count(*)  >  4

question.en: Find the name of services that have been used for more than 2 times in first notification of loss.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy usług, które zostały użyte więcej niż 2 razy w pierwszym zgłoszeniu utraty.

query.en: SELECT t2.service_name FROM first_notification_of_loss AS t1 JOIN services AS t2 ON t1.service_id  =  t2.service_id GROUP BY t1.service_id HAVING count(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT t2.service_name FROM first_notification_of_loss AS t1 JOIN services AS t2 ON t1.service_id  =  t2.service_id GROUP BY t1.service_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

question.en: Which services have been used more than twice in first notification of loss? Return the service name.
question.pl: Które usługi zostały użyte więcej niż dwa razy w pierwszym zgłoszeniu utraty? Zwróć nazwę usługi.

query.en: SELECT t2.service_name FROM first_notification_of_loss AS t1 JOIN services AS t2 ON t1.service_id  =  t2.service_id GROUP BY t1.service_id HAVING count(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT t2.service_name FROM first_notification_of_loss AS t1 JOIN services AS t2 ON t1.service_id  =  t2.service_id GROUP BY t1.service_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

question.en: What is the effective date of the claim that has the largest amount of total settlement?
question.pl: Jaka jest data wejścia w życie roszczenia, które ma największą kwotę całkowitego rozliczenia?

query.en: SELECT t1.Effective_Date FROM claims AS t1 JOIN settlements AS t2 ON t1.claim_id  =  t2.claim_id GROUP BY t1.claim_id ORDER BY sum(t2.settlement_amount) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.Effective_Date FROM claims AS t1 JOIN settlements AS t2 ON t1.claim_id  =  t2.claim_id GROUP BY t1.claim_id ORDER BY sum(t2.settlement_amount) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the claim that has the largest total settlement amount. Return the effective date of the claim.
question.pl: Znajdź roszczenie z największą łączną kwotą ugody. Zwróć datę wejścia roszczenia w życie.

query.en: SELECT t1.Effective_Date FROM claims AS t1 JOIN settlements AS t2 ON t1.claim_id  =  t2.claim_id GROUP BY t1.claim_id ORDER BY sum(t2.settlement_amount) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.Effective_Date FROM claims AS t1 JOIN settlements AS t2 ON t1.claim_id  =  t2.claim_id GROUP BY t1.claim_id ORDER BY sum(t2.settlement_amount) DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Jakie są wszystkie typy polis klienta, który ma najwięcej polis na liście?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT t3.policy_type_code FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customers_policies AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN available_policies AS t3 ON t2.policy_id  =  t3.policy_id WHERE t1.customer_name  =  (SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customers_policies AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id GROUP BY t1.customer_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT t3.policy_type_code FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customers_policies AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN available_policies AS t3 ON t2.policy_id  =  t3.policy_id WHERE t1.customer_name  =  (SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customers_policies AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id GROUP BY t1.customer_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

question.en: Find the names of customers who have used either the service "Close a policy" or the service "Upgrade a policy".
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska klientów, którzy skorzystali z usługi "Zamknij polisę" lub "Aktualizuj politykę".

query.en: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN first_notification_of_loss AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN services AS t3 ON t2.service_id  =  t3.service_id WHERE t3.service_name  =  "Close a policy" OR t3.service_name  =  "Upgrade a policy"
query.pl: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN first_notification_of_loss AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN services AS t3 ON t2.service_id  =  t3.service_id WHERE t3.service_name  =  "Zamknij polisę" OR t3.service_name  =  "Uaktualnij politykę"

question.pl: Którzy klienci korzystali zarówno z usługi o nazwie "Zamknij polisę", jak i usługi o nazwie "Uaktualnij politykę"? Podaj nazwy klientów.

query.en: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN first_notification_of_loss AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN services AS t3 ON t2.service_id  =  t3.service_id WHERE t3.service_name  =  "Close a policy" INTERSECT SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN first_notification_of_loss AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN services AS t3 ON t2.service_id  =  t3.service_id WHERE t3.service_name  =  "New policy application"
query.pl: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN first_notification_of_loss AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN services AS t3 ON t2.service_id  =  t3.service_id WHERE t3.service_name  =  "Zamknij polisę" INTERSECT SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN first_notification_of_loss AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN services AS t3 ON t2.service_id  =  t3.service_id WHERE t3.service_name  =  "Nowa aplikacja polityki"

question.en: What are the names of enzymes in the medicine named 'Amisulpride' that can serve as an 'inhibitor'?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się enzymy w leku o nazwie "Amisulpryd", które mogą służyć jako "hamujący"?

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM enzyme AS T1 JOIN medicine_enzyme_interaction AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.enzyme_id JOIN medicine AS T3 ON T2.medicine_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'Amisulpride' AND T2.interaction_type  =  'inhibitor'
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM enzyme AS T1 JOIN medicine_enzyme_interaction AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.enzyme_id JOIN medicine AS T3 ON T2.medicine_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'Amisulpryd' AND T2.interaction_type  =  'inhibitor'

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM enzyme AS T1 JOIN medicine_enzyme_interaction AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.enzyme_id JOIN medicine AS T3 ON T2.medicine_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'Amisulpride' AND T2.interaction_type  =  'inhibitor'

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.Name FROM medicine AS T1 JOIN medicine_enzyme_interaction AS T2 ON T2.medicine_id  =  T1.id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

query.en: SELECT chip_model ,  screen_mode FROM phone WHERE Hardware_Model_name = "LG-P760";

question.en: What is maximum and minimum RAM size of phone produced by company named "Nokia Corporation"?
question.pl: Jaki jest maksymalny i minimalny rozmiar pamięci RAM telefonu produkowanego przez firmę "Nokia Corporation"?

query.en: SELECT max(T1.RAM_MiB) ,  min(T1.RAM_MiB) FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T2.Company_name = "Nokia Corporation";
query.pl: SELECT max(T1.RAM_MiB) ,  min(T1.RAM_MiB) FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T2.Company_name = "Nokia Corporation";

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.ROM_MiB) FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T2.Company_name = "Nokia Corporation";
query.pl: SELECT avg(T1.ROM_MiB) FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T2.Company_name = "Nokia Corporation";

question.en: List the hardware model name and company name for all the phones that were launched in year 2002 or have RAM size greater than 32.
question.pl: Wymień nazwę modelu sprzętu i nazwę firmy dla wszystkich telefonów, które zostały wprowadzone na rynek w 2002 roku lub mają rozmiar pamięci RAM większy niż 32.

query.en: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name ,  T2.Company_name FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T1.Launch_year = 2002 OR T1.RAM_MiB  >  32;
query.pl: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name ,  T2.Company_name FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T1.Launch_year = 2002 OR T1.RAM_MiB  >  32;

question.en: Find all phones that have word 'Full' in their accreditation types. List the Hardware Model name and Company name.

query.en: SELECT Hardware_Model_name ,  Company_name FROM phone WHERE Accreditation_type LIKE 'Full';
query.pl: SELECT Hardware_Model_name ,  Company_name FROM phone WHERE Accreditation_type LIKE 'Pełny';

question.en: Find the Char cells, Pixels and Hardware colours for the screen of the phone whose hardware model name is "LG-P760".
question.pl: Znajdź komórki char, piksele i kolory sprzętu dla ekranu telefonu, którego nazwa modelu sprzętu to "LG-P760".

query.en: SELECT T1.Char_cells ,  T1.Pixels ,  T1.Hardware_colours FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T2.Hardware_Model_name = "LG-P760";
query.pl: SELECT T1.Char_cells ,  T1.Pixels ,  T1.Hardware_colours FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T2.Hardware_Model_name = "LG-P760";

question.en: List the hardware model name and company name for the phone whose screen mode type is "Graphics."
question.pl: Wymień nazwę modelu sprzętu i nazwę firmy dla telefonu, którego typ trybu ekranu to "Grafika".

query.en: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name ,  T2.Company_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T1.Type  =  "Graphics";
query.pl: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name ,  T2.Company_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T1.Type  =  "Grafika";

question.en: Find the name of the company that has the least number of phone models. List the company name and the number of phone model produced by that company.

query.en: SELECT Company_name ,  count(*) FROM phone GROUP BY Company_name ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT Company_name ,  count(*) FROM phone GROUP BY Company_name ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1;

question.en: List the name of the company that produced more than one phone model.

query.en: SELECT Company_name FROM phone GROUP BY Company_name HAVING count(*)  >  1;
query.pl: SELECT Company_name FROM phone GROUP BY Company_name HAVING count(*)  >  1;

question.en: List the maximum, minimum and average number of used kb in screen mode.
question.pl: Wymień maksymalną, minimalną i średnią liczbę używanych kb w trybie ekranu.

query.en: SELECT max(used_kb) , min(used_kb) , avg(used_kb) FROM screen_mode;
query.pl: SELECT max(used_kb) , min(used_kb) , avg(used_kb) FROM screen_mode;

question.en: List the name of the phone model launched in year 2002 and with the highest RAM size.
question.pl: Wymień nazwę modelu telefonu wprowadzonego na rynek w 2002 roku z największą ilością pamięci RAM.

query.en: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T1.Launch_year = 2002 ORDER BY T1.RAM_MiB DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model WHERE T1.Launch_year = 2002 ORDER BY T1.RAM_MiB DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: What are the wifi and screen mode type of the hardware model named "LG-P760"?
question.pl: Jaki jest typ wifi i tryb ekranu modelu sprzętu o nazwie "LG-P760"?

query.en: SELECT T1.WiFi , T3.Type FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model JOIN screen_mode AS T3 ON T2.screen_mode = T3.Graphics_mode WHERE T2.Hardware_Model_name = "LG-P760";
query.pl: SELECT T1.WiFi , T3.Type FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model JOIN screen_mode AS T3 ON T2.screen_mode = T3.Graphics_mode WHERE T2.Hardware_Model_name = "LG-P760";

question.en: List the hardware model name for the phones that have screen mode type "Text" or RAM size greater than 32.
question.pl: Wymień nazwę modelu sprzętu dla telefonów, które mają tryb ekranu typu "Tekst" lub rozmiar pamięci RAM większy niż 32.

query.en: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model JOIN screen_mode AS T3 ON T2.screen_mode = T3.Graphics_mode WHERE T3.Type = "Text" OR T1.RAM_MiB  >  32;
query.pl: SELECT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM chip_model AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Model_name  =  T2.chip_model JOIN screen_mode AS T3 ON T2.screen_mode = T3.Graphics_mode WHERE T3.Type = "Tekst" OR T1.RAM_MiB  >  32;

question.en: List the hardware model name for the phones that were produced by "Nokia Corporation" or whose screen mode type is "Graphics."
question.pl: Wymień nazwę modelu sprzętu dla telefonów, które zostały wyprodukowane przez "Nokia Corporation" lub których typ trybu ekranu to "Grafika".

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T1.Type  =  "Graphics" OR t2.Company_name  =  "Nokia Corporation"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T1.Type  =  "Grafika" OR t2.Company_name  =  "Nokia Corporation"

question.en: List the hardware model name for the phons that were produced by "Nokia Corporation" but whose screen mode type is not Text.
question.pl: Wymień nazwę modelu sprzętu dla telefonów, które zostały wyprodukowane przez "Nokia Corporation", ale których typ trybu ekranu nie jest tekstowy.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE t2.Company_name  =  "Nokia Corporation" AND T1.Type != "Text";
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Hardware_Model_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE t2.Company_name  =  "Nokia Corporation" AND T1.Type != "Tekst";

question.en: List the phone hardware model and company name for the phones whose screen usage in kb is between 10 and 15.
question.pl: Wymień model telefonu i nazwę firmy dla telefonów, których zużycie ekranu w kb wynosi od 10 do 15.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Hardware_Model_name , T2.Company_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T1.used_kb BETWEEN 10 AND 15;
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Hardware_Model_name , T2.Company_name FROM screen_mode AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Graphics_mode = T2.screen_mode WHERE T1.used_kb BETWEEN 10 AND 15;

question.en: Find the number of phones for each accreditation type.

query.pl: SELECT Accreditation_type ,  count(*) FROM phone GROUP BY Accreditation_type

query.pl: SELECT Accreditation_type ,  count(*) FROM phone GROUP BY Accreditation_type

question.en: Find the accreditation level that more than 3 phones use.

query.en: SELECT Accreditation_level FROM phone GROUP BY Accreditation_level HAVING count(*)  >  3
query.pl: SELECT Accreditation_level FROM phone GROUP BY Accreditation_level HAVING count(*)  >  3

query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM chip_model WHERE wifi  =  'Nie'

question.en: List all the model names sorted by their launch year.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie nazwy modeli posortowane według roku premiery.

query.en: SELECT model_name FROM chip_model ORDER BY launch_year
query.pl: SELECT model_name FROM chip_model ORDER BY launch_year

question.en: Find the average ram mib size of the chip models that are never used by any phone.
question.pl: Znajdź średni rozmiar ram mib modeli chipów, które nigdy nie są używane przez żaden telefon.

query.en: SELECT avg(RAM_MiB) FROM chip_model WHERE model_name NOT IN (SELECT chip_model FROM phone)
query.pl: SELECT avg(RAM_MiB) FROM chip_model WHERE model_name NOT IN (SELECT chip_model FROM phone)

question.en: Find the names of the chip models that are not used by any phone with full accreditation type.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy modeli chipów, które nie są używane przez żaden telefon z pełnym typem akredytacji.

query.en: SELECT model_name FROM chip_model EXCEPT SELECT chip_model FROM phone WHERE Accreditation_type  =  'Full'
query.pl: SELECT model_name FROM chip_model EXCEPT SELECT chip_model FROM phone WHERE Accreditation_type  =  'Pełny'

question.en: Find the pixels of the screen modes that are used by both phones with full accreditation types and phones with Provisional accreditation types.
question.pl: Znajdź piksele trybów ekranu używanych zarówno przez telefony z pełną akredytacją, jak i telefony z akredytacją tymczasową.

query.en: SELECT t1.pixels FROM screen_mode AS t1 JOIN phone AS t2 ON t1.Graphics_mode  =  t2.screen_mode WHERE t2.Accreditation_type  =  'Provisional' INTERSECT SELECT t1.pixels FROM screen_mode AS t1 JOIN phone AS t2 ON t1.Graphics_mode  =  t2.screen_mode WHERE t2.Accreditation_type  =  'Full'
query.pl: SELECT t1.pixels FROM screen_mode AS t1 JOIN phone AS t2 ON t1.Graphics_mode  =  t2.screen_mode WHERE t2.Accreditation_type  =  'Tymczasowe' INTERSECT SELECT t1.pixels FROM screen_mode AS t1 JOIN phone AS t2 ON t1.Graphics_mode  =  t2.screen_mode WHERE t2.Accreditation_type  =  'Pełny'

query.en: SELECT T1.total FROM body_builder AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.people_id  =  T2.people_id WHERE T2.Birth_Date LIKE "%January%";
query.pl: SELECT T1.total FROM body_builder AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.people_id  =  T2.people_id WHERE T2.Birth_Date LIKE "%styczeń%";

question.en: What are the names of representatives and the dates of elections they participated in.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Date FROM election AS T1 JOIN representative AS T2 ON T1.Representative_ID  =  T2.Representative_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Date FROM election AS T1 JOIN representative AS T2 ON T1.Representative_ID  =  T2.Representative_ID

question.en: What are the names of representatives with more than 10000 votes in election?

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM election AS T1 JOIN representative AS T2 ON T1.Representative_ID  =  T2.Representative_ID WHERE Votes  >  10000

question.en: What are the names of representatives in descending order of votes?

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM election AS T1 JOIN representative AS T2 ON T1.Representative_ID  =  T2.Representative_ID ORDER BY votes DESC

question.en: What is the party of the representative that has the smallest number of votes.
question.pl: Jaka jest partia przedstawiciela, który ma najmniejszą liczbę głosów.

query.en: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN representative AS T2 ON T1.Representative_ID  =  T2.Representative_ID ORDER BY votes ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN representative AS T2 ON T1.Representative_ID  =  T2.Representative_ID ORDER BY votes ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the lifespans of representatives in descending order of vote percent?

question.en: What are the different parties of representative? Show the party name and the number of representatives in each party.

query.pl: SELECT T2.apt_number FROM Apartment_Bookings AS T1 JOIN Apartments AS T2 ON T1.apt_id  =  T2.apt_id WHERE T1.booking_status_code  =  "Potwierdzono" INTERSECT SELECT T2.apt_number FROM Apartment_Bookings AS T1 JOIN Apartments AS T2 ON T1.apt_id  =  T2.apt_id WHERE T1.booking_status_code  =  "Tymczasowe"

question.en: What are the player name, number of matches, and information source for players who do not suffer from injury of 'Knee problem'?

query.en: SELECT player ,  number_of_matches ,  SOURCE FROM injury_accident WHERE injury != 'Knee problem'
query.pl: SELECT player ,  number_of_matches ,  SOURCE FROM injury_accident WHERE injury != 'Problem z kolanem'

question.en: What is the season of the game which causes the player 'Walter Samuel' to get injured?
question.pl: W którym sezonie gry gracz Walter Samuel doznał kontuzji?

query.en: SELECT T1.season FROM game AS T1 JOIN injury_accident AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.game_id WHERE T2.player  =  'Walter Samuel'
query.pl: SELECT T1.season FROM game AS T1 JOIN injury_accident AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.game_id WHERE T2.player  =  'Walter Samuel'

question.en: What are the ids, scores, and dates of the games which caused at least two injury accidents?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory, wyniki i daty meczów, które spowodowały co najmniej dwa wypadki?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.score ,  T1.date FROM game AS T1 JOIN injury_accident AS T2 ON T2.game_id  =  T1.id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.score ,  T1.date FROM game AS T1 JOIN injury_accident AS T2 ON T2.game_id  =  T1.id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What are the id and name of the stadium where the most injury accidents happened?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i nazwa stadionu, na którym doszło do największej liczby wypadków?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM stadium AS T1 JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.stadium_id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T2.id  =  T3.game_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM stadium AS T1 JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.stadium_id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T2.id  =  T3.game_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the id and name of the stadium where the largest number of injury accidents occurred.
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikator i nazwę stadionu, na którym doszło do największej liczby wypadków.

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM stadium AS T1 JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.stadium_id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T2.id  =  T3.game_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM stadium AS T1 JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.stadium_id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T2.id  =  T3.game_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: In which season and which stadium did any player have an injury of 'Foot injury' or 'Knee problem'?
question.pl: W którym sezonie i na którym stadionie któryś z zawodników doznał kontuzji "Uraz stopy" lub "Problem z kolanem"?

query.en: SELECT T1.season ,  T2.name FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id WHERE T3.injury  =  'Foot injury' OR T3.injury  =  'Knee problem'
query.pl: SELECT T1.season ,  T2.name FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id WHERE T3.injury  =  'Uraz stopy' OR T3.injury  =  'Problem z kolanem'

question.en: How many different kinds of information sources are there for injury accidents?
question.pl: Ile jest różnych źródeł informacji na temat wypadków z obrażeniami ciała?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT SOURCE) FROM injury_accident
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT SOURCE) FROM injury_accident

question.en: How many games are free of injury accidents?
question.pl: Ile meczów jest wolnych od wypadków z kontuzjami?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM game WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT game_id FROM injury_accident )
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM game WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT game_id FROM injury_accident )

question.en: How many distinct kinds of injuries happened after season 2010?
question.pl: Ile różnych rodzajów kontuzji miało miejsce po sezonie 2010?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT T1.injury) FROM injury_accident AS T1 JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.game_id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.season  >  2010
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT T1.injury) FROM injury_accident AS T1 JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.game_id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.season  >  2010

question.en: List the name of the stadium where both the player 'Walter Samuel' and the player 'Thiago Motta' got injured.
question.pl: Wymień nazwę stadionu, na którym kontuzji doznali piłkarz "Walter Samuel" i piłkarz "Thiago Motta".

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id WHERE T3.player  =  'Walter Samuel' INTERSECT SELECT T2.name FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id WHERE T3.player  =  'Thiago Motta'
query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id WHERE T3.player  =  'Walter Samuel' INTERSECT SELECT T2.name FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id WHERE T3.player  =  'Thiago Motta'

question.en: Show the name, average attendance, total attendance for stadiums where no accidents happened.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę, średnią frekwencję, całkowitą frekwencję na stadionach, na których nie doszło do żadnego wypadku.

query.en: SELECT name ,  average_attendance ,  total_attendance FROM stadium EXCEPT SELECT T2.name ,  T2.average_attendance ,  T2.total_attendance FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id
query.pl: SELECT name ,  average_attendance ,  total_attendance FROM stadium EXCEPT SELECT T2.name ,  T2.average_attendance ,  T2.total_attendance FROM game AS T1 JOIN stadium AS T2 ON T1.stadium_id  =  T2.id JOIN injury_accident AS T3 ON T1.id  =  T3.game_id

query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  count(*) FROM stadium AS T1 JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.stadium_id GROUP BY T1.id

question.en: For each injury accident, find the date of the game and the name of the injured player in the game, and sort the results in descending order of game season.
question.pl: Dla każdego wypadku z kontuzją znajdź datę meczu i nazwisko kontuzjowanego zawodnika, a następnie posortuj wyniki malejąco według sezonu rozgrywek.

query.en: SELECT T1.date ,  T2.player FROM game AS T1 JOIN injury_accident AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.game_id ORDER BY T1.season DESC
query.pl: SELECT T1.date ,  T2.player FROM game AS T1 JOIN injury_accident AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.game_id ORDER BY T1.season DESC

question.en: List all country and league names.

query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T2.name FROM Country AS T1 JOIN League AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.country_id

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Country AS T1 JOIN League AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.country_id WHERE T1.name  =  "England"
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Country AS T1 JOIN League AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.country_id WHERE T1.name  =  "Anglia"

question.en: What is the average weight of all players?

question.pl: Jaki jest maksymalny i minimalny wzrost wszystkich graczy?

query.en: SELECT max(weight) ,  min(weight) FROM Player
query.pl: SELECT max(weight) ,  min(weight) FROM Player

question.en: List all player names who have an overall rating higher than the average.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkich graczy, których ogólna ocena jest wyższa niż średnia.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.overall_rating  >  ( SELECT avg(overall_rating) FROM Player_Attributes )
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.overall_rating  >  ( SELECT avg(overall_rating) FROM Player_Attributes )

question.en: What are the names of players who have the best dribbling?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się zawodnicy, którzy mają najlepszy drybling?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.dribbling  =  ( SELECT max(overall_rating) FROM Player_Attributes)
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.dribbling  =  ( SELECT max(overall_rating) FROM Player_Attributes)

question.en: List the names of all players who have a crossing score higher than 90 and prefer their right foot.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska wszystkich graczy, którzy mają wynik przejścia wyższy niż 90 i preferują prawą nogę.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.crossing  >  90 AND T2.preferred_foot  =  "right"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.crossing  >  90 AND T2.preferred_foot  =  "prawo"

question.en: List the names of all left-footed players who have overall rating between 85 and 90.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska wszystkich lewonożnych graczy, którzy mają ogólną ocenę między 85 a 90.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.preferred_foot  =  "left" AND T2.overall_rating  >=  85 AND T2.overall_rating  <=  90
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id = T2.player_api_id WHERE T2.preferred_foot  =  "lewy" AND T2.overall_rating  >=  85 AND T2.overall_rating  <=  90

question.en: What is the average rating for right-footed players and left-footed players?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia ocena zawodników prawonożnych i lewonożnych?

query.en: SELECT preferred_foot ,  avg(overall_rating) FROM Player_Attributes GROUP BY preferred_foot
query.pl: SELECT preferred_foot ,  avg(overall_rating) FROM Player_Attributes GROUP BY preferred_foot

question.en: Of all players with an overall rating greater than 80, how many are right-footed and left-footed?

query.en: SELECT preferred_foot ,  count(*) FROM Player_Attributes WHERE overall_rating  >  80 GROUP BY preferred_foot
query.pl: SELECT preferred_foot ,  count(*) FROM Player_Attributes WHERE overall_rating  >  80 GROUP BY preferred_foot

question.en: List all of the player ids with a height of at least 180cm and an overall rating higher than 85.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkich graczy o wzroście co najmniej 180 cm i ogólnej ocenie wyższej niż 85.

query.en: SELECT player_api_id FROM Player WHERE height  >=  180 INTERSECT SELECT player_api_id FROM Player_Attributes WHERE overall_rating  >  85
query.pl: SELECT player_api_id FROM Player WHERE height  >=  180 INTERSECT SELECT player_api_id FROM Player_Attributes WHERE overall_rating  >  85

question.en: List all of the ids for left-footed players with a height between 180cm and 190cm.

query.en: SELECT player_api_id FROM Player WHERE height  >=  180 AND height  <=  190 INTERSECT SELECT player_api_id FROM Player_Attributes WHERE preferred_foot  =  "left"
query.pl: SELECT player_api_id FROM Player WHERE height  >=  180 AND height  <=  190 INTERSECT SELECT player_api_id FROM Player_Attributes WHERE preferred_foot  =  "lewy"

question.en: Who are the top 3 players in terms of overall rating?
question.pl: Kim są trzej najlepsi gracze pod względem ogólnej oceny?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id  =  T2.player_api_id ORDER BY overall_rating DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id  =  T2.player_api_id ORDER BY overall_rating DESC LIMIT 3

question.en: List the names and birthdays of the top five players in terms of potential.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska i daty urodzenia pięciu najlepszych graczy pod względem potencjału.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name ,  T1.birthday FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id  =  T2.player_api_id ORDER BY potential DESC LIMIT 5
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.player_name ,  T1.birthday FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Player_Attributes AS T2 ON T1.player_api_id  =  T2.player_api_id ORDER BY potential DESC LIMIT 5

question.en: Show the locations that have both performances with more than 2000 attendees and performances with less than 1000 attendees.

query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM performance WHERE Attendance  >  2000 INTERSECT SELECT LOCATION FROM performance WHERE Attendance  <  1000

question.en: Show the names of members and the location of the performances they attended.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska członków i lokalizację występów, w których uczestniczyli.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Location FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Location FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Location FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID ORDER BY T2.Name ASC
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Location FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID ORDER BY T2.Name ASC
