query.en: SELECT T3.Date FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID WHERE T2.Role  =  "Violin"
query.pl: SELECT T3.Date FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID WHERE T2.Role  =  "Skrzypce"

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Date FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID ORDER BY T3.Attendance DESC
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Date FROM member_attendance AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Member_ID  =  T2.Member_ID JOIN performance AS T3 ON T1.Performance_ID  =  T3.Performance_ID ORDER BY T3.Attendance DESC

question.en: Find the title of courses that have two prerequisites?

query.en: SELECT T1.title FROM course AS T1 JOIN prereq AS T2 ON T1.course_id  =  T2.course_id GROUP BY T2.course_id HAVING count(*)  =  2

query.en: SELECT semester ,  YEAR FROM SECTION GROUP BY semester ,  YEAR ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the number and averaged salary of all instructors who are in the department with the highest budget.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę i uśrednione wynagrodzenie wszystkich instruktorów w dziale o najwyższym budżecie.

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.salary) ,  count(*) FROM instructor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_name  =  T2.dept_name ORDER BY T2.budget DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the title and credits of the course that is taught in the largest classroom (with the highest capacity)?
question.pl: Jaki jest tytuł i punkty kursu, który jest prowadzony w największej sali lekcyjnej (o największej pojemności)?

query.en: SELECT T3.title ,  T3.credits FROM classroom AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.building  =  T2.building AND T1.room_number  =  T2.room_number JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id  =  T3.course_id WHERE T1.capacity  =  (SELECT max(capacity) FROM classroom)
query.pl: SELECT T3.title ,  T3.credits FROM classroom AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.building  =  T2.building AND T1.room_number  =  T2.room_number JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id  =  T3.course_id WHERE T1.capacity  =  (SELECT max(capacity) FROM classroom)

question.pl: Podaj tytuł i punkty za kurs, który jest prowadzony w klasie o największej liczbie miejsc.

query.en: SELECT T3.title ,  T3.credits FROM classroom AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.building  =  T2.building AND T1.room_number  =  T2.room_number JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id  =  T3.course_id WHERE T1.capacity  =  (SELECT max(capacity) FROM classroom)
query.pl: SELECT T3.title ,  T3.credits FROM classroom AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.building  =  T2.building AND T1.room_number  =  T2.room_number JOIN course AS T3 ON T2.course_id  =  T3.course_id WHERE T1.capacity  =  (SELECT max(capacity) FROM classroom)

question.en: Find the total number of students and total number of instructors for each department.
question.pl: Znajdź całkowitą liczbę studentów i całkowitą liczbę instruktorów dla każdego działu.

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT T2.id) ,  count(DISTINCT T3.id) ,  T3.dept_name FROM department AS T1 JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.dept_name  =  T2.dept_name JOIN instructor AS T3 ON T1.dept_name  =  T3.dept_name GROUP BY T3.dept_name
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT T2.id) ,  count(DISTINCT T3.id) ,  T3.dept_name FROM department AS T1 JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.dept_name  =  T2.dept_name JOIN instructor AS T3 ON T1.dept_name  =  T3.dept_name GROUP BY T3.dept_name

query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT T2.id) ,  count(DISTINCT T3.id) ,  T3.dept_name FROM department AS T1 JOIN student AS T2 ON T1.dept_name  =  T2.dept_name JOIN instructor AS T3 ON T1.dept_name  =  T3.dept_name GROUP BY T3.dept_name

question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska studentów, którzy wzięli udział w kursie wstępnym przedmiotu o nazwie Finanse międzynarodowe.

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM student AS T1 JOIN takes AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.course_id IN (SELECT T4.prereq_id FROM course AS T3 JOIN prereq AS T4 ON T3.course_id  =  T4.course_id WHERE T3.title  =  'International Finance')
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM student AS T1 JOIN takes AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.course_id IN (SELECT T4.prereq_id FROM course AS T3 JOIN prereq AS T4 ON T3.course_id  =  T4.course_id WHERE T3.title  =  'Finanse międzynarodowe')

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM student AS T1 JOIN takes AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.course_id IN (SELECT T4.prereq_id FROM course AS T3 JOIN prereq AS T4 ON T3.course_id  =  T4.course_id WHERE T3.title  =  'International Finance')

query.en: SELECT T3.name FROM course AS T1 JOIN takes AS T2 ON T1.course_id  =  T2.course_id JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.dept_name  =  'Statistics'
query.pl: SELECT T3.name FROM course AS T1 JOIN takes AS T2 ON T1.course_id  =  T2.course_id JOIN student AS T3 ON T2.id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.dept_name  =  'Statystyki'

question.en: Find the building, room number, semester and year of all courses offered by Psychology department sorted by course titles.

query.en: SELECT T2.building ,  T2.room_number ,  T2.semester ,  T2.year FROM course AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.course_id  =  T2.course_id WHERE T1.dept_name  =  'Psychology' ORDER BY T1.title
query.pl: SELECT T2.building ,  T2.room_number ,  T2.semester ,  T2.year FROM course AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.course_id  =  T2.course_id WHERE T1.dept_name  =  'Psychologia' ORDER BY T1.title

query.en: SELECT T2.building ,  T2.room_number ,  T2.semester ,  T2.year FROM course AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.course_id  =  T2.course_id WHERE T1.dept_name  =  'Psychology' ORDER BY T1.title
query.pl: SELECT T2.building ,  T2.room_number ,  T2.semester ,  T2.year FROM course AS T1 JOIN SECTION AS T2 ON T1.course_id  =  T2.course_id WHERE T1.dept_name  =  'Psychologia' ORDER BY T1.title

question.pl: Pokaż różne grupy ludzi wraz z liczbą osób w każdej z nich.

question.en: Show the names of people, and dates and venues of debates they are on the affirmative side.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska osób oraz daty i miejsca debat, w których są po stronie twierdzącej.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Date ,  T2.Venue FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN debate AS T2 ON T1.Debate_ID  =  T2.Debate_ID JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.Affirmative  =  T3.People_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Date ,  T2.Venue FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN debate AS T2 ON T1.Debate_ID  =  T2.Debate_ID JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.Affirmative  =  T3.People_ID

question.en: Show the names of people, and dates and venues of debates they are on the negative side, ordered in ascending alphabetical order of name.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska osób oraz daty i miejsca debat, w których występują po stronie negatywnej, uporządkowane w rosnącej kolejności alfabetycznej nazwisk.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Date ,  T2.Venue FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN debate AS T2 ON T1.Debate_ID  =  T2.Debate_ID JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.Negative  =  T3.People_ID ORDER BY T3.Name ASC
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Date ,  T2.Venue FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN debate AS T2 ON T1.Debate_ID  =  T2.Debate_ID JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.Negative  =  T3.People_ID ORDER BY T3.Name ASC

question.en: Show the names of people that are on affirmative side of debates with number of audience bigger than 200.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska osób, które są po stronie twierdzącej w debatach z liczbą widzów większą niż 200.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN debate AS T2 ON T1.Debate_ID  =  T2.Debate_ID JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.Affirmative  =  T3.People_ID WHERE T2.Num_of_Audience  >  200
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN debate AS T2 ON T1.Debate_ID  =  T2.Debate_ID JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.Affirmative  =  T3.People_ID WHERE T2.Num_of_Audience  >  200

question.en: Show the names of people and the number of times they have been on the affirmative side of debates.
question.pl: Pokaż imiona i nazwiska osób oraz liczbę przypadków, w których opowiadały się one po stronie twierdzącej w debatach.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.Affirmative  =  T2.People_ID GROUP BY T2.Name
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.Affirmative  =  T2.People_ID GROUP BY T2.Name

question.en: Show the names of people who have been on the negative side of debates at least twice.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska osób, które co najmniej dwukrotnie były po negatywnej stronie debat.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.Negative  =  T2.People_ID GROUP BY T2.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM debate_people AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.Negative  =  T2.People_ID GROUP BY T2.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: List the names of people that have not been on the affirmative side of debates.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska osób, które nie opowiadały się w debatach po stronie zwolenników.

question.en: Find the type code of the most frequently used policy.
question.pl: Znajdź kod typu najczęściej używanej polisy.

query.en: SELECT policy_type_code FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT policy_type_code FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find all the policy types that are used by more than 2 customers.
question.pl: Znajdź wszystkie typy polis używane przez więcej niż 2 klientów.

query.en: SELECT policy_type_code FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type_code HAVING count(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT policy_type_code FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type_code HAVING count(*)  >  2

question.en: Which types of policy are chosen by more than 2 customers? Give me the policy type codes.
question.pl: Które rodzaje polis są wybierane przez więcej niż 2 klientów? Podaj kody typów polis.

query.en: SELECT policy_type_code FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type_code HAVING count(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT policy_type_code FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type_code HAVING count(*)  >  2

question.en: Find the total and average amount paid in claim headers.
question.pl: Znajdź całkowitą i średnią kwotę wypłaconą w nagłówkach roszczeń.

query.en: SELECT sum(amount_piad) ,  avg(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers
query.pl: SELECT sum(amount_piad) ,  avg(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers

question.en: What are the total amount and average amount paid in claim headers?
question.pl: Jaka jest łączna kwota i średnia kwota wypłacona w nagłówkach roszczeń?

query.en: SELECT sum(amount_piad) ,  avg(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers
query.pl: SELECT sum(amount_piad) ,  avg(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers

question.en: Find the total amount claimed in the most recently created document.
question.pl: Znajdź łączną wnioskowaną kwotę w ostatnio utworzonym dokumencie.

query.en: SELECT sum(t1.amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN claims_documents AS t2 ON t1.claim_header_id  =  t2.claim_id WHERE t2.created_date  =  (SELECT created_date FROM claims_documents ORDER BY created_date LIMIT 1)
query.pl: SELECT sum(t1.amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN claims_documents AS t2 ON t1.claim_header_id  =  t2.claim_id WHERE t2.created_date  =  (SELECT created_date FROM claims_documents ORDER BY created_date LIMIT 1)

question.en: How much amount in total were claimed in the most recently created document?
question.pl: Jaką łączną kwotę zadeklarowano w ostatnio utworzonym dokumencie?

query.en: SELECT sum(t1.amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN claims_documents AS t2 ON t1.claim_header_id  =  t2.claim_id WHERE t2.created_date  =  (SELECT created_date FROM claims_documents ORDER BY created_date LIMIT 1)
query.pl: SELECT sum(t1.amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN claims_documents AS t2 ON t1.claim_header_id  =  t2.claim_id WHERE t2.created_date  =  (SELECT created_date FROM claims_documents ORDER BY created_date LIMIT 1)

question.en: What is the name of the customer who has made the largest amount of claim in a single claim?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się klient, który zgłosił największą kwotę roszczenia w pojedynczym roszczeniu?

query.en: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_claimed  =  (SELECT max(amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers)
query.pl: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_claimed  =  (SELECT max(amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers)

question.en: Which customer made the largest amount of claim in a single claim? Return the customer details.
question.pl: Który klient zgłosił największą kwotę roszczenia w pojedynczym roszczeniu? Zwróć dane klienta.

query.en: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_claimed  =  (SELECT max(amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers)
query.pl: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_claimed  =  (SELECT max(amount_claimed) FROM claim_headers)

question.en: What is the name of the customer who has made the minimum amount of payment in one claim?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się klient, który dokonał minimalnej kwoty płatności w jednym wniosku?

query.en: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_piad  =  (SELECT min(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers)
query.pl: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_piad  =  (SELECT min(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers)

question.en: Which customer made the smallest amount of claim in one claim? Return the customer details.
question.pl: Który klient zgłosił najmniejszą kwotę roszczenia w jednym roszczeniu? Zwróć dane klienta.

query.en: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_piad  =  (SELECT min(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers)
query.pl: SELECT t3.customer_details FROM claim_headers AS t1 JOIN policies AS t2 ON t1.policy_id  =  t2.policy_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id  =  t3.customer_id WHERE t1.amount_piad  =  (SELECT min(amount_piad) FROM claim_headers)

question.en: Find the names of customers who have no policies associated.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy klientów, którzy nie mają powiązanych polis.

query.en: SELECT customer_details FROM customers EXCEPT SELECT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id
query.pl: SELECT customer_details FROM customers EXCEPT SELECT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id

question.en: What are the names of customers who do not have any policies?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy klientów, którzy nie mają żadnych polis?

query.en: SELECT customer_details FROM customers EXCEPT SELECT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id
query.pl: SELECT customer_details FROM customers EXCEPT SELECT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id

question.en: How many claim processing stages are there in total?
question.pl: Ile jest łącznie etapów rozpatrywania wniosku?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM claims_processing_stages
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM claims_processing_stages

question.en: Find the number of distinct stages in claim processing.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę poszczególnych etapów przetwarzania roszczenia.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM claims_processing_stages
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM claims_processing_stages

question.en: What is the name of the claim processing stage that most of the claims are on?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się etap rozpatrywania wniosku, na którym znajduje się większość wniosków?

query.en: SELECT t2.claim_status_name FROM claims_processing AS t1 JOIN claims_processing_stages AS t2 ON t1.claim_stage_id  =  t2.claim_stage_id GROUP BY t1.claim_stage_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t2.claim_status_name FROM claims_processing AS t1 JOIN claims_processing_stages AS t2 ON t1.claim_stage_id  =  t2.claim_stage_id GROUP BY t1.claim_stage_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which claim processing stage has the most claims? Show the claim status name.
question.pl: Na którym etapie przetwarzania wniosku jest ich najwięcej? Pokaż nazwę statusu roszczenia.

query.en: SELECT t2.claim_status_name FROM claims_processing AS t1 JOIN claims_processing_stages AS t2 ON t1.claim_stage_id  =  t2.claim_stage_id GROUP BY t1.claim_stage_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t2.claim_status_name FROM claims_processing AS t1 JOIN claims_processing_stages AS t2 ON t1.claim_stage_id  =  t2.claim_stage_id GROUP BY t1.claim_stage_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the names of customers whose name contains "Diana".
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy klientów, których imię zawiera "Diana".

query.en: SELECT customer_details FROM customers WHERE customer_details LIKE "%Diana%"
query.pl: SELECT customer_details FROM customers WHERE customer_details LIKE "%Diana%"

question.en: Which customers have the substring "Diana" in their names? Return the customer details.
question.pl: Którzy klienci mają w nazwie podciąg "Diana"? Zwróć szczegóły klienta.

query.en: SELECT customer_details FROM customers WHERE customer_details LIKE "%Diana%"
query.pl: SELECT customer_details FROM customers WHERE customer_details LIKE "%Diana%"

question.en: Find the names of the customers who have an deputy policy.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska klientów, którzy posiadają polisę zastępczą.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Deputy"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Zastępca"

question.en: Which customers have an insurance policy with the type code "Deputy"? Give me the customer details.
question.pl: Którzy klienci mają polisę ubezpieczeniową z kodem typu "Zastępca"? Podaj mi szczegóły klienta.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Deputy"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Zastępca"

question.en: Find the names of customers who either have an deputy policy or uniformed policy.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy klientów, którzy mają politykę zastępcy lub politykę mundurową.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Deputy" OR t1.policy_type_code  =  "Uniform"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Zastępca" OR t1.policy_type_code  =  "Mundur"

question.en: Which customers have an insurance policy with the type code "Deputy" or "Uniform"? Return the customer details.
question.pl: Którzy klienci mają polisę ubezpieczeniową z kodem typu "Zastępca" lub "Mundurowy"? Zwróć dane klienta.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Deputy" OR t1.policy_type_code  =  "Uniform"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id WHERE t1.policy_type_code  =  "Zastępca" OR t1.policy_type_code  =  "Mundur"

query.pl: SELECT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id GROUP BY t2.customer_details ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.pl: SELECT t2.customer_details FROM policies AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id GROUP BY t2.customer_details ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the customer id, first and last name with most number of accounts.
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator klienta, imię i nazwisko z największą liczbą kont.

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_id ,  T2.customer_first_name ,  T2.customer_last_name FROM Accounts AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_id ,  T2.customer_first_name ,  T2.customer_last_name FROM Accounts AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: How many churches opened before 1850 are there?

question.en: Show the pair of male and female names in all weddings after year 2014

query.en: SELECT T2.name ,  T3.name FROM wedding AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.male_id  =  T2.people_id JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.female_id  =  T3.people_id WHERE T1.year  >  2014
query.pl: SELECT T2.name ,  T3.name FROM wedding AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.male_id  =  T2.people_id JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.female_id  =  T3.people_id WHERE T1.year  >  2014

question.en: Show all church names except for those that had a wedding in year 2015.

query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM wedding AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.female_id  =  T2.people_id WHERE T1.year  =  2016 AND T2.is_male  =  'F' AND T2.country  =  'Kanada'

query.pl: SELECT T4.name FROM wedding AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.male_id  =  T2.people_id JOIN people AS T3 ON T1.female_id  =  T3.people_id JOIN church AS T4 ON T4.church_id  =  T1.church_id WHERE T2.age  >  30 OR T3.age  >  30

question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie nazwiska artystów, których średnia frekwencja na wystawie przekracza 200.

query.en: SELECT T3.name FROM exhibition_record AS T1 JOIN exhibition AS T2 ON T1.exhibition_id  =  T2.exhibition_id JOIN artist AS T3 ON T3.artist_id  =  T2.artist_id GROUP BY T3.artist_id HAVING avg(T1.attendance)  >  200
query.pl: SELECT T3.name FROM exhibition_record AS T1 JOIN exhibition AS T2 ON T1.exhibition_id  =  T2.exhibition_id JOIN artist AS T3 ON T3.artist_id  =  T2.artist_id GROUP BY T3.artist_id HAVING avg(T1.attendance)  >  200

question.en: What are the names of artist whose exhibitions draw over 200 attendees on average?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwiska artystów, których wystawy przyciągają średnio ponad 200 widzów?

query.en: SELECT T3.name FROM exhibition_record AS T1 JOIN exhibition AS T2 ON T1.exhibition_id  =  T2.exhibition_id JOIN artist AS T3 ON T3.artist_id  =  T2.artist_id GROUP BY T3.artist_id HAVING avg(T1.attendance)  >  200
query.pl: SELECT T3.name FROM exhibition_record AS T1 JOIN exhibition AS T2 ON T1.exhibition_id  =  T2.exhibition_id JOIN artist AS T3 ON T3.artist_id  =  T2.artist_id GROUP BY T3.artist_id HAVING avg(T1.attendance)  >  200

question.en: Find the id of the item whose title is "orange".
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikator elementu, którego tytuł to "pomarańczowy".

query.en: SELECT i_id FROM item WHERE title  =  "orange"
query.pl: SELECT i_id FROM item WHERE title  =  "pomarańczowy"

question.en: List all information in the item table.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie informacje w tabeli pozycji.

query.en: SELECT * FROM item
query.pl: SELECT * FROM item

question.en: Find the number of reviews.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę recenzji.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM review
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM review

question.en: How many users are there?
question.pl: Ilu jest użytkowników?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM useracct
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM useracct

question.en: Find the average and maximum rating of all reviews.
question.pl: Znajdź średnią i maksymalną ocenę wszystkich recenzji.

query.en: SELECT avg(rating) ,  max(rating) FROM review
query.pl: SELECT avg(rating) ,  max(rating) FROM review

question.en: Find the highest rank of all reviews.
question.pl: Znajdź najwyższą pozycję wśród wszystkich recenzji.

query.en: SELECT min(rank) FROM review
query.pl: SELECT min(rank) FROM review

question.en: How many different users wrote some reviews?
question.pl: Ilu różnych użytkowników napisało recenzje?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT u_id) FROM review
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT u_id) FROM review

question.en: How many different items were reviewed by some users?
question.pl: Ile różnych przedmiotów zostało sprawdzonych przez niektórych użytkowników?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT i_id) FROM review
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT i_id) FROM review

question.en: Find the number of items that did not receive any review.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę elementów, które nie otrzymały żadnej recenzji.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM item WHERE i_id NOT IN (SELECT i_id FROM review)
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM item WHERE i_id NOT IN (SELECT i_id FROM review)

question.en: Find the names of users who did not leave any review.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy użytkowników, którzy nie zostawili żadnej recenzji.

query.en: SELECT name FROM useracct WHERE u_id NOT IN (SELECT u_id FROM review)
query.pl: SELECT name FROM useracct WHERE u_id NOT IN (SELECT u_id FROM review)

question.en: Find the names of goods that receive a rating of 10.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy towarów, które otrzymały ocenę 10.

query.en: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  =  10
query.pl: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  =  10

question.en: Find the titles of items whose rating is higher than the average review rating of all items.
question.pl: Znajdź tytuły przedmiotów, których ocena jest wyższa niż średnia ocena wszystkich przedmiotów.

query.en: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  >  (SELECT avg(rating) FROM review)
query.pl: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  >  (SELECT avg(rating) FROM review)

question.en: Find the titles of items that received any rating below 5.
question.pl: Znajdź tytuły przedmiotów, które otrzymały ocenę poniżej 5.

query.en: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  <  5
query.pl: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  <  5

question.en: Find the titles of items that received both a rating higher than 8 and a rating below 5.
question.pl: Znajdź tytuły artykułów, które otrzymały zarówno ocenę wyższą niż 8, jak i niższą niż 5.

query.en: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  >  8 INTERSECT SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  <  5
query.pl: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  >  8 INTERSECT SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rating  <  5

question.en: Find the names of items whose rank is higher than 3 and whose average rating is above 5.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy przedmiotów, których ranga jest wyższa niż 3 i których średnia ocena jest wyższa niż 5.

query.en: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rank  >  3 INTERSECT SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id HAVING avg(T2.rating)  >  5
query.pl: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id WHERE T2.rank  >  3 INTERSECT SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id HAVING avg(T2.rating)  >  5

question.en: Find the name of the item with the lowest average rating.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę przedmiotu z najniższą średnią oceną.

query.en: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id ORDER BY avg(T2.rating) LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.title FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id ORDER BY avg(T2.rating) LIMIT 1

question.en: List the titles of all items in alphabetic order .
question.pl: Wymień tytuły wszystkich przedmiotów w kolejności alfabetycznej.

query.en: SELECT title FROM item ORDER BY title
query.pl: SELECT title FROM item ORDER BY title

question.en: Find the name of the user who gives the most reviews.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę użytkownika, który wystawił najwięcej recenzji.

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id GROUP BY T2.u_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id GROUP BY T2.u_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name and id of the item with the highest average rating.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę i identyfikator przedmiotu z najwyższą średnią oceną.

query.en: SELECT T1.title ,  T1.i_id FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id ORDER BY avg(T2.rating) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.title ,  T1.i_id FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id ORDER BY avg(T2.rating) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name and id of the good with the highest average rank.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę i identyfikator towaru o najwyższej średniej randze.

query.en: SELECT T1.title ,  T1.i_id FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id ORDER BY avg(T2.rank) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.title ,  T1.i_id FROM item AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.i_id  =  T2.i_id GROUP BY T2.i_id ORDER BY avg(T2.rank) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: For each user, return the name and the average rating of reviews given by them.
question.pl: Dla każdego użytkownika zwróć nazwę i średnią ocenę wystawionych przez niego recenzji.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  avg(T2.rating) FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id GROUP BY T2.u_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  avg(T2.rating) FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id GROUP BY T2.u_id

question.en: For each user, find their name and the number of reviews written by them.
question.pl: Dla każdego użytkownika znajdź jego nazwę i liczbę napisanych przez niego recenzji.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  count(*) FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id GROUP BY T2.u_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  count(*) FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id GROUP BY T2.u_id

question.en: Find the name of the user who gave the highest rating.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę użytkownika, który przyznał najwyższą ocenę.

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id ORDER BY T2.rating DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN review AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.u_id ORDER BY T2.rating DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name of the source user with the highest average trust score.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę użytkownika źródłowego z najwyższym średnim wynikiem zaufania.

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN trust AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.source_u_id GROUP BY T2.source_u_id ORDER BY avg(trust) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN trust AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.source_u_id GROUP BY T2.source_u_id ORDER BY avg(trust) DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Znajdź nazwę każdego użytkownika docelowego i średni wynik zaufania.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  avg(trust) FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN trust AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.target_u_id GROUP BY T2.target_u_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  avg(trust) FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN trust AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.target_u_id GROUP BY T2.target_u_id

question.en: Find the name of the target user with the lowest trust score.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę użytkownika docelowego z najniższym wynikiem zaufania.

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN trust AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.target_u_id ORDER BY trust LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM useracct AS T1 JOIN trust AS T2 ON T1.u_id  =  T2.target_u_id ORDER BY trust LIMIT 1

question.en: How many players are there?
question.pl: Ilu jest graczy?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM player
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM player

question.en: List the names of players in ascending order of votes.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska graczy w kolejności rosnącej liczby głosów.

query.en: SELECT Player_name FROM player ORDER BY Votes ASC
query.pl: SELECT Player_name FROM player ORDER BY Votes ASC

query.pl: SELECT Gender ,  Occupation FROM player

question.en: List the name and residence for players whose occupation is not "Researcher".
question.pl: Wymień imię i nazwisko oraz miejsce zamieszkania graczy, których zawód nie jest "Badaczem".

query.en: SELECT Player_name ,  residence FROM player WHERE Occupation != "Researcher"
query.pl: SELECT Player_name ,  residence FROM player WHERE Occupation != "Badacz"

question.en: Show the names of sponsors of players whose residence is either "Brandon" or "Birtle".
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska sponsorów graczy, których miejsce zamieszkania to "Brandon" lub "Birtle".

query.en: SELECT Sponsor_name FROM player WHERE Residence  =  "Brandon" OR Residence  =  "Birtle"
query.pl: SELECT Sponsor_name FROM player WHERE Residence  =  "Brandon" OR Residence  =  "Birtle"

question.en: What is the name of the player with the largest number of votes?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się gracz z największą liczbą głosów?

query.en: SELECT Player_name FROM player ORDER BY Votes DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Player_name FROM player ORDER BY Votes DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show different occupations along with the number of players in each occupation.
question.pl: Pokaż różne zawody wraz z liczbą graczy w każdym zawodzie.

query.en: SELECT Occupation ,  COUNT(*) FROM player GROUP BY Occupation
query.pl: SELECT Occupation ,  COUNT(*) FROM player GROUP BY Occupation

question.en: Please show the most common occupation of players.
question.pl: Wskaż najczęstszy zawód wykonywany przez graczy.

query.en: SELECT Occupation FROM player GROUP BY Occupation ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Occupation FROM player GROUP BY Occupation ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the residences that have at least two players.
question.pl: Pokaż rezydencje, w których znajduje się co najmniej dwóch graczy.

query.en: SELECT Residence FROM player GROUP BY Residence HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT Residence FROM player GROUP BY Residence HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the names of players and names of their coaches.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska zawodników i ich trenerów.

query.en: SELECT T3.Player_name ,  T2.coach_name FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Player_name ,  T2.coach_name FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID

question.en: Show the names of players coached by the rank 1 coach.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska zawodników trenowanych przez trenera rangi 1.

query.en: SELECT T3.Player_name FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID WHERE T2.Rank  =  1
query.pl: SELECT T3.Player_name FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID WHERE T2.Rank  =  1

question.en: Show the names and genders of players with a coach starting after 2011.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska i płeć zawodników, których trener zaczynał po 2011 roku.

query.en: SELECT T3.Player_name ,  T3.gender FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID WHERE T1.Starting_year  >  2011
query.pl: SELECT T3.Player_name ,  T3.gender FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID WHERE T1.Starting_year  >  2011

question.en: Show the names of players and names of their coaches in descending order of the votes of players.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska graczy i nazwiska ich trenerów w kolejności malejącej według głosów graczy.

query.en: SELECT T3.Player_name ,  T2.coach_name FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID ORDER BY T3.Votes DESC
query.pl: SELECT T3.Player_name ,  T2.coach_name FROM player_coach AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.Coach_ID  =  T2.Coach_ID JOIN player AS T3 ON T1.Player_ID  =  T3.Player_ID ORDER BY T3.Votes DESC

question.en: List the names of players that do not have coaches.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska zawodników, którzy nie mają trenerów.

query.en: SELECT Player_name FROM player WHERE Player_ID NOT IN (SELECT Player_ID FROM player_coach)
query.pl: SELECT Player_name FROM player WHERE Player_ID NOT IN (SELECT Player_ID FROM player_coach)

question.en: Show the residences that have both a player of gender "M" and a player of gender "F".
question.pl: Pokaż rezydencje, w których znajduje się zarówno gracz płci "M", jak i gracz płci "F".

query.en: SELECT Residence FROM player WHERE gender  =  "M" INTERSECT SELECT Residence FROM player WHERE gender  =  "F"
query.pl: SELECT Residence FROM player WHERE gender  =  "M" INTERSECT SELECT Residence FROM player WHERE gender  =  "F"

question.en: How many coaches does each club has? List the club id, name and the number of coaches.
question.pl: Ilu trenerów ma każdy klub? Wymień identyfikator klubu, nazwę i liczbę trenerów.

query.en: SELECT T1.club_id ,  T1.club_name, count(*) FROM club AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.club_id  =  T2.club_id GROUP BY T1.club_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.club_id ,  T1.club_name, count(*) FROM club AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.club_id  =  T2.club_id GROUP BY T1.club_id

question.en: How many gold medals has the club with the most coaches won?
question.pl: Ile złotych medali zdobył klub z największą liczbą trenerów?

query.en: SELECT T1.club_id ,  T1.gold FROM match_result AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.club_id  =  T2.club_id GROUP BY T1.club_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.club_id ,  T1.gold FROM match_result AS T1 JOIN coach AS T2 ON T1.club_id  =  T2.club_id GROUP BY T1.club_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T2.balance + T3.balance FROM accounts AS T1 JOIN checking AS T2 ON T1.custid  =  T2.custid JOIN savings AS T3 ON T1.custid  =  T3.custid WHERE T3.balance  >  (SELECT avg(balance) FROM savings)

question.en: How many main stream browsers whose market share is at least 5 exist?
question.pl: Ile głównych przeglądarek, których udział w rynku wynosi co najmniej 5, istnieje?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM browser WHERE market_share  >=  5
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM browser WHERE market_share  >=  5

question.en: List the name of browsers in descending order by market share.
question.pl: Wymień nazwy przeglądarek w kolejności malejącej według udziału w rynku.

query.en: SELECT name FROM browser ORDER BY market_share DESC
query.pl: SELECT name FROM browser ORDER BY market_share DESC

question.en: List the ids, names and market shares of all browsers.
question.pl: Wymień identyfikatory, nazwy i udziały w rynku wszystkich przeglądarek.

query.en: SELECT id ,  name ,  market_share FROM browser
query.pl: SELECT id ,  name ,  market_share FROM browser

question.en: What is the maximum, minimum and average market share of the listed browsers?
question.pl: Jaki jest maksymalny, minimalny i średni udział w rynku wymienionych przeglądarek?

query.en: SELECT max(market_share) ,  min(market_share) ,  avg(market_share) FROM browser
query.pl: SELECT max(market_share) ,  min(market_share) ,  avg(market_share) FROM browser

question.en: What is the id and market share of the browser Safari?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i udział w rynku przeglądarki Safari?

query.en: SELECT id ,  market_share FROM browser WHERE name  =  'Safari'
query.pl: SELECT id ,  market_share FROM browser WHERE name  =  'Safari'

question.en: What are the name and os of web client accelerators that do not work with only a 'Broadband' type connection?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się akceleratory klienta sieciowego, które nie działają tylko z połączeniem typu "Szerokopasmowy"?

query.en: SELECT name ,  operating_system FROM web_client_accelerator WHERE CONNECTION != 'Broadband'
query.pl: SELECT name ,  operating_system FROM web_client_accelerator WHERE CONNECTION != 'Szerokopasmowy'

question.en: What is the name of the browser that became compatible with the accelerator 'CProxy' after year 1998 ?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się przeglądarka, która stała się kompatybilna z akceleratorem "CProxy" po 1998 roku?

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM browser AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.browser_id JOIN web_client_accelerator AS T3 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'CProxy' AND T2.compatible_since_year  >  1998
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM browser AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.browser_id JOIN web_client_accelerator AS T3 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'CProxy' AND T2.compatible_since_year  >  1998

question.en: What are the ids and names of the web accelerators that are compatible with two or more browsers?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory i nazwy akceleratorów sieci, które są kompatybilne z dwiema lub więcej przeglądarkami?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.Name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.Name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What is the id and name of the browser that is compatible with the most web accelerators?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i nazwa przeglądarki, która jest kompatybilna z większością akceleratorów internetowych?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM browser AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.browser_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM browser AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.browser_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: When did the web accelerator 'CACHEbox' and browser 'Internet Explorer' become compatible?
question.pl: Kiedy akcelerator internetowy "CACHEbox" i przeglądarka "Internet Explorer" stały się kompatybilne?

query.en: SELECT T1.compatible_since_year FROM accelerator_compatible_browser AS T1 JOIN browser AS T2 ON T1.browser_id  =  T2.id JOIN web_client_accelerator AS T3 ON T1.accelerator_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'CACHEbox' AND T2.name  =  'Internet Explorer'
query.pl: SELECT T1.compatible_since_year FROM accelerator_compatible_browser AS T1 JOIN browser AS T2 ON T1.browser_id  =  T2.id JOIN web_client_accelerator AS T3 ON T1.accelerator_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'CACHEbox' AND T2.name  =  'Internet Explorer'

question.en: How many different kinds of clients are supported by the web clients accelerators?
question.pl: Ile różnych rodzajów klientów jest obsługiwanych przez akceleratory klientów internetowych?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT client) FROM web_client_accelerator
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT client) FROM web_client_accelerator

question.en: How many accelerators are not compatible with the browsers listed ?
question.pl: Ile akceleratorów nie jest kompatybilnych z wymienionymi przeglądarkami?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM web_client_accelerator WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT accelerator_id FROM accelerator_compatible_browser );
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM web_client_accelerator WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT accelerator_id FROM accelerator_compatible_browser );

question.en: What distinct accelerator names are compatible with the browswers that have market share higher than 15?
question.pl: Jakie nazwy akceleratorów są kompatybilne z przeglądarkami, których udział w rynku przekracza 15?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.market_share  >  15;
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.market_share  >  15;

question.en: List the names of the browser that are compatible with both 'CACHEbox' and 'Fasterfox'.
question.pl: Wymień nazwy przeglądarek, które są kompatybilne zarówno z "CACHEbox", jak i "Fasterfox".

query.en: SELECT T3.name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.name  =  'CACHEbox' INTERSECT SELECT T3.name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.name  =  'Fasterfox'
query.pl: SELECT T3.name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.name  =  'CACHEbox' INTERSECT SELECT T3.name FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.name  =  'Fasterfox'

question.en: Show the accelerator names and supporting operating systems that are not compatible with the browser named 'Opera'.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy akceleratorów i obsługiwane systemy operacyjne, które nie są kompatybilne z przeglądarką o nazwie "Opera".

query.en: SELECT name ,  operating_system FROM web_client_accelerator EXCEPT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.operating_system FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'Opera'
query.pl: SELECT name ,  operating_system FROM web_client_accelerator EXCEPT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.operating_system FROM web_client_accelerator AS T1 JOIN accelerator_compatible_browser AS T2 ON T2.accelerator_id  =  T1.id JOIN browser AS T3 ON T2.browser_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.name  =  'Opera'

question.en: Which accelerator name contains substring "Opera"?
question.pl: Która nazwa akceleratora zawiera podciąg "Opera"?

query.en: SELECT name FROM web_client_accelerator WHERE name LIKE "%Opera%"
query.pl: SELECT name FROM web_client_accelerator WHERE name LIKE "%Opera%"

question.en: Find the number of web accelerators used for each Operating system.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę akceleratorów sieciowych używanych w każdym systemie operacyjnym.

query.en: SELECT Operating_system ,  count(*) FROM web_client_accelerator GROUP BY Operating_system
query.pl: SELECT Operating_system ,  count(*) FROM web_client_accelerator GROUP BY Operating_system

question.en: give me names of all compatible browsers and accelerators in the descending order of compatible year
question.pl: podaj mi nazwy wszystkich kompatybilnych przeglądarek i akceleratorów w kolejności malejącej od roku kompatybilności

query.en: SELECT T2.name ,  T3.name FROM accelerator_compatible_browser AS T1 JOIN browser AS T2 ON T1.browser_id  =  T2.id JOIN web_client_accelerator AS T3 ON T1.accelerator_id  =  T3.id ORDER BY T1.compatible_since_year DESC
query.pl: SELECT T2.name ,  T3.name FROM accelerator_compatible_browser AS T1 JOIN browser AS T2 ON T1.browser_id  =  T2.id JOIN web_client_accelerator AS T3 ON T1.accelerator_id  =  T3.id ORDER BY T1.compatible_since_year DESC

question.en: How many donors have endowment for school named "Glenn"?
question.pl: Ilu darczyńców wsparło szkołę o nazwie "Glenn"?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT T1.donator_name) FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T2.school_name  =  "Glenn"
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT T1.donator_name) FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T2.school_name  =  "Glenn"

question.en: List each donator name and the amount of endowment in descending order of the amount of endowment.
question.pl: Wymień imię i nazwisko każdego darczyńcy oraz kwotę darowizny w porządku malejącym według kwoty darowizny.

query.en: SELECT donator_name ,  sum(amount) FROM endowment GROUP BY donator_name ORDER BY sum(amount) DESC
query.pl: SELECT donator_name ,  sum(amount) FROM endowment GROUP BY donator_name ORDER BY sum(amount) DESC

question.en: List the names of the schools without any endowment.

query.pl: SELECT school_name FROM school WHERE school_id NOT IN (SELECT school_id FROM endowment)

question.en: List all the names of schools with an endowment amount smaller than or equal to 10.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie nazwy szkół z kwotą dotacji mniejszą lub równą 10.

query.en: SELECT T2.school_name FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id GROUP BY T1.school_id HAVING sum(T1.amount)  <=  10
query.pl: SELECT T2.school_name FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id GROUP BY T1.school_id HAVING sum(T1.amount)  <=  10

query.pl: SELECT T1.donator_name FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T2.school_name  =  'Glenn' INTERSECT SELECT T1.donator_name FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T2.school_name  =  'Tryton'

query.pl: SELECT donator_name FROM endowment EXCEPT SELECT donator_name FROM endowment WHERE amount  <  9

question.en: Show each school name, its budgeted amount, and invested amount in year 2002 or after.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę każdej szkoły, jej kwotę budżetową i kwotę zainwestowaną w roku 2002 lub później.

query.en: SELECT T2.school_name ,  T1.budgeted ,  T1.invested FROM budget AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T1.year  >=  2002

question.en: What is the total budget amount for school "Glenn" in all years?
question.pl: Jaka jest całkowita kwota budżetu dla szkoły "Glenn" we wszystkich latach?

query.en: SELECT sum(T1.budgeted) FROM budget AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T2.school_name  =  'Glenn'
query.pl: SELECT sum(T1.budgeted) FROM budget AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T2.school_name  =  'Glenn'

question.en: Show the names of schools with a total budget amount greater than 100 or a total endowment greater than 10.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy szkół, których całkowity budżet jest większy niż 100 lub całkowity kapitał żelazny jest większy niż 10.

query.en: SELECT T2.school_name FROM budget AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id JOIN endowment AS T3 ON T2.school_id  =  T3.school_id GROUP BY T2.school_name HAVING sum(T1.budgeted)  >  100 OR sum(T3.amount)  >  10
query.pl: SELECT T2.school_name FROM budget AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id JOIN endowment AS T3 ON T2.school_id  =  T3.school_id GROUP BY T2.school_name HAVING sum(T1.budgeted)  >  100 OR sum(T3.amount)  >  10

question.en: Find the names of schools that have more than one donator with donation amount above 8.5.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy szkół, które mają więcej niż jednego darczyńcę z kwotą darowizny powyżej 8,5.

query.en: SELECT T2.School_name FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T1.amount  >  8.5 GROUP BY T1.school_id HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.School_name FROM endowment AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE T1.amount  >  8.5 GROUP BY T1.school_id HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: Find the number of schools that have more than one donator whose donation amount is less than 8.5.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę szkół, które mają więcej niż jednego darczyńcę, którego kwota darowizny jest mniejsza niż 8,5.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM endowment WHERE amount  >  8.5 GROUP BY school_id HAVING count(*)  >  1)
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM endowment WHERE amount  >  8.5 GROUP BY school_id HAVING count(*)  >  1)

question.en: List the name, IHSAA Football Class, and Mascot of the schools that have more than 6000 of budgeted amount or were founded before 2003, in the order of percent of total invested budget and total budgeted budget.
question.pl: Wymień nazwę, klasę piłkarską IHSAA i maskotkę szkół, które mają ponad 6000 budżetu lub zostały założone przed 2003 rokiem, w kolejności procentowej całkowitego zainwestowanego budżetu i całkowitego budżetu.

query.en: SELECT T1.School_name ,  T1.Mascot ,  T1.IHSAA_Football_Class FROM school AS T1 JOIN budget AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE Budgeted  >  6000 OR YEAR  <  2003 ORDER BY T2.total_budget_percent_invested ,  T2.total_budget_percent_budgeted
query.pl: SELECT T1.School_name ,  T1.Mascot ,  T1.IHSAA_Football_Class FROM school AS T1 JOIN budget AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id WHERE Budgeted  >  6000 OR YEAR  <  2003 ORDER BY T2.total_budget_percent_invested ,  T2.total_budget_percent_budgeted

question.en: How many buildings are there?
question.pl: Ile jest budynków?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM building
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM building

question.en: Show the name, street address, and number of floors for all buildings ordered by the number of floors.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę, adres i liczbę pięter dla wszystkich budynków uporządkowanych według liczby pięter.

query.en: SELECT name ,  street_address ,  floors FROM building ORDER BY floors
query.pl: SELECT name ,  street_address ,  floors FROM building ORDER BY floors

question.en: What is the name of the tallest building?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się najwyższy budynek?

query.en: SELECT name FROM building ORDER BY height_feet DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT name FROM building ORDER BY height_feet DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the average, maximum, and minimum number of floors for all buildings?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia, maksymalna i minimalna liczba pięter dla wszystkich budynków?

query.en: SELECT avg(floors) ,  max(floors) ,  min(floors) FROM building
query.pl: SELECT avg(floors) ,  max(floors) ,  min(floors) FROM building

question.en: Show the number of buildings with a height above the average or a number of floors above the average.
question.pl: Pokaż liczbę budynków o wysokości powyżej średniej lub liczbie pięter powyżej średniej.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM building WHERE height_feet  >  (SELECT avg(height_feet) FROM building) OR floors  >  (SELECT avg(floors) FROM building)
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM building WHERE height_feet  >  (SELECT avg(height_feet) FROM building) OR floors  >  (SELECT avg(floors) FROM building)

question.en: List the names of buildings with at least 200 feet of height and with at least 20 floors.
question.pl: Wymień nazwy budynków o wysokości co najmniej 200 stóp i mających co najmniej 20 pięter.

query.en: SELECT name FROM building WHERE height_feet  >=  200 AND floors  >=  20
query.pl: SELECT name FROM building WHERE height_feet  >=  200 AND floors  >=  20

question.en: Show the names and locations of institutions that are founded after 1990 and have the type "Private".
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy i lokalizacje instytucji, które zostały założone po 1990 roku i mają typ "Prywatny".

query.en: SELECT institution ,  LOCATION FROM institution WHERE founded  >  1990 AND TYPE  =  'Private'
query.pl: SELECT institution ,  LOCATION FROM institution WHERE founded  >  1990 AND TYPE  =  'Prywatny'

question.en: Show institution types, along with the number of institutions and total enrollment for each type.
question.pl: Pokaż typy instytucji wraz z liczbą instytucji i całkowitą liczbą zapisów dla każdego typu.

query.en: SELECT TYPE ,  count(*) ,  sum(enrollment) FROM institution GROUP BY TYPE
query.pl: SELECT TYPE ,  count(*) ,  sum(enrollment) FROM institution GROUP BY TYPE

question.en: Show the institution type with the largest number of institutions.
question.pl: Pokaż typ instytucji z największą liczbą instytucji.

query.en: SELECT TYPE FROM institution GROUP BY TYPE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT TYPE FROM institution GROUP BY TYPE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the institution type with an institution founded after 1990 and an institution with at least 1000 enrollment.
question.pl: Pokaż typ instytucji z instytucją założoną po 1990 roku i instytucją z co najmniej 1000 zapisów.

query.en: SELECT TYPE FROM institution WHERE founded  >  1990 AND enrollment  >=  1000
query.pl: SELECT TYPE FROM institution WHERE founded  >  1990 AND enrollment  >=  1000

question.en: Show the name of buildings that do not have any institution.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy budynków, które nie mają żadnej instytucji.

query.en: SELECT name FROM building WHERE building_id NOT IN (SELECT building_id FROM institution)
query.pl: SELECT name FROM building WHERE building_id NOT IN (SELECT building_id FROM institution)

question.en: Show the names of buildings except for those having an institution founded in 2003.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy budynków z wyjątkiem tych, które mają instytucję założoną w 2003 roku.

query.en: SELECT name FROM building EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM building AS T1 JOIN institution AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.building_id WHERE T2.founded  =  2003
query.pl: SELECT name FROM building EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM building AS T1 JOIN institution AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.building_id WHERE T2.founded  =  2003

question.en: For each building, show the name of the building and the number of institutions in it.
question.pl: Dla każdego budynku podaj jego nazwę i liczbę znajdujących się w nim instytucji.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  count(*) FROM building AS T1 JOIN institution AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.building_id GROUP BY T1.building_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  count(*) FROM building AS T1 JOIN institution AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.building_id GROUP BY T1.building_id

question.en: Show the names and heights of buildings with at least two institutions founded after 1880.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy i wysokości budynków co najmniej dwóch instytucji założonych po 1880 roku.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.height_feet FROM building AS T1 JOIN institution AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.building_id WHERE T2.founded  >  1880 GROUP BY T1.building_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.height_feet FROM building AS T1 JOIN institution AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.building_id WHERE T2.founded  >  1880 GROUP BY T1.building_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show all the distinct institution types.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie różne typy instytucji.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT TYPE FROM institution
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT TYPE FROM institution

question.en: Show institution names along with the number of proteins for each institution.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy instytucji wraz z liczbą białek dla każdej instytucji.

query.en: SELECT T1.institution ,  count(*) FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id GROUP BY T1.institution_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.institution ,  count(*) FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id GROUP BY T1.institution_id

question.en: How many proteins are associated with an institution founded after 1880 or an institution with type "Private"?
question.pl: Ile białek jest powiązanych z instytucją założoną po 1880 roku lub instytucją typu "Prywatna"?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id WHERE T1.founded  >  1880 OR T1.type  =  'Private'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id WHERE T1.founded  >  1880 OR T1.type  =  'Prywatny'

question.en: Show the protein name and the institution name.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę białka i nazwę instytucji.

query.en: SELECT T2.protein_name ,  T1.institution FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.protein_name ,  T1.institution FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id

question.en: How many proteins are associated with an institution in a building with at least 20 floors?
question.pl: Ile białek jest powiązanych z instytucją w budynku o co najmniej 20 piętrach?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id JOIN building AS T3 ON T3.building_id  =  T1.building_id WHERE T3.floors  >=  20
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM institution AS T1 JOIN protein AS T2 ON T1.institution_id  =  T2.institution_id JOIN building AS T3 ON T3.building_id  =  T1.building_id WHERE T3.floors  >=  20

question.en: How many institutions do not have an associated protein in our record?
question.pl: Ile instytucji nie ma powiązanego białka w naszym rejestrze?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM institution WHERE institution_id NOT IN (SELECT institution_id FROM protein)
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM institution WHERE institution_id NOT IN (SELECT institution_id FROM protein)

question.en: Show all the locations where no cinema has capacity over 800.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie lokalizacje, w których żadne kino nie mieści ponad 800 osób.

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema EXCEPT SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  800
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema EXCEPT SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  800

question.en: Show all the locations where some cinemas were opened in both year 2010 and year 2011.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie lokalizacje, w których niektóre kina zostały otwarte zarówno w roku 2010, jak i 2011.

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  =  2010 INTERSECT SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  =  2011
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  =  2010 INTERSECT SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  =  2011

question.en: How many cinema do we have?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM cinema
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM cinema

question.en: Count the number of cinemas.
question.pl: Policz liczbę kin.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM cinema
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM cinema

question.en: Show name, opening year, and capacity for each cinema.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę, rok otwarcia i pojemność każdego kina.

query.en: SELECT name ,  openning_year ,  capacity FROM cinema
query.pl: SELECT name ,  openning_year ,  capacity FROM cinema

question.en: Show the cinema name and location for cinemas with capacity above average.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę kina i lokalizację dla kin o pojemności powyżej średniej.

query.en: SELECT name ,  LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  (SELECT avg(capacity) FROM cinema)
query.pl: SELECT name ,  LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  (SELECT avg(capacity) FROM cinema)

question.en: What are all the locations with a cinema?
question.pl: Jakie są wszystkie lokalizacje z kinem?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT LOCATION FROM cinema
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT LOCATION FROM cinema

question.en: Find the distinct locations that has a cinema.
question.pl: Znajdź różne lokalizacje, w których znajduje się kino.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT LOCATION FROM cinema
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT LOCATION FROM cinema

question.en: Show all the cinema names and opening years in descending order of opening year.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie nazwy kin i lata otwarcia w kolejności malejącej według roku otwarcia.

query.en: SELECT name ,  openning_year FROM cinema ORDER BY openning_year DESC
query.pl: SELECT name ,  openning_year FROM cinema ORDER BY openning_year DESC

question.en: What are the name and location of the cinema with the largest capacity?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się i gdzie znajduje się kino o największej pojemności?

query.en: SELECT name ,  LOCATION FROM cinema ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT name ,  LOCATION FROM cinema ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the average, minimum, and maximum capacity for all the cinemas opened in year 2011 or later.
question.pl: Pokaż średnią, minimalną i maksymalną pojemność dla wszystkich kin otwartych w 2011 roku lub później.

query.en: SELECT avg(capacity) ,  min(capacity) ,  max(capacity) FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  >=  2011
query.pl: SELECT avg(capacity) ,  min(capacity) ,  max(capacity) FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  >=  2011

question.en: Show each location and the number of cinemas there.
question.pl: Pokaż każdą lokalizację i liczbę kin w niej.

query.en: SELECT LOCATION ,  count(*) FROM cinema GROUP BY LOCATION
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION ,  count(*) FROM cinema GROUP BY LOCATION

question.en: What is the location with the most cinemas opened in year 2010 or later?
question.pl: W jakiej lokalizacji znajduje się najwięcej kin otwartych w 2010 roku lub później?

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  >=  2010 GROUP BY LOCATION ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE openning_year  >=  2010 GROUP BY LOCATION ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show all the locations with at least two cinemas with capacity above 300.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie lokalizacje z co najmniej dwoma kinami o pojemności powyżej 300.

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Which locations have 2 or more cinemas with capacity over 300?
question.pl: Które lokalizacje mają 2 lub więcej kin o pojemności ponad 300?

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the title and director for all films.

query.en: SELECT title ,  directed_by FROM film
query.pl: SELECT title ,  directed_by FROM film

query.en: SELECT title ,  directed_by FROM film
query.pl: SELECT title ,  directed_by FROM film

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT directed_by FROM film
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT directed_by FROM film

question.en: List all directors along with the number of films directed by each director.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkich reżyserów wraz z liczbą filmów wyreżyserowanych przez każdego z nich.

query.en: SELECT directed_by ,  count(*) FROM film GROUP BY directed_by
query.pl: SELECT directed_by ,  count(*) FROM film GROUP BY directed_by

question.en: What is total number of show times per dat for each cinema?
question.pl: Jaka jest łączna liczba seansów w ciągu dnia dla każdego kina?

query.en: SELECT T2.name ,  sum(T1.show_times_per_day) FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN cinema AS T2 ON T1.cinema_id  =  T2.cinema_id GROUP BY T1.cinema_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.name ,  sum(T1.show_times_per_day) FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN cinema AS T2 ON T1.cinema_id  =  T2.cinema_id GROUP BY T1.cinema_id

question.en: What are the title and maximum price of each film?
question.pl: Jaki jest tytuł i maksymalna cena każdego filmu?

query.en: SELECT T2.title ,  max(T1.price) FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T1.film_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.title ,  max(T1.price) FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T1.film_id

question.en: Give me the title and highest price for each film.
question.pl: Podaj tytuł i najwyższą cenę każdego filmu.

query.en: SELECT T2.title ,  max(T1.price) FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T1.film_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.title ,  max(T1.price) FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T1.film_id

question.en: Show cinema name, film title, date, and price for each record in schedule.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę kina, tytuł filmu, datę i cenę dla każdego rekordu w harmonogramie.

query.en: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.title ,  T1.date ,  T1.price FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id JOIN cinema AS T3 ON T1.cinema_id  =  T3.cinema_id
query.pl: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.title ,  T1.date ,  T1.price FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id JOIN cinema AS T3 ON T1.cinema_id  =  T3.cinema_id

question.en: What are the title and director of the films without any schedule?
question.pl: Jaki jest tytuł i reżyser filmów bez harmonogramu?

query.en: SELECT title ,  directed_by FROM film WHERE film_id NOT IN (SELECT film_id FROM schedule)
query.pl: SELECT title ,  directed_by FROM film WHERE film_id NOT IN (SELECT film_id FROM schedule)

question.en: Show director with the largest number of show times in total.
question.pl: Reżyser pokazu z największą łączną liczbą pokazów.

query.en: SELECT T2.directed_by FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T2.directed_by ORDER BY sum(T1.show_times_per_day) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.directed_by FROM schedule AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T2.directed_by ORDER BY sum(T1.show_times_per_day) DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Znajdź lokalizacje, w których znajduje się więcej niż jedno kino mogące pomieścić ponad 300 widzów.

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: In which locations are there more than one movie theater with capacity above 300?
question.pl: W których lokalizacjach znajduje się więcej niż jedno kino mogące pomieścić ponad 300 widzów?

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM cinema WHERE capacity  >  300 GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: How many films have the word 'Dummy' in their titles?
question.pl: Ile filmów ma w tytule słowo "Dummy"?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM film WHERE title LIKE "%Dummy%"
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM film WHERE title LIKE "%Dummy%"

question.en: Count the number of films whose title contains the word 'Dummy'.
question.pl: Policz liczbę filmów, których tytuł zawiera słowo "Dummy".

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM film WHERE title LIKE "%Dummy%"
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM film WHERE title LIKE "%Dummy%"

question.en: Are the customers holding coupons with amount 500 bad or good?
question.pl: Czy klienci posiadający kupony na kwotę 500 są źli czy dobrzy?

query.en: SELECT T1.good_or_bad_customer FROM customers AS T1 JOIN discount_coupons AS T2 ON T1.coupon_id  =  T2.coupon_id WHERE T2.coupon_amount  =  500
query.pl: SELECT T1.good_or_bad_customer FROM customers AS T1 JOIN discount_coupons AS T2 ON T1.coupon_id  =  T2.coupon_id WHERE T2.coupon_amount  =  500

question.en: How many bookings did each customer make? List the customer id, first name, and the count.
question.pl: Ile rezerwacji dokonał każdy klient? Podaj identyfikator klienta, imię i nazwisko oraz liczbę rezerwacji.

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_id ,  T1.first_name ,  count(*) FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN bookings AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_id ,  T1.first_name ,  count(*) FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN bookings AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id

question.en: What is the maximum total amount paid by a customer? List the customer id and amount.
question.pl: Jaka jest maksymalna łączna kwota zapłacona przez klienta? Podaj identyfikator klienta i kwotę.

query.en: SELECT customer_id ,  sum(amount_paid) FROM Payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY sum(amount_paid) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT customer_id ,  sum(amount_paid) FROM Payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY sum(amount_paid) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the id and the amount of refund of the booking that incurred the most times of payments?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i kwota zwrotu za rezerwację, za którą zapłacono najwięcej razy?

query.en: SELECT T1.booking_id ,  T1.amount_of_refund FROM Bookings AS T1 JOIN Payments AS T2 ON T1.booking_id  =  T2.booking_id GROUP BY T1.booking_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.booking_id ,  T1.amount_of_refund FROM Bookings AS T1 JOIN Payments AS T2 ON T1.booking_id  =  T2.booking_id GROUP BY T1.booking_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the id of the product that is booked for 3 times?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator produktu zarezerwowanego 3 razy?

query.en: SELECT product_id FROM products_booked GROUP BY product_id HAVING count(*)  =  3
query.pl: SELECT product_id FROM products_booked GROUP BY product_id HAVING count(*)  =  3

question.en: What is the product description of the product booked with an amount of 102.76?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis produktu zaksięgowanego na kwotę 102,76?

query.en: SELECT T2.product_description FROM products_booked AS T1 JOIN products_for_hire AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id WHERE T1.booked_amount  =  102.76
query.pl: SELECT T2.product_description FROM products_booked AS T1 JOIN products_for_hire AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id WHERE T1.booked_amount  =  102.76

question.en: What are the start date and end date of the booking that has booked the product named 'Book collection A'?
question.pl: Jaka jest data początkowa i końcowa rezerwacji, w ramach której zarezerwowano produkt o nazwie "Zarezerwuj kolekcję A"?

query.en: SELECT T3.booking_start_date ,   T3.booking_end_date FROM Products_for_hire AS T1 JOIN products_booked AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id JOIN bookings AS T3 ON T2.booking_id  =  T3.booking_id WHERE T1.product_name  =  'Book collection A'
query.pl: SELECT T3.booking_start_date ,   T3.booking_end_date FROM Products_for_hire AS T1 JOIN products_booked AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id JOIN bookings AS T3 ON T2.booking_id  =  T3.booking_id WHERE T1.product_name  =  'Kolekcja książek A'

question.en: What are the names of products whose availability equals to 1?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy produktów, których dostępność jest równa 1?

query.en: SELECT T2.product_name FROM view_product_availability AS T1 JOIN products_for_hire AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id WHERE T1.available_yn  =  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.product_name FROM view_product_availability AS T1 JOIN products_for_hire AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id WHERE T1.available_yn  =  1

question.en: How many different product types are there?
question.pl: Ile jest różnych typów produktów?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT product_type_code) FROM products_for_hire
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT product_type_code) FROM products_for_hire

question.en: What are the first name, last name, and gender of all the good customers? Order by their last name.
question.pl: Jakie są imiona, nazwiska i płeć wszystkich dobrych klientów? Uporządkuj według nazwiska.

query.en: SELECT first_name ,  last_name ,  gender_mf FROM customers WHERE good_or_bad_customer  =  'good' ORDER BY last_name
query.pl: SELECT first_name ,  last_name ,  gender_mf FROM customers WHERE good_or_bad_customer  =  'dobry' ORDER BY last_name

question.en: What is the average amount due for all the payments?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia kwota należna za wszystkie płatności?

query.en: SELECT avg(amount_due) FROM payments

question.en: How many products are never booked with amount higher than 200?

query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Products_for_hire WHERE product_id NOT IN ( SELECT product_id FROM products_booked WHERE booked_amount  >  200 )

question.en: What are the coupon amount of the coupons owned by both good and bad customers?
question.pl: Jakie są kwoty kuponów posiadanych zarówno przez dobrych, jak i złych klientów?

query.en: SELECT T1.coupon_amount FROM Discount_Coupons AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.coupon_id  =  T2.coupon_id WHERE T2.good_or_bad_customer  =  'good' INTERSECT SELECT T1.coupon_amount FROM Discount_Coupons AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.coupon_id  =  T2.coupon_id WHERE T2.good_or_bad_customer  =  'bad'
query.pl: SELECT T1.coupon_amount FROM Discount_Coupons AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.coupon_id  =  T2.coupon_id WHERE T2.good_or_bad_customer  =  'dobry' INTERSECT SELECT T1.coupon_amount FROM Discount_Coupons AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.coupon_id  =  T2.coupon_id WHERE T2.good_or_bad_customer  =  'zły'

question.en: What are the payment date of the payment with amount paid higher than 300 or with payment type is 'Check'

question.en: Show the names of phones and the districts of markets they are on.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.District FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN market AS T2 ON T1.Market_ID  =  T2.Market_ID JOIN phone AS T3 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T3.Phone_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.District FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN market AS T2 ON T1.Market_ID  =  T2.Market_ID JOIN phone AS T3 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T3.Phone_ID

query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.District FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN market AS T2 ON T1.Market_ID  =  T2.Market_ID JOIN phone AS T3 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T3.Phone_ID ORDER BY T2.Ranking

question.en: Show the names of phones that are on market with number of shops greater than 50.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN market AS T2 ON T1.Market_ID  =  T2.Market_ID JOIN phone AS T3 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T3.Phone_ID WHERE T2.Num_of_shops  >  50
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN market AS T2 ON T1.Market_ID  =  T2.Market_ID JOIN phone AS T3 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T3.Phone_ID WHERE T2.Num_of_shops  >  50

question.en: For each phone, show its names and total number of stocks.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  sum(T1.Num_of_stock) FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T2.Phone_ID GROUP BY T2.Name
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  sum(T1.Num_of_stock) FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T2.Phone_ID GROUP BY T2.Name

question.en: Show the names of phones that have total number of stocks bigger than 2000, in descending order of the total number of stocks.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T2.Phone_ID GROUP BY T2.Name HAVING sum(T1.Num_of_stock)  >=  2000 ORDER BY sum(T1.Num_of_stock) DESC
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM phone_market AS T1 JOIN phone AS T2 ON T1.Phone_ID  =  T2.Phone_ID GROUP BY T2.Name HAVING sum(T1.Num_of_stock)  >=  2000 ORDER BY sum(T1.Num_of_stock) DESC

question.en: find the rank, company names, market values of the companies in the banking industry order by their sales and profits in billion.

question.en: find the location and Representative name of the gas stations owned by the companies with top 3 Asset amounts.
