query.en: SELECT T3.location ,  T3.Representative_Name FROM station_company AS T1 JOIN company AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.company_id JOIN gas_station AS T3 ON T1.station_id  =  T3.station_id ORDER BY T2.Assets_billion DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT T3.location ,  T3.Representative_Name FROM station_company AS T1 JOIN company AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.company_id JOIN gas_station AS T3 ON T1.station_id  =  T3.station_id ORDER BY T2.Assets_billion DESC LIMIT 3

query.en: SELECT T3.location ,  T3.Representative_Name FROM station_company AS T1 JOIN company AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.company_id JOIN gas_station AS T3 ON T1.station_id  =  T3.station_id ORDER BY T2.Assets_billion DESC LIMIT 3

question.en: How many Annual Meeting events happened in the United Kingdom region?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM region AS t1 JOIN party AS t2 ON t1.region_id  =  t2.region_id JOIN party_events AS t3 ON t2.party_id  =  t3.party_id WHERE t1.region_name  =  "United Kingdom" AND t3.Event_Name  =  "Annaual Meeting"
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM region AS t1 JOIN party AS t2 ON t1.region_id  =  t2.region_id JOIN party_events AS t3 ON t2.party_id  =  t3.party_id WHERE t1.region_name  =  "Wielka Brytania" AND t3.Event_Name  =  "Spotkanie roczne"

query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM region AS t1 JOIN party AS t2 ON t1.region_id  =  t2.region_id JOIN party_events AS t3 ON t2.party_id  =  t3.party_id WHERE t1.region_name  =  "Wielka Brytania" AND t3.Event_Name  =  "Spotkanie roczne"

question.en: Show the names of pilots and models of aircrafts they have flied with.

query.en: SELECT T3.Pilot_name ,  T2.Model FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN pilot AS T3 ON T1.Pilot_ID  =  T3.Pilot_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Pilot_name ,  T2.Model FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN pilot AS T3 ON T1.Pilot_ID  =  T3.Pilot_ID

query.en: SELECT T3.Pilot_name ,  T2.Fleet_Series FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN pilot AS T3 ON T1.Pilot_ID  =  T3.Pilot_ID ORDER BY T3.Rank
query.pl: SELECT T3.Pilot_name ,  T2.Fleet_Series FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN pilot AS T3 ON T1.Pilot_ID  =  T3.Pilot_ID ORDER BY T3.Rank

question.en: Show the fleet series of the aircrafts flied by pilots younger than 34
question.pl: Pokaż serię floty samolotów pilotowanych przez pilotów w wieku poniżej 34 lat.

query.en: SELECT T2.Fleet_Series FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN pilot AS T3 ON T1.Pilot_ID  =  T3.Pilot_ID WHERE T3.Age  <  34
query.pl: SELECT T2.Fleet_Series FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN pilot AS T3 ON T1.Pilot_ID  =  T3.Pilot_ID WHERE T3.Age  <  34

question.en: Show the names of pilots and the number of records they have.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska pilotów i liczbę posiadanych przez nich rekordów.

query.en: SELECT T2.Pilot_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN pilot AS T2 ON T1.pilot_ID  =  T2.pilot_ID GROUP BY T2.Pilot_name
query.pl: SELECT T2.Pilot_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN pilot AS T2 ON T1.pilot_ID  =  T2.pilot_ID GROUP BY T2.Pilot_name

question.en: Show names of pilots that have more than one record.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska pilotów, którzy mają więcej niż jeden rekord.

query.en: SELECT T2.Pilot_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN pilot AS T2 ON T1.pilot_ID  =  T2.pilot_ID GROUP BY T2.Pilot_name HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Pilot_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM pilot_record AS T1 JOIN pilot AS T2 ON T1.pilot_ID  =  T2.pilot_ID GROUP BY T2.Pilot_name HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

question.en: List the names of pilots that do not have any record.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska pilotów, którzy nie mają żadnego rekordu.

query.en: SELECT Pilot_name FROM pilot WHERE Pilot_ID NOT IN (SELECT Pilot_ID FROM pilot_record)
query.pl: SELECT Pilot_name FROM pilot WHERE Pilot_ID NOT IN (SELECT Pilot_ID FROM pilot_record)

question.en: What document status codes do we have?
question.pl: Jakie mamy kody statusu dokumentów?

query.en: SELECT document_status_code FROM Ref_Document_Status;
query.pl: SELECT document_status_code FROM Ref_Document_Status;

question.en: What is the description of document status code 'working'?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis kodu statusu dokumentu "działa"?

query.en: SELECT document_status_description FROM Ref_Document_Status WHERE document_status_code = "working";
query.pl: SELECT document_status_description FROM Ref_Document_Status WHERE document_status_code = "praca";

question.en: What document type codes do we have?
question.pl: Jakie mamy kody typów dokumentów?

query.en: SELECT document_type_code FROM Ref_Document_Types;
query.pl: SELECT document_type_code FROM Ref_Document_Types;

question.en: What is the description of document type 'Paper'?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis typu dokumentu "Papier"?

query.en: SELECT document_type_description FROM Ref_Document_Types WHERE document_type_code = "Paper";
query.pl: SELECT document_type_description FROM Ref_Document_Types WHERE document_type_code = "Papier";

question.en: What are the shipping agent names?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy agentów spedycyjnych?

query.en: SELECT shipping_agent_name FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents;
query.pl: SELECT shipping_agent_name FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents;

question.en: What is the shipping agent code of shipping agent UPS?
question.pl: Jaki jest kod spedytora UPS?

query.en: SELECT shipping_agent_code FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents WHERE shipping_agent_name = "UPS";
query.pl: SELECT shipping_agent_code FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents WHERE shipping_agent_name = "UPS";

question.en: What are all role codes?
question.pl: Czym są wszystkie kody ról?

query.en: SELECT role_code FROM ROLES;
query.pl: SELECT role_code FROM ROLES;

question.en: What is the description of role code ED?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis kodu roli ED?

query.en: SELECT role_description FROM ROLES WHERE role_code = "ED";
query.pl: SELECT role_description FROM ROLES WHERE role_code = "ED";

question.en: How many employees do we have?
question.pl: Ilu mamy pracowników?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Employees;
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Employees;

question.en: What is the role of the employee named Koby?
question.pl: Jaka jest rola pracownika o imieniu Koby?

query.en: SELECT T1.role_description FROM ROLES AS T1 JOIN Employees AS T2 ON T1.role_code = T2.role_code WHERE T2.employee_name = "Koby";
query.pl: SELECT T1.role_description FROM ROLES AS T1 JOIN Employees AS T2 ON T1.role_code = T2.role_code WHERE T2.employee_name = "Koby";

question.en: List all document ids and receipt dates of documents.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie identyfikatory dokumentów i daty ich otrzymania.

query.en: SELECT document_id ,  receipt_date FROM Documents;
query.pl: SELECT document_id ,  receipt_date FROM Documents;

question.en: How many employees does each role have? List role description, id and number of employees.
question.pl: Ilu pracowników ma każda rola? Wymień opis roli, identyfikator i liczbę pracowników.

query.en: SELECT T1.role_description ,  T2.role_code ,  count(*) FROM ROLES AS T1 JOIN Employees AS T2 ON T1.role_code = T2.role_code GROUP BY T2.role_code;
query.pl: SELECT T1.role_description ,  T2.role_code ,  count(*) FROM ROLES AS T1 JOIN Employees AS T2 ON T1.role_code = T2.role_code GROUP BY T2.role_code;

question.en: List roles that have more than one employee. List the role description and number of employees.
question.pl: Wymień role, które mają więcej niż jednego pracownika. Wymień opis roli i liczbę pracowników.

query.en: SELECT Roles.role_description , count(Employees.employee_id) FROM ROLES JOIN Employees ON Employees.role_code = Roles.role_code GROUP BY Employees.role_code HAVING count(Employees.employee_id)  >  1;
query.pl: SELECT Roles.role_description , count(Employees.employee_id) FROM ROLES JOIN Employees ON Employees.role_code = Roles.role_code GROUP BY Employees.role_code HAVING count(Employees.employee_id)  >  1;

question.en: What is the document status description of the document with id 1?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis statusu dokumentu o identyfikatorze 1?

query.en: SELECT Ref_Document_Status.document_status_description FROM Ref_Document_Status JOIN Documents ON Documents.document_status_code = Ref_Document_Status.document_status_code WHERE Documents.document_id = 1;
query.pl: SELECT Ref_Document_Status.document_status_description FROM Ref_Document_Status JOIN Documents ON Documents.document_status_code = Ref_Document_Status.document_status_code WHERE Documents.document_id = 1;

question.en: How many documents have the status code done?
question.pl: W ilu dokumentach wykonano kod statusu?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code = "done";
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code = "zrobione";

question.en: List the document type code for the document with the id 2.
question.pl: Wymień kod typu dokumentu dla dokumentu o identyfikatorze 2.

query.en: SELECT document_type_code FROM Documents WHERE document_id = 2;
query.pl: SELECT document_type_code FROM Documents WHERE document_id = 2;

question.en: List the document ids for any documents with the status code done and the type code paper.
question.pl: Wyświetl identyfikatory wszystkich dokumentów z kodem statusu wykonano i kodem typu papier.

query.en: SELECT document_id FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code = "done" AND document_type_code = "Paper";
query.pl: SELECT document_id FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code = "zrobione" AND document_type_code = "Papier";

question.en: What is the name of the shipping agent of the document with id 2?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się agent wysyłkowy dokumentu o identyfikatorze 2?

query.en: SELECT Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents JOIN Documents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Documents.document_id = 2;
query.pl: SELECT Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents JOIN Documents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Documents.document_id = 2;

question.en: How many documents were shipped by USPS?
question.pl: Ile dokumentów zostało wysłanych przez USPS?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents JOIN Documents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name = "USPS";
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents JOIN Documents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name = "USPS";

question.en: Which shipping agent shipped the most documents? List the shipping agent name and the number of documents.
question.pl: Który spedytor wysłał najwięcej dokumentów? Podaj nazwę spedytora i liczbę dokumentów.

query.en: SELECT Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name , count(Documents.document_id) FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents JOIN Documents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code GROUP BY Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code ORDER BY count(Documents.document_id) DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name , count(Documents.document_id) FROM Ref_Shipping_Agents JOIN Documents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code GROUP BY Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code ORDER BY count(Documents.document_id) DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: What is the receipt date of the document with id 3?
question.pl: Jaka jest data otrzymania dokumentu o identyfikatorze 3?

query.en: SELECT receipt_date FROM Documents WHERE document_id = 3;
query.pl: SELECT receipt_date FROM Documents WHERE document_id = 3;

question.en: What address was the document with id 4 mailed to?
question.pl: Na jaki adres wysłano dokument z identyfikatorem 4?

query.en: SELECT Addresses.address_details FROM Addresses JOIN Documents_Mailed ON Documents_Mailed.mailed_to_address_id = Addresses.address_id WHERE document_id = 4;
query.pl: SELECT Addresses.address_details FROM Addresses JOIN Documents_Mailed ON Documents_Mailed.mailed_to_address_id = Addresses.address_id WHERE document_id = 4;

question.en: What is the mail date of the document with id 7?
question.pl: Jaka jest data wysłania dokumentu o identyfikatorze 7?

query.en: SELECT mailing_date FROM Documents_Mailed WHERE document_id = 7;
query.pl: SELECT mailing_date FROM Documents_Mailed WHERE document_id = 7;

question.en: List the document ids of documents with the status done and type Paper, which not shipped by the shipping agent named USPS.
question.pl: Wyświetl identyfikatory dokumentów o statusie "Wykonane" i typie "Papier", które nie zostały wysłane przez firmę kurierską USPS.

query.en: SELECT document_id FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code  =  "done" AND document_type_code = "Paper" EXCEPT SELECT document_id FROM Documents JOIN Ref_Shipping_Agents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name = "USPS";
query.pl: SELECT document_id FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code  =  "zrobione" AND document_type_code = "Papier" EXCEPT SELECT document_id FROM Documents JOIN Ref_Shipping_Agents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name = "USPS";

question.en: List document id of documents status is done and document type is Paper and the document is shipped by shipping agent named USPS.
question.pl: Zwróć listę identyfikatorów dokumentów jest zakończona, typ dokumentu to Paper, a dokument jest wysyłany przez agenta spedycyjnego o nazwie USPS.

query.en: SELECT document_id FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code  =  "done" AND document_type_code = "Paper" INTERSECT SELECT document_id FROM Documents JOIN Ref_Shipping_Agents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name = "USPS";
query.pl: SELECT document_id FROM Documents WHERE document_status_code  =  "zrobione" AND document_type_code = "Papier" INTERSECT SELECT document_id FROM Documents JOIN Ref_Shipping_Agents ON Documents.shipping_agent_code = Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_code WHERE Ref_Shipping_Agents.shipping_agent_name = "USPS";

question.en: What is draft detail of the document with id 7?
question.pl: Jaka jest wersja robocza dokumentu o identyfikatorze 7?

query.en: SELECT draft_details FROM Document_Drafts WHERE document_id = 7;
query.pl: SELECT draft_details FROM Document_Drafts WHERE document_id = 7;

question.en: How many draft copies does the document with id 2 have?
question.pl: Ile kopii roboczych ma dokument o identyfikatorze 2?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Draft_Copies WHERE document_id = 2;
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Draft_Copies WHERE document_id = 2;

question.en: Which document has the most draft copies? List its document id and number of draft copies.
question.pl: Który dokument ma najwięcej kopii roboczych? Wymień identyfikator dokumentu i liczbę kopii roboczych.

query.en: SELECT document_id , count(copy_number) FROM Draft_Copies GROUP BY document_id ORDER BY count(copy_number) DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT document_id , count(copy_number) FROM Draft_Copies GROUP BY document_id ORDER BY count(copy_number) DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: Which documents have more than 1 draft copies? List document id and number of draft copies.
question.pl: Które dokumenty mają więcej niż 1 kopię roboczą? Wymień identyfikator dokumentu i liczbę kopii roboczych.

query.en: SELECT document_id , count(*) FROM Draft_Copies GROUP BY document_id HAVING count(*)  >  1;
query.pl: SELECT document_id , count(*) FROM Draft_Copies GROUP BY document_id HAVING count(*)  >  1;

question.en: List all employees in the circulation history of the document with id 1. List the employee's name.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkich pracowników w historii obiegu dokumentu z identyfikatorem 1. Wymień imię i nazwisko pracownika.

query.en: SELECT Employees.employee_name FROM Employees JOIN Circulation_History ON Circulation_History.employee_id = Employees.employee_id WHERE Circulation_History.document_id = 1;
query.pl: SELECT Employees.employee_name FROM Employees JOIN Circulation_History ON Circulation_History.employee_id = Employees.employee_id WHERE Circulation_History.document_id = 1;

question.en: List the employees who have not showed up in any circulation history of documents. List the employee's name.
question.pl: Wymień pracowników, którzy nie pojawili się w żadnej historii obiegu dokumentów. Wymień imię i nazwisko pracownika.

query.en: SELECT employee_name FROM Employees EXCEPT SELECT Employees.employee_name FROM Employees JOIN Circulation_History ON Circulation_History.employee_id = Employees.employee_id
query.pl: SELECT employee_name FROM Employees EXCEPT SELECT Employees.employee_name FROM Employees JOIN Circulation_History ON Circulation_History.employee_id = Employees.employee_id

question.en: Which employee has showed up in most circulation history documents. List the employee's name and the number of drafts and copies.
question.pl: Który pracownik pojawił się w większości dokumentów historii obiegu. Wymień imię i nazwisko pracownika oraz liczbę wersji roboczych i kopii.

query.en: SELECT Employees.employee_name , count(*) FROM Employees JOIN Circulation_History ON Circulation_History.employee_id = Employees.employee_id GROUP BY Circulation_History.document_id , Circulation_History.draft_number , Circulation_History.copy_number ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT Employees.employee_name , count(*) FROM Employees JOIN Circulation_History ON Circulation_History.employee_id = Employees.employee_id GROUP BY Circulation_History.document_id , Circulation_History.draft_number , Circulation_History.copy_number ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: For each document, list the number of employees who have showed up in the circulation history of that document. List the document ids and number of employees.
question.pl: Dla każdego dokumentu podaj liczbę pracowników, którzy pojawili się w historii obiegu tego dokumentu. Wymień identyfikatory dokumentów i liczbę pracowników.

query.en: SELECT document_id ,  count(DISTINCT employee_id) FROM Circulation_History GROUP BY document_id;
query.pl: SELECT document_id ,  count(DISTINCT employee_id) FROM Circulation_History GROUP BY document_id;

question.en: List all department names ordered by their starting date.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie nazwy działów uporządkowane według daty rozpoczęcia.

query.en: SELECT dname FROM department ORDER BY mgr_start_date
query.pl: SELECT dname FROM department ORDER BY mgr_start_date

question.en: find all dependent names who have a spouse relation with some employee.
question.pl: znajdź wszystkie nazwiska osób zależnych, które mają relację współmałżonka z jakimś pracownikiem.

query.en: SELECT Dependent_name FROM dependent WHERE relationship  =  'Spouse'
query.pl: SELECT Dependent_name FROM dependent WHERE relationship  =  'Współmałżonek'

question.en: how many female dependents are there?
question.pl: Ile kobiet jest na Twoim utrzymaniu?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM dependent WHERE sex  =  'F'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM dependent WHERE sex  =  'F'

question.en: Find the names of departments that are located in Houston.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy działów, które znajdują się w Houston.

query.en: SELECT t1.dname FROM department AS t1 JOIN dept_locations AS t2 ON t1.dnumber  =  t2.dnumber WHERE t2.dlocation  =  'Houston'
query.pl: SELECT t1.dname FROM department AS t1 JOIN dept_locations AS t2 ON t1.dnumber  =  t2.dnumber WHERE t2.dlocation  =  'Houston'

question.en: Return the first names and last names of employees who earn more than 30000 in salary.
question.pl: Zwróć imiona i nazwiska pracowników, którzy zarabiają więcej niż 30000.

query.en: SELECT fname ,  lname FROM employee WHERE salary  >  30000
query.pl: SELECT fname ,  lname FROM employee WHERE salary  >  30000

question.en: Find the number of employees of each gender whose salary is lower than 50000.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę pracowników każdej płci, których wynagrodzenie jest niższe niż 50000.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  sex FROM employee WHERE salary  <  50000 GROUP BY sex
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  sex FROM employee WHERE salary  <  50000 GROUP BY sex

question.en: list the first and last names, and the addresses of all employees in the ascending order of their birth date.
question.pl: podaj imiona i nazwiska oraz adresy wszystkich pracowników w porządku rosnącym według daty urodzenia.

query.en: SELECT fname ,  lname ,  address FROM employee ORDER BY Bdate
query.pl: SELECT fname ,  lname ,  address FROM employee ORDER BY Bdate

question.en: what are the event details of the services that have the type code 'Marriage'?
question.pl: Jakie są szczegóły zdarzenia dla usług z kodem typu "Małżeństwo"?

query.en: SELECT T1.event_details FROM EVENTS AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_ID  =  T2.Service_ID WHERE T2.Service_Type_Code  =  'Marriage'
query.pl: SELECT T1.event_details FROM EVENTS AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_ID  =  T2.Service_ID WHERE T2.Service_Type_Code  =  'Małżeństwo'

question.en: What are the ids and details of events that have more than one participants?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory i szczegóły wydarzeń, które mają więcej niż jednego uczestnika?

query.en: SELECT T1.event_id ,  T1.event_details FROM EVENTS AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID GROUP BY T1.Event_ID HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.event_id ,  T1.event_details FROM EVENTS AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID GROUP BY T1.Event_ID HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: How many events have each participants attended? List the participant id, type and the number.
question.pl: W ilu wydarzeniach uczestniczyli poszczególni uczestnicy? Wymień identyfikator, typ i liczbę uczestników.

query.en: SELECT T1.Participant_ID ,  T1.Participant_Type_Code ,  count(*) FROM Participants AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID GROUP BY T1.Participant_ID
query.pl: SELECT T1.Participant_ID ,  T1.Participant_Type_Code ,  count(*) FROM Participants AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID GROUP BY T1.Participant_ID

question.en: What are all the the participant ids, type code and details?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory uczestników, kod typu i szczegóły?

query.en: SELECT Participant_ID ,  Participant_Type_Code ,  Participant_Details FROM  Participants
query.pl: SELECT Participant_ID ,  Participant_Type_Code ,  Participant_Details FROM  Participants

question.en: How many participants belong to the type 'Organizer'?
question.pl: Ilu uczestników należy do typu "Organizator"?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM participants WHERE participant_type_code  =  'Organizer'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM participants WHERE participant_type_code  =  'Organizator'

question.en: List the type of the services in alphabetical order.
question.pl: Wymień rodzaj usług w kolejności alfabetycznej.

query.en: SELECT service_type_code FROM services ORDER BY service_type_code
query.pl: SELECT service_type_code FROM services ORDER BY service_type_code

question.en: List the service id and details for the events.
question.pl: Wyświetl identyfikator usługi i szczegóły zdarzeń.

query.en: SELECT service_id ,  event_details FROM EVENTS
query.pl: SELECT service_id ,  event_details FROM EVENTS

question.en: How many events had participants whose details had the substring 'Dr.'
question.pl: Ile wydarzeń miało uczestników, których dane zawierały podciąg "Dr."?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM participants AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID WHERE T1.participant_details LIKE '%Dr.%'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM participants AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID WHERE T1.participant_details LIKE '%Dr.%'

question.en: What is the most common participant type?
question.pl: Jaki jest najczęstszy typ uczestnika?

query.en: SELECT participant_type_code FROM participants GROUP BY participant_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT participant_type_code FROM participants GROUP BY participant_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which service id and type has the least number of participants?
question.pl: Który identyfikator i typ usługi ma najmniejszą liczbę uczestników?

query.en: SELECT T3.service_id ,  T4.Service_Type_Code FROM participants AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID JOIN EVENTS AS T3 ON T2.Event_ID   =  T3.Event_ID JOIN services AS T4 ON T3.service_id  =  T4.service_id GROUP BY T3.service_id ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T3.service_id ,  T4.Service_Type_Code FROM participants AS T1 JOIN Participants_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID JOIN EVENTS AS T3 ON T2.Event_ID   =  T3.Event_ID JOIN services AS T4 ON T3.service_id  =  T4.service_id GROUP BY T3.service_id ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the id of the event with the most participants?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator wydarzenia z największą liczbą uczestników?

query.en: SELECT Event_ID FROM Participants_in_Events GROUP BY Event_ID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Event_ID FROM Participants_in_Events GROUP BY Event_ID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which events id does not have any participant with detail 'Kenyatta Kuhn'?
question.pl: Który identyfikator wydarzenia nie ma żadnego uczestnika z danymi "Kenyatta Kuhn"?

query.en: SELECT event_id FROM EVENTS EXCEPT SELECT T1.event_id FROM Participants_in_Events AS T1 JOIN Participants AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID WHERE Participant_Details  =  'Kenyatta Kuhn'
query.pl: SELECT event_id FROM EVENTS EXCEPT SELECT T1.event_id FROM Participants_in_Events AS T1 JOIN Participants AS T2 ON T1.Participant_ID  =  T2.Participant_ID WHERE Participant_Details  =  'Kenyatta Kuhn'

question.en: Which services type had both successful and failure event details?
question.pl: Który typ usług zawierał szczegóły zarówno udanego, jak i nieudanego zdarzenia?

query.en: SELECT T1.service_type_code FROM services AS T1 JOIN EVENTS AS T2 ON T1.service_id  =  T2.service_id WHERE T2.event_details  =  'Success' INTERSECT SELECT T1.service_type_code FROM services AS T1 JOIN EVENTS AS T2 ON T1.service_id  =  T2.service_id WHERE T2.event_details  =  'Fail'
query.pl: SELECT T1.service_type_code FROM services AS T1 JOIN EVENTS AS T2 ON T1.service_id  =  T2.service_id WHERE T2.event_details  =  'Sukces' INTERSECT SELECT T1.service_type_code FROM services AS T1 JOIN EVENTS AS T2 ON T1.service_id  =  T2.service_id WHERE T2.event_details  =  'Niepowodzenie'

question.en: How many events did not have any participants?
question.pl: W ilu wydarzeniach nie wziął udziału żaden uczestnik?

question.en: What is the id, forname and surname of the driver who had the first position in terms of laptime at least twice?

query.en: SELECT T1.driverid ,  T1.forename ,  T1.surname FROM drivers AS T1 JOIN laptimes AS T2 ON T1.driverid = T2.driverid WHERE POSITION  =  '1' GROUP BY T1.driverid HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Find the id and forenames of drivers who participated both the races with name Australian Grand Prix and the races with name Chinese Grand Prix?

query.en: SELECT T2.driverid ,  T3.forename FROM races AS T1 JOIN results AS T2 ON T1.raceid = T2.raceid JOIN drivers AS T3 ON T2.driverid  =  T3.driverid WHERE T1.name = "Australian Grand Prix" INTERSECT SELECT T2.driverid ,  T3.forename FROM races AS T1 JOIN results AS T2 ON T1.raceid = T2.raceid JOIN drivers AS T3 ON T2.driverid  =  T3.driverid WHERE T1.name = "Chinese Grand Prix"

question.en: What are the drivers' first, last names and id who had more than 8 pit stops or participated in more than 5 race results?

query.en: SELECT T1.forename ,  T1.surname ,  T1.driverid FROM drivers AS T1 JOIN pitstops AS T2 ON T1.driverid  =  T2.driverid GROUP BY T1.driverid HAVING count(*)  >  8 UNION SELECT T1.forename ,  T1.surname ,  T1.driverid FROM drivers AS T1 JOIN results AS T2 ON T1.driverid  =  T2.driverid GROUP BY T1.driverid HAVING count(*)  >  5

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Machine_series FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Machine_series FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID ORDER BY T2.quality_rank
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID ORDER BY T2.quality_rank

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID ORDER BY T2.quality_rank
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID ORDER BY T2.quality_rank

question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska techników przydzielonych do naprawy maszyn o wartości punktowej powyżej 70.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID WHERE T2.value_points  >  70
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID WHERE T2.value_points  >  70

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID WHERE T2.value_points  >  70
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM repair_assignment AS T1 JOIN machine AS T2 ON T1.machine_id  =  T2.machine_id JOIN technician AS T3 ON T1.technician_ID  =  T3.technician_ID WHERE T2.value_points  >  70

question.en: What is the country that has the most perpetrators?

question.en: What are the countries that have at least two perpetrators?

question.en: List the names of perpetrators in descending order of the year.

query.en: SELECT T1.Name FROM people AS T1 JOIN perpetrator AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID ORDER BY T2.Year DESC

question.en: List the names of people that are not perpetrators.

query.en: SELECT Name FROM people WHERE People_ID NOT IN (SELECT People_ID FROM perpetrator)

question.en: Show the countries that have both perpetrators with injures more than 50 and perpetrators with injures smaller than 20.

query.en: SELECT Country FROM perpetrator WHERE Injured  >  50 INTERSECT SELECT Country FROM perpetrator WHERE Injured  <  20

question.en: what are the details of the cmi masters that have the cross reference code 'Tax'?
question.pl: Jakie są szczegóły list głównych cmi, które mają kod referencyjny "Podatek"?

query.en: SELECT T1.cmi_details FROM Customer_Master_Index AS T1 JOIN CMI_Cross_References AS T2 ON T1.master_customer_id  =  T2.master_customer_id WHERE T2.source_system_code  =  'Tax'
query.pl: SELECT T1.cmi_details FROM Customer_Master_Index AS T1 JOIN CMI_Cross_References AS T2 ON T1.master_customer_id  =  T2.master_customer_id WHERE T2.source_system_code  =  'Podatek'

question.en: What is the cmi cross reference id that is related to at least one council tax entry? List the cross reference id and source system code.
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator odsyłacza cmi, który jest powiązany z co najmniej jednym wpisem dotyczącym podatku lokalnego? Wymień identyfikator odnośnika i kod systemu źródłowego.

query.en: SELECT T1.cmi_cross_ref_id ,  T1.source_system_code FROM CMI_Cross_References AS T1 JOIN Council_Tax AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id GROUP BY T1.cmi_cross_ref_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.cmi_cross_ref_id ,  T1.source_system_code FROM CMI_Cross_References AS T1 JOIN Council_Tax AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id GROUP BY T1.cmi_cross_ref_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

question.en: How many business rates are related to each cmi cross reference? List cross reference id, master customer id and the n
question.pl: Ile stawek biznesowych jest powiązanych z każdym odnośnikiem cmi? Wymień identyfikator odsyłacza, identyfikator klienta głównego i n

query.en: SELECT T2.cmi_cross_ref_id ,  T2.master_customer_id ,  count(*) FROM Business_Rates AS T1 JOIN CMI_Cross_References AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id GROUP BY T2.cmi_cross_ref_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.cmi_cross_ref_id ,  T2.master_customer_id ,  count(*) FROM Business_Rates AS T1 JOIN CMI_Cross_References AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id GROUP BY T2.cmi_cross_ref_id

question.en: What is the tax source system code related to the benefits and overpayments? List the code and the benifit id, order by benifit id.
question.pl: Jaki jest kod systemu źródła podatku związany z zasiłkami i nadpłatami? Wymień kod i identyfikator świadczenia, uporządkuj według identyfikatora świadczenia.

query.en: SELECT T1.source_system_code ,  T2.council_tax_id FROM CMI_Cross_References AS T1 JOIN Benefits_Overpayments AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id ORDER BY T2.council_tax_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.source_system_code ,  T2.council_tax_id FROM CMI_Cross_References AS T1 JOIN Benefits_Overpayments AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id ORDER BY T2.council_tax_id

question.en: Wat is the tax source system code and master customer id of the taxes related to each parking fine id?

query.en: SELECT T1.source_system_code ,  T1.master_customer_id ,  T2.council_tax_id FROM CMI_Cross_References AS T1 JOIN Parking_Fines AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.source_system_code ,  T1.master_customer_id ,  T2.council_tax_id FROM CMI_Cross_References AS T1 JOIN Parking_Fines AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id

question.en: What are the renting arrears tax ids related to the customer master index whose detail is not 'Schmidt, Kertzmann and Lubowitz'?

query.en: SELECT T1.council_tax_id FROM Rent_Arrears AS T1 JOIN CMI_Cross_References AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id JOIN Customer_Master_Index AS T3 ON T3.master_customer_id  =  T2.master_customer_id WHERE T3.cmi_details != 'Schmidt ,  Kertzmann and Lubowitz'
query.pl: SELECT T1.council_tax_id FROM Rent_Arrears AS T1 JOIN CMI_Cross_References AS T2 ON T1.cmi_cross_ref_id  =  T2.cmi_cross_ref_id JOIN Customer_Master_Index AS T3 ON T3.master_customer_id  =  T2.master_customer_id WHERE T3.cmi_details != 'Schmidt , Kertzmann i Lubowitz'

question.en: Show the nations that have both hosts older than 45 and hosts younger than 35.

query.en: SELECT Nationality FROM HOST WHERE Age  >  45 INTERSECT SELECT Nationality FROM HOST WHERE Age  <  35
query.pl: SELECT Nationality FROM HOST WHERE Age  >  45 INTERSECT SELECT Nationality FROM HOST WHERE Age  <  35

question.en: Show the themes of parties and the names of the party hosts.
question.pl: Pokaż tematy imprez i nazwiska gospodarzy.

query.en: SELECT T3.Party_Theme ,  T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Party_Theme ,  T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID

question.en: For each party, return its theme and the name of its host.
question.pl: Dla każdej imprezy podaj jej temat i nazwę gospodarza.

query.en: SELECT T3.Party_Theme ,  T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Party_Theme ,  T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID

query.pl: SELECT T3.Location ,  T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID ORDER BY T2.Age

query.en: SELECT T3.Location ,  T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID ORDER BY T2.Age
query.pl: SELECT T3.Location ,  T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID ORDER BY T2.Age

query.en: SELECT T3.Location FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID WHERE T2.Age  >  50
query.pl: SELECT T3.Location FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID WHERE T2.Age  >  50

query.pl: SELECT T3.Location FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID WHERE T2.Age  >  50

question.en: Show the host names for parties with number of hosts greater than 20.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID WHERE T3.Number_of_hosts  >  20
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID WHERE T3.Number_of_hosts  >  20

question.pl: Które imprezy mają więcej niż 20 gospodarzy? Podaj nazwy gospodarzy tych imprez.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID WHERE T3.Number_of_hosts  >  20
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM party_host AS T1 JOIN HOST AS T2 ON T1.Host_ID  =  T2.Host_ID JOIN party AS T3 ON T1.Party_ID  =  T3.Party_ID WHERE T3.Number_of_hosts  >  20

question.en: Show storm name with at least two regions and 10 cities affected.

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2 INTERSECT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING sum(T2.number_city_affected)  >=  10
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2 INTERSECT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING sum(T2.number_city_affected)  >=  10

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2 INTERSECT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING sum(T2.number_city_affected)  >=  10
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2 INTERSECT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING sum(T2.number_city_affected)  >=  10

question.en: Show all storm names except for those with at least two affected regions.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie nazwy burz z wyjątkiem tych, które mają co najmniej dwa dotknięte regiony.

query.en: SELECT name FROM storm EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT name FROM storm EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What are the names of storms that did not affect two or more regions?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się burze, które nie dotknęły dwóch lub więcej regionów?

query.en: SELECT name FROM storm EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT name FROM storm EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM storm AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.storm_id  =  T2.storm_id GROUP BY T1.storm_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What are the region names affected by the storm with a number of deaths of least 10?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się regiony dotknięte burzą z liczbą ofiar śmiertelnych wynoszącą co najmniej 10?

query.en: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T3.number_deaths  >=  10
query.pl: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T3.number_deaths  >=  10

question.en: Return the names of the regions affected by storms that had a death count of at least 10.
question.pl: Zwróć nazwy regionów dotkniętych burzami, w których liczba ofiar śmiertelnych wyniosła co najmniej 10.

query.en: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T3.number_deaths  >=  10
query.pl: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T3.number_deaths  >=  10

question.en: Show all storm names affecting region "Denmark".
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie nazwy burz wpływające na region "Dania".

query.en: SELECT T3.name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.region_name  =  'Denmark'
query.pl: SELECT T3.name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.region_name  =  'Dania'

question.en: What are the names of the storms that affected Denmark?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się burze, które nawiedziły Danię?

query.en: SELECT T3.name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.region_name  =  'Denmark'
query.pl: SELECT T3.name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.region_name  =  'Dania'

question.en: Show the region name with at least two storms.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę regionu z co najmniej dwoma burzami.

query.en: SELECT T1.region_name FROM region AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.region_id GROUP BY T1.region_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.region_name FROM region AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.region_id GROUP BY T1.region_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What are the names of regions with two or more storms?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się regiony, w których występują dwie lub więcej burz?

query.en: SELECT T1.region_name FROM region AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.region_id GROUP BY T1.region_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.region_name FROM region AS T1 JOIN affected_region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.region_id GROUP BY T1.region_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Find the names of the regions which were affected by the storm that killed the greatest number of people.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy regionów dotkniętych burzą, która zabiła największą liczbę osób.

query.en: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id ORDER BY T3.Number_Deaths DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id ORDER BY T3.Number_Deaths DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the names of regions that were affected by the storm in which the most people died?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się regiony dotknięte huraganem, w których zginęło najwięcej osób?

query.en: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id ORDER BY T3.Number_Deaths DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.region_name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id ORDER BY T3.Number_Deaths DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name of the storm that affected both Afghanistan and Albania regions.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę burzy, która dotknęła regiony Afganistanu i Albanii.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Afghanistan' INTERSECT SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Albania'
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Afganistan' INTERSECT SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Albania'

question.en: What are the names of the storms that affected both the regions of Afghanistan and Albania?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się burze, które nawiedziły oba regiony Afganistanu i Albanii?

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Afghanistan' INTERSECT SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Albania'
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Afganistan' INTERSECT SELECT T3.Name FROM affected_region AS T1 JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id  =  T2.region_id JOIN storm AS T3 ON T1.storm_id  =  T3.storm_id WHERE T2.Region_name  =  'Albania'

question.en: Show the 3 counties with the smallest population.
question.pl: Wskaż 3 hrabstwa o najmniejszej populacji.

query.en: SELECT County_name FROM county ORDER BY Population ASC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT County_name FROM county ORDER BY Population ASC LIMIT 3

question.en: What are the 3 counties that have the smallest population? Give me the county names.
question.pl: Jakie 3 hrabstwa mają najmniejszą populację? Podaj nazwy hrabstw.

query.en: SELECT County_name FROM county ORDER BY Population ASC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT County_name FROM county ORDER BY Population ASC LIMIT 3

question.en: Show the names of counties that have at least two delegates.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy okręgów, które mają co najmniej dwóch delegatów.

query.en: SELECT T1.County_name FROM county AS T1 JOIN election AS T2 ON T1.County_id  =  T2.District GROUP BY T1.County_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.County_name FROM county AS T1 JOIN election AS T2 ON T1.County_id  =  T2.District GROUP BY T1.County_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Which counties have two or more delegates? Give me the county names.
question.pl: Które hrabstwa mają dwóch lub więcej delegatów? Podaj mi nazwy okręgów.

query.en: SELECT T1.County_name FROM county AS T1 JOIN election AS T2 ON T1.County_id  =  T2.District GROUP BY T1.County_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.County_name FROM county AS T1 JOIN election AS T2 ON T1.County_id  =  T2.District GROUP BY T1.County_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the name of the party that has at least two records.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę strony, która ma co najmniej dwa rekordy.

query.en: SELECT Party FROM party GROUP BY Party HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT Party FROM party GROUP BY Party HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Which party has two or more records?
question.pl: Która strona ma dwa lub więcej rekordów?

query.en: SELECT Party FROM party GROUP BY Party HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT Party FROM party GROUP BY Party HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the name of the party that has the most delegates.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę partii, która ma najwięcej delegatów.

query.en: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID GROUP BY T1.Party ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID GROUP BY T1.Party ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which party has the largest number of delegates?
question.pl: Która partia ma największą liczbę delegatów?

query.en: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID GROUP BY T1.Party ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID GROUP BY T1.Party ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the people that have been governor the most times.
question.pl: Pokaż ludzi, którzy byli gubernatorami najwięcej razy.

query.en: SELECT Governor FROM party GROUP BY Governor ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Governor FROM party GROUP BY Governor ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which people severed as governor most frequently?
question.pl: Które osoby najczęściej pełniły funkcję gubernatora?

query.en: SELECT Governor FROM party GROUP BY Governor ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Governor FROM party GROUP BY Governor ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the people that have been comptroller the most times and the corresponding number of times.
question.pl: Pokaż osoby, które były kontrolerami najwięcej razy i odpowiadającą im liczbę razy.

query.en: SELECT Comptroller ,  COUNT(*) FROM party GROUP BY Comptroller ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Comptroller ,  COUNT(*) FROM party GROUP BY Comptroller ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which people severed as comptroller most frequently? Give me the name of the person and the frequency count.
question.pl: Które osoby najczęściej pełniły funkcję kontrolera? Podaj imię i nazwisko osoby oraz częstotliwość.

query.en: SELECT Comptroller ,  COUNT(*) FROM party GROUP BY Comptroller ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Comptroller ,  COUNT(*) FROM party GROUP BY Comptroller ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the names of parties that do not have delegates in election?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy partii, które nie mają delegatów w wyborach?

query.en: SELECT Party FROM party WHERE Party_ID NOT IN (SELECT Party FROM election)
query.pl: SELECT Party FROM party WHERE Party_ID NOT IN (SELECT Party FROM election)

question.en: Which parties did not have any delegates in elections?
question.pl: Które partie nie miały delegatów w wyborach?

query.en: SELECT Party FROM party WHERE Party_ID NOT IN (SELECT Party FROM election)
query.pl: SELECT Party FROM party WHERE Party_ID NOT IN (SELECT Party FROM election)

question.en: What are the names of parties that have both delegates on "Appropriations" committee and
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy partii, które mają zarówno delegatów do komisji "Środki" i

query.en: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Appropriations" INTERSECT SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Economic Matters"
query.pl: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Środki" INTERSECT SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Sprawy gospodarcze"

question.en: Which parties have delegates in both the "Appropriations" committee and the "Economic Matters" committee?
question.pl: Które partie mają delegatów zarówno w komisji "Środki", jak i w komisji "Sprawy gospodarcze"?

query.en: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Appropriations" INTERSECT SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Economic Matters"
query.pl: SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Środki" INTERSECT SELECT T2.Party FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T1.Committee  =  "Sprawy gospodarcze"

question.en: Which committees have delegates from both democratic party and liberal party?
question.pl: Które komitety mają delegatów zarówno z partii demokratycznej, jak i liberalnej?

query.en: SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Democratic" INTERSECT SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Liberal"
query.pl: SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Demokratyczny" INTERSECT SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Liberał"

question.en: Find the committees that have delegates both from from the democratic party and the liberal party.
question.pl: Znajdź komitety, które mają delegatów zarówno z partii demokratycznej, jak i liberalnej.

query.en: SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Democratic" INTERSECT SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Liberal"
query.pl: SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Demokratyczny" INTERSECT SELECT T1.Committee FROM election AS T1 JOIN party AS T2 ON T1.Party  =  T2.Party_ID WHERE T2.Party  =  "Liberał"

question.en: How many journalists are there?
question.pl: Ilu jest dziennikarzy?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM journalist
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM journalist

question.en: List the names of journalists in ascending order of years working.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska dziennikarzy w kolejności rosnącej według lat pracy.

query.en: SELECT Name FROM journalist ORDER BY Years_working ASC
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM journalist ORDER BY Years_working ASC

question.en: What are the nationalities and ages of journalists?
question.pl: Jakiej narodowości i w jakim wieku są dziennikarze?

query.en: SELECT Nationality ,  Age FROM journalist
query.pl: SELECT Nationality ,  Age FROM journalist

question.en: Show the names of journalists from "England" or "Wales".
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska dziennikarzy z "Anglia" lub "Walii".

query.en: SELECT Name FROM journalist WHERE Nationality  =  "England" OR Nationality  =  "Wales"
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM journalist WHERE Nationality  =  "Anglia" OR Nationality  =  "Walia"

question.en: What is the average number of years spent working as a journalist?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia liczba lat przepracowanych w zawodzie dziennikarza?

query.en: SELECT avg(Years_working) FROM journalist
query.pl: SELECT avg(Years_working) FROM journalist

question.en: What is the nationality of the journalist with the largest number of years working?
question.pl: Jakiej narodowości jest dziennikarz z największym stażem pracy?

query.en: SELECT Nationality FROM journalist ORDER BY Years_working DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Nationality FROM journalist ORDER BY Years_working DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the different nationalities and the number of journalists of each nationality.
question.pl: Wskaż różne narodowości i liczbę dziennikarzy każdej narodowości.

query.en: SELECT Nationality ,  COUNT(*) FROM journalist GROUP BY Nationality
query.pl: SELECT Nationality ,  COUNT(*) FROM journalist GROUP BY Nationality

question.en: Show the most common nationality for journalists.
question.pl: Wskaż najczęstszą narodowość dziennikarzy.

query.en: SELECT Nationality FROM journalist GROUP BY Nationality ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Nationality FROM journalist GROUP BY Nationality ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the nations that have both journalists with more than 10 years of working and journalists with less than 3 years of working.
question.pl: Pokaż kraje, które mają zarówno dziennikarzy z ponad 10-letnim stażem pracy, jak i dziennikarzy z mniej niż 3-letnim stażem pracy.

query.en: SELECT Nationality FROM journalist WHERE Years_working  >  10 INTERSECT SELECT Nationality FROM journalist WHERE Years_working  <  3
query.pl: SELECT Nationality FROM journalist WHERE Years_working  >  10 INTERSECT SELECT Nationality FROM journalist WHERE Years_working  <  3

question.en: Show the dates, places, and names of events in descending order of the attendance.
question.pl: Pokaż daty, miejsca i nazwy wydarzeń w kolejności malejącej według frekwencji.

query.en: SELECT Date ,  Name ,  venue FROM event ORDER BY Event_Attendance DESC
query.pl: SELECT Date ,  Name ,  venue FROM event ORDER BY Event_Attendance DESC

question.en: Show the names of journalists and the dates of the events they reported.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska dziennikarzy i daty wydarzeń, które relacjonowali.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Date FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Date FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID

question.en: Show the names of journalists and the names of the events they reported in ascending order
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska dziennikarzy i nazwy wydarzeń, które relacjonowali, w kolejności rosnącej.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Name FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID ORDER BY T2.Event_Attendance ASC
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Name FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID ORDER BY T2.Event_Attendance ASC

question.en: Show the names of journalists and the number of events they reported.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska dziennikarzy i liczbę wydarzeń, które relacjonowali.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID GROUP BY T3.Name
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID GROUP BY T3.Name

question.en: Show the names of journalists that have reported more than one event.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska dziennikarzy, którzy relacjonowali więcej niż jedno wydarzenie.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID GROUP BY T3.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name FROM news_report AS T1 JOIN event AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID  =  T2.Event_ID JOIN journalist AS T3 ON T1.journalist_ID  =  T3.journalist_ID GROUP BY T3.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

question.en: List the names of journalists who have not reported any event.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska dziennikarzy, którzy nie relacjonowali żadnego wydarzenia.

query.en: SELECT Name FROM journalist WHERE journalist_ID NOT IN (SELECT journalist_ID FROM news_report)
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM journalist WHERE journalist_ID NOT IN (SELECT journalist_ID FROM news_report)

question.en: what are the average and maximum attendances of all events?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia i maksymalna frekwencja na wszystkich wydarzeniach?

query.en: SELECT avg(Event_Attendance) ,  max(Event_Attendance) FROM event
query.pl: SELECT avg(Event_Attendance) ,  max(Event_Attendance) FROM event

question.en: Find the average age and experience working length of journalists working on different role type.
question.pl: Znajdź średni wiek i staż pracy dziennikarzy pracujących na różnych stanowiskach.

query.en: SELECT avg(t1.age) ,  avg(Years_working) ,  t2.work_type FROM journalist AS t1 JOIN news_report AS t2 ON t1.journalist_id  =  t2.journalist_id GROUP BY t2.work_type
query.pl: SELECT avg(t1.age) ,  avg(Years_working) ,  t2.work_type FROM journalist AS t1 JOIN news_report AS t2 ON t1.journalist_id  =  t2.journalist_id GROUP BY t2.work_type

question.en: List the event venues and names that have the top 2 most number of people attended.
question.pl: Wymień miejsca i nazwy wydarzeń, w których wzięły udział 2 największe liczby osób.

query.en: SELECT venue ,  name FROM event ORDER BY Event_Attendance DESC LIMIT 2
query.pl: SELECT venue ,  name FROM event ORDER BY Event_Attendance DESC LIMIT 2

question.en: Show me all the restaurants.
question.pl: Pokaż mi wszystkie restauracje.

query.en: SELECT ResName FROM Restaurant;
query.pl: SELECT ResName FROM Restaurant;

question.en: What is the address of the restaurant Subway?
question.pl: Jaki jest adres restauracji Subway?

query.en: SELECT Address FROM Restaurant WHERE ResName = "Subway";
query.pl: SELECT Address FROM Restaurant WHERE ResName = "Subway";

question.en: What is the rating of the restaurant Subway?
question.pl: Jaka jest ocena restauracji Subway?

query.en: SELECT Rating FROM Restaurant WHERE ResName = "Subway";
query.pl: SELECT Rating FROM Restaurant WHERE ResName = "Subway";

question.en: List all restaurant types.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie typy restauracji.

query.en: SELECT ResTypeName FROM Restaurant_Type;
query.pl: SELECT ResTypeName FROM Restaurant_Type;

question.en: What is the description of the restaurant type Sandwich?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis restauracji typu Sandwich?

query.en: SELECT ResTypeDescription FROM Restaurant_Type WHERE ResTypeName = "Sandwich";
query.pl: SELECT ResTypeDescription FROM Restaurant_Type WHERE ResTypeName = "Kanapka";

question.en: Which restaurants have highest rating? List the restaurant name and its rating.
question.pl: Które restauracje mają najwyższą ocenę? Wymień nazwę restauracji i jej ocenę.

query.en: SELECT ResName , Rating FROM Restaurant ORDER BY Rating DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT ResName , Rating FROM Restaurant ORDER BY Rating DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: What is the age of student Linda Smith?
question.pl: W jakim wieku jest uczennica Linda Smith?

query.en: SELECT Age FROM Student WHERE Fname = "Linda" AND Lname = "Smith";
query.pl: SELECT Age FROM Student WHERE Fname = "Linda" AND Lname = "Smith";

question.en: What is the gender of the student Linda Smith?
question.pl: Jakiej płci jest uczennica Linda Smith?

query.en: SELECT Sex FROM Student WHERE Fname = "Linda" AND Lname = "Smith";
query.pl: SELECT Sex FROM Student WHERE Fname = "Linda" AND Lname = "Smith";

question.en: List all students' first names and last names who majored in 600.
question.pl: Wymień imiona i nazwiska wszystkich studentów, którzy ukończyli 600 kierunków.

query.en: SELECT Fname , Lname FROM Student WHERE Major  =  600;
query.pl: SELECT Fname , Lname FROM Student WHERE Major  =  600;

question.en: Which city does student Linda Smith live in?
question.pl: W jakim mieście mieszka studentka Linda Smith?

query.en: SELECT city_code FROM Student WHERE Fname = "Linda" AND Lname = "Smith";
query.pl: SELECT city_code FROM Student WHERE Fname = "Linda" AND Lname = "Smith";

question.en: Advisor 1121 has how many students?
question.pl: Ilu studentów ma doradca 1121?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Student WHERE Advisor =  1121;
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Student WHERE Advisor =  1121;

question.en: Which Advisor has most of students? List advisor and the number of students.
question.pl: Który doradca ma najwięcej studentów? Wymień doradcę i liczbę studentów.

query.en: SELECT Advisor ,  count(*) FROM Student GROUP BY Advisor ORDER BY count(Advisor) DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT Advisor ,  count(*) FROM Student GROUP BY Advisor ORDER BY count(Advisor) DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: Which major has least number of students? List the major and the number of students.
question.pl: Który kierunek ma najmniejszą liczbę studentów? Wymień kierunek i liczbę studentów.

query.en: SELECT Major ,  count(*) FROM Student GROUP BY Major ORDER BY count(Major) ASC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT Major ,  count(*) FROM Student GROUP BY Major ORDER BY count(Major) ASC LIMIT 1;

question.en: Which major has between 2 and 30 number of students? List major and the number of students.
question.pl: Który kierunek ma od 2 do 30 studentów? Wymień kierunek i liczbę studentów.

query.en: SELECT Major ,  count(*) FROM Student GROUP BY Major HAVING count(Major) BETWEEN 2 AND 30;
query.pl: SELECT Major ,  count(*) FROM Student GROUP BY Major HAVING count(Major) BETWEEN 2 AND 30;

question.en: Which student's age is older than 18 and is majoring in 600? List each student's first and last name.
question.pl: Który uczeń ma więcej niż 18 lat i studiuje na kierunku 600? Wymień imię i nazwisko każdego studenta.

query.en: SELECT Fname , Lname FROM Student WHERE Age  >  18 AND Major = 600;
query.pl: SELECT Fname , Lname FROM Student WHERE Age  >  18 AND Major = 600;

question.en: List all female students age is older than 18 who is not majoring in 600. List students' first name and last name.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie uczennice w wieku powyżej 18 lat, które nie studiują na kierunku 600. Wymień imię i nazwisko uczennicy.

query.en: SELECT Fname , Lname FROM Student WHERE Age  >  18 AND Major != 600 AND Sex = 'F';
query.pl: SELECT Fname , Lname FROM Student WHERE Age  >  18 AND Major != 600 AND Sex = 'F';

question.en: How many restaurant is the Sandwich type restaurant?
question.pl: Ile jest restauracji typu Sandwich?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Restaurant JOIN Type_Of_Restaurant ON Restaurant.ResID =  Type_Of_Restaurant.ResID JOIN Restaurant_Type ON Type_Of_Restaurant.ResTypeID = Restaurant_Type.ResTypeID GROUP BY Type_Of_Restaurant.ResTypeID HAVING Restaurant_Type.ResTypeName = 'Sandwich'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Restaurant JOIN Type_Of_Restaurant ON Restaurant.ResID =  Type_Of_Restaurant.ResID JOIN Restaurant_Type ON Type_Of_Restaurant.ResTypeID = Restaurant_Type.ResTypeID GROUP BY Type_Of_Restaurant.ResTypeID HAVING Restaurant_Type.ResTypeName = 'Kanapka'

question.en: How long does student Linda Smith spend on the restaurant in total?
question.pl: Jak długo łącznie studentka Linda Smith spędziła w restauracji?

query.en: SELECT sum(Spent) FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID WHERE Student.Fname = "Linda" AND Student.Lname = "Smith";
query.pl: SELECT sum(Spent) FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID WHERE Student.Fname = "Linda" AND Student.Lname = "Smith";

question.en: How many times has the student Linda Smith visited Subway?
question.pl: Ile razy studentka Linda Smith odwiedziła Subway?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID JOIN Restaurant ON Visits_Restaurant.ResID = Restaurant.ResID WHERE Student.Fname = "Linda" AND Student.Lname = "Smith" AND Restaurant.ResName = "Subway";
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID JOIN Restaurant ON Visits_Restaurant.ResID = Restaurant.ResID WHERE Student.Fname = "Linda" AND Student.Lname = "Smith" AND Restaurant.ResName = "Subway";

question.en: When did Linda Smith visit Subway?
question.pl: Kiedy Linda Smith odwiedziła Subway?

query.en: SELECT TIME FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID JOIN Restaurant ON Visits_Restaurant.ResID = Restaurant.ResID WHERE Student.Fname = "Linda" AND Student.Lname = "Smith" AND Restaurant.ResName = "Subway";
query.pl: SELECT TIME FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID JOIN Restaurant ON Visits_Restaurant.ResID = Restaurant.ResID WHERE Student.Fname = "Linda" AND Student.Lname = "Smith" AND Restaurant.ResName = "Subway";

question.en: At which restaurant did the students spend the least amount of time? List restaurant and the time students spent on in total.
question.pl: W której restauracji uczniowie spędzili najmniej czasu? Wymień restauracje i łączny czas spędzony w nich przez uczniów.

query.en: SELECT Restaurant.ResName ,  sum(Visits_Restaurant.Spent) FROM Visits_Restaurant JOIN Restaurant ON Visits_Restaurant.ResID = Restaurant.ResID GROUP BY Restaurant.ResID ORDER BY sum(Visits_Restaurant.Spent) ASC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT Restaurant.ResName ,  sum(Visits_Restaurant.Spent) FROM Visits_Restaurant JOIN Restaurant ON Visits_Restaurant.ResID = Restaurant.ResID GROUP BY Restaurant.ResID ORDER BY sum(Visits_Restaurant.Spent) ASC LIMIT 1;

question.en: Which student visited restaurant most often? List student's first name and last name.
question.pl: Który uczeń najczęściej odwiedzał restaurację? Wymień imię i nazwisko ucznia.

query.en: SELECT Student.Fname , Student.Lname FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID GROUP BY Student.StuID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT Student.Fname , Student.Lname FROM Student JOIN Visits_Restaurant ON Student.StuID = Visits_Restaurant.StuID GROUP BY Student.StuID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: Find the ids of orders whose status is 'Success'.
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikatory zamówień, których status to "Sukces".

query.en: SELECT actual_order_id FROM actual_orders WHERE order_status_code  =  'Success'
query.pl: SELECT actual_order_id FROM actual_orders WHERE order_status_code  =  'Sukces'

question.en: Find the name and price of the product that has been ordered the greatest number of times.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę i cenę produktu, który został zamówiony największą liczbę razy.

query.en: SELECT t1.product_name ,   t1.product_price FROM products AS t1 JOIN regular_order_products AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id GROUP BY t2.product_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.product_name ,   t1.product_price FROM products AS t1 JOIN regular_order_products AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id GROUP BY t2.product_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the number of customers in total.
question.pl: Znajdź łączną liczbę klientów.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM customers
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM customers

question.en: How many different payment methods are there?
question.pl: Ile jest różnych metod płatności?

question.en: Show the details of all trucks in the order of their license number.

question.en: Find the name of the most expensive product.

query.en: SELECT product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the names of customers who are not living in the state of California.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy klientów, którzy nie mieszkają w stanie Kalifornia.

query.en: SELECT customer_name FROM customers EXCEPT SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_addresses AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS t3 ON t2.address_id  =  t3.address_id WHERE t3.state_province_county  =  'California'
query.pl: SELECT customer_name FROM customers EXCEPT SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_addresses AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS t3 ON t2.address_id  =  t3.address_id WHERE t3.state_province_county  =  'Kalifornia'

question.en: List the names and emails of customers who payed by Visa card.
question.pl: Podaj nazwiska i adresy e-mail klientów, którzy zapłacili kartą Visa.

query.en: SELECT customer_email ,  customer_name FROM customers WHERE payment_method  =  'Visa'
query.pl: SELECT customer_email ,  customer_name FROM customers WHERE payment_method  =  'Wiza'

question.en: Find the names and phone numbers of customers living in California state.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska i numery telefonów klientów mieszkających w stanie Kalifornia.

query.en: SELECT t1.customer_name ,  t1.customer_phone FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_addresses AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS t3 ON t2.address_id  =  t3.address_id WHERE t3.state_province_county  =  'California'
query.pl: SELECT t1.customer_name ,  t1.customer_phone FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_addresses AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS t3 ON t2.address_id  =  t3.address_id WHERE t3.state_province_county  =  'Kalifornia'

question.en: Find the states which do not have any employee in their record.
question.pl: Znajdź stany, w których nie ma żadnego pracownika.

query.en: SELECT state_province_county FROM addresses WHERE address_id NOT IN (SELECT employee_address_id FROM Employees)

question.en: List the names, phone numbers, and emails of all customers sorted by their dates of becoming customers.
question.pl: Wypisz nazwiska, numery telefonów i adresy e-mail wszystkich klientów posortowane według dat, w których stali się klientami.

question.en: Find the payment method that is used most frequently.

query.en: SELECT payment_method FROM Customers GROUP BY payment_method ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: List the names of all routes in alphabetic order.

question.en: Find the name of route that has the highest number of deliveries.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę trasy z największą liczbą dostaw.

query.en: SELECT t1.route_name FROM Delivery_Routes AS t1 JOIN Delivery_Route_Locations AS t2 ON t1.route_id  =  t2.route_id GROUP BY t1.route_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.route_name FROM Delivery_Routes AS t1 JOIN Delivery_Route_Locations AS t2 ON t1.route_id  =  t2.route_id GROUP BY t1.route_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: List the state names and the number of customers living in each state.

query.en: SELECT t2.state_province_county ,  count(*) FROM customer_addresses AS t1 JOIN addresses AS t2 ON t1.address_id  =  t2.address_id GROUP BY t2.state_province_county

question.en: What are the titles of papers published by "Jeremy Gibbons"?

query.en: SELECT t3.title FROM authors AS t1 JOIN authorship AS t2 ON t1.authid  =  t2.authid JOIN papers AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.fname  =  "Stephanie" AND t1.lname  =  "Weirich"

question.en: Which film is rented at a fee of 0.99 and has less than 3 in the inventory? List the film title and id.
question.pl: Który film jest wypożyczony za opłatą 0,99 i ma mniej niż 3 w inwentarzu? Wymień tytuł i identyfikator filmu.

query.en: SELECT title ,  film_id FROM film WHERE rental_rate  =  0.99 INTERSECT SELECT T1.title ,  T1.film_id FROM film AS T1 JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T1.film_id HAVING count(*)  <  3
query.pl: SELECT title ,  film_id FROM film WHERE rental_rate  =  0.99 INTERSECT SELECT T1.title ,  T1.film_id FROM film AS T1 JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T1.film_id HAVING count(*)  <  3

question.en: Find all the payment dates for the payments with an amount larger than 10 and the payments handled by a staff person with the first name Elsa.
question.pl: Znajdź wszystkie daty płatności dla płatności na kwotę większą niż 10 i płatności obsługiwanych przez pracownika o imieniu Elsa.

query.en: SELECT payment_date FROM payment WHERE amount  >  10 UNION SELECT T1.payment_date FROM payment AS T1 JOIN staff AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.staff_id WHERE T2.first_name  =  'Elsa'
query.pl: SELECT payment_date FROM payment WHERE amount  >  10 UNION SELECT T1.payment_date FROM payment AS T1 JOIN staff AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.staff_id WHERE T2.first_name  =  'Elsa'

question.en: Which film has the most number of actors or actresses? List the film name, film id and description.
question.pl: Który film ma najwięcej aktorów lub aktorek? Wymień nazwę filmu, jego identyfikator i opis.

query.en: SELECT T2.title ,  T2.film_id ,  T2.description FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T2.film_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.title ,  T2.film_id ,  T2.description FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T2.film_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T2.title ,  T2.film_id ,  T2.description FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T2.film_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.title ,  T2.film_id ,  T2.description FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id  =  T2.film_id GROUP BY T2.film_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which film actor (actress) starred the most films? List his or her first name, last name and actor id.
question.pl: Który aktor (która aktorka) zagrał (zagrała) w największej liczbie filmów? Wymień jego imię, nazwisko i identyfikator aktora.

query.en: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name ,  T2.actor_id FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id  =  T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.actor_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name ,  T2.actor_id FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id  =  T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.actor_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name ,  T2.actor_id FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id  =  T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.actor_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name ,  T2.actor_id FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id  =  T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.actor_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which film actors (actresses) played a role in more than 30 films? List his or her first name and last name.
question.pl: Którzy aktorzy (aktorki) zagrali w ponad 30 filmach? Wymień jego imię i nazwisko.

query.en: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id  =  T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.actor_id HAVING count(*)  >  30
query.pl: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id  =  T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.actor_id HAVING count(*)  >  30

query.pl: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM film_actor AS T1 JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id  =  T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.actor_id HAVING count(*)  >  30

question.en: Which customer, who has made at least one payment, has spent the least money? List his or her first name, last name, and the id.

query.en: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.customer_id FROM customer AS T1 JOIN payment AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(amount) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.customer_id FROM customer AS T1 JOIN payment AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(amount) ASC LIMIT 1
