query.en: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.customer_id FROM customer AS T1 JOIN payment AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(amount) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.customer_id FROM customer AS T1 JOIN payment AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(amount) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the genre name of the film HUNGER ROOF?

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM category AS T1 JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.category_id  =  T2.category_id JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id  =  T3.film_id WHERE T3.title  =  'HUNGER ROOF'
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM category AS T1 JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.category_id  =  T2.category_id JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id  =  T3.film_id WHERE T3.title  =  'HUNGER ROOF'

query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM category AS T1 JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.category_id  =  T2.category_id JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id  =  T3.film_id WHERE T3.title  =  'HUNGER ROOF'

question.en: Find all the films longer than 100 minutes, or rated PG, except those who cost more than 200 for replacement. List the titles.

query.en: SELECT sum(amount) ,  T1.bname FROM bank AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id GROUP BY T1.bname
query.pl: SELECT sum(amount) ,  T1.bname FROM bank AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id GROUP BY T1.bname

question.en: Find the name of customers who have more than one loan.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy klientów, którzy mają więcej niż jedną pożyczkę.

query.en: SELECT T1.cust_name FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.cust_name FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: What are the names of customers who have taken out more than one loan?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwiska klientów, którzy zaciągnęli więcej niż jedną pożyczkę?

query.en: SELECT T1.cust_name FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.cust_name FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: Find the name and account balance of the customers who have loans with a total amount of more than 5000.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę i saldo konta klientów, którzy mają pożyczki na łączną kwotę ponad 5000.

query.en: SELECT T1.cust_name ,  T1.acc_type FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING sum(T2.amount)  >  5000
query.pl: SELECT T1.cust_name ,  T1.acc_type FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING sum(T2.amount)  >  5000

question.en: What are the names and account balances for customers who have taken a total amount of more than 5000 in loans?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy i salda kont klientów, którzy zaciągnęli pożyczki na łączną kwotę ponad 5000?

query.en: SELECT T1.cust_name ,  T1.acc_type FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING sum(T2.amount)  >  5000
query.pl: SELECT T1.cust_name ,  T1.acc_type FROM customer AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.cust_id  =  T2.cust_id GROUP BY T1.cust_name HAVING sum(T2.amount)  >  5000

question.en: Find the name of bank branch that provided the greatest total amount of loans.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę oddziału banku, który udzielił największej łącznej kwoty pożyczek.

query.en: SELECT T1.bname FROM bank AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id GROUP BY T1.bname ORDER BY sum(T2.amount) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.bname FROM bank AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id GROUP BY T1.bname ORDER BY sum(T2.amount) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the name of the bank branch that has lent the greatest amount?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się oddział banku, który pożyczył największą kwotę?

query.en: SELECT T1.bname FROM bank AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id GROUP BY T1.bname ORDER BY sum(T2.amount) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.bname FROM bank AS T1 JOIN loan AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id GROUP BY T1.bname ORDER BY sum(T2.amount) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name of bank branch that provided the greatest total amount of loans to customers with credit score is less than 100.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę oddziału banku, który udzielił największej łącznej kwoty kredytów klientom z oceną zdolności kredytowej poniżej 100.

query.en: SELECT T2.bname FROM loan AS T1 JOIN bank AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id JOIN customer AS T3 ON T1.cust_id  =  T3.cust_id WHERE T3.credit_score  <  100 GROUP BY T2.bname ORDER BY sum(T1.amount) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.bname FROM loan AS T1 JOIN bank AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id JOIN customer AS T3 ON T1.cust_id  =  T3.cust_id WHERE T3.credit_score  <  100 GROUP BY T2.bname ORDER BY sum(T1.amount) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the name of the bank branch that has lended the largest total amount in loans, specifically to customers with credit scores below 100?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się oddział banku, który udzielił największej łącznej kwoty pożyczek, szczególnie klientom z oceną kredytową poniżej 100?

query.en: SELECT T2.bname FROM loan AS T1 JOIN bank AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id JOIN customer AS T3 ON T1.cust_id  =  T3.cust_id WHERE T3.credit_score  <  100 GROUP BY T2.bname ORDER BY sum(T1.amount) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.bname FROM loan AS T1 JOIN bank AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id JOIN customer AS T3 ON T1.cust_id  =  T3.cust_id WHERE T3.credit_score  <  100 GROUP BY T2.bname ORDER BY sum(T1.amount) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the id and first name of the student that has the most number of assessment notes?
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikator i imię ucznia, który ma najwięcej ocen?

query.en: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.first_name FROM Assessment_Notes AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id GROUP BY T1.student_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.first_name FROM Assessment_Notes AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id GROUP BY T1.student_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T1.teacher_id ,  T2.first_name FROM Assessment_Notes AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id GROUP BY T1.teacher_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT T1.teacher_id ,  T2.first_name FROM Assessment_Notes AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id GROUP BY T1.teacher_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3

query.en: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.last_name FROM Behavior_Incident AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id GROUP BY T1.student_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.last_name FROM Behavior_Incident AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id GROUP BY T1.student_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T1.teacher_id ,  T2.last_name FROM Detention AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id WHERE T1.detention_type_code  =  "AFTER" GROUP BY T1.teacher_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.teacher_id ,  T2.last_name FROM Detention AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id WHERE T1.detention_type_code  =  "PO" GROUP BY T1.teacher_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the id and first name of the student whose addresses have the highest average monthly rental?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i imię studenta, którego adres ma najwyższy średni miesięczny czynsz?

query.en: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.first_name FROM Student_Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id GROUP BY T1.student_id ORDER BY AVG(monthly_rental) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.student_id ,  T2.first_name FROM Student_Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id GROUP BY T1.student_id ORDER BY AVG(monthly_rental) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the id and city of the student address with the highest average monthly rental.

query.en: SELECT T2.address_id ,  T1.city FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id GROUP BY T2.address_id ORDER BY AVG(monthly_rental) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.address_id ,  T1.city FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id GROUP BY T2.address_id ORDER BY AVG(monthly_rental) DESC LIMIT 1

query.pl: SELECT T1.incident_type_code ,  T2.incident_type_description FROM Behavior_Incident AS T1 JOIN Ref_Incident_Type AS T2 ON T1.incident_type_code  =  T2.incident_type_code GROUP BY T1.incident_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T1.detention_type_code ,  T2.detention_type_description FROM Detention AS T1 JOIN Ref_Detention_Type AS T2 ON T1.detention_type_code  =  T2.detention_type_code GROUP BY T1.detention_type_code ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.detention_type_code ,  T2.detention_type_description FROM Detention AS T1 JOIN Ref_Detention_Type AS T2 ON T1.detention_type_code  =  T2.detention_type_code GROUP BY T1.detention_type_code ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the texts of assessment notes for teachers with last name "Schuster".
question.pl: Znajdź teksty ocen dla nauczycieli z nazwiskiem "Schuster".

query.en: SELECT T1.text_of_notes FROM Assessment_Notes AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id WHERE T2.last_name  =  "Schuster"
query.pl: SELECT T1.text_of_notes FROM Assessment_Notes AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id WHERE T2.last_name  =  "Schuster"

question.en: Find the start and end dates of behavior incidents of students with last name "Fahey".
question.pl: Znajdź daty rozpoczęcia i zakończenia incydentów związanych z zachowaniem uczniów o nazwisku "Fahey".

query.en: SELECT T1.date_incident_start ,  date_incident_end FROM Behavior_Incident AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id WHERE T2.last_name  =  "Fahey"
query.pl: SELECT T1.date_incident_start ,  date_incident_end FROM Behavior_Incident AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id WHERE T2.last_name  =  "Fahey"

question.en: Find the start and end dates of detentions of teachers with last name "Schultz".
question.pl: Znajdź daty rozpoczęcia i zakończenia zatrzymań nauczycieli o nazwisku "Schultz".

query.en: SELECT T1.datetime_detention_start ,  datetime_detention_end FROM Detention AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id WHERE T2.last_name  =  "Schultz"
query.pl: SELECT T1.datetime_detention_start ,  datetime_detention_end FROM Detention AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id WHERE T2.last_name  =  "Schultz"

question.en: What are the id and zip code of the address with the highest monthly rental?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i kod pocztowy adresu z najwyższym miesięcznym czynszem?

query.en: SELECT T2.address_id ,  T1.zip_postcode FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id ORDER BY monthly_rental DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.address_id ,  T1.zip_postcode FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id ORDER BY monthly_rental DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the cell phone number of the student whose address has the lowest monthly rental?
question.pl: Jaki jest numer telefonu komórkowego ucznia, którego adres ma najniższy miesięczny czynsz?

query.en: SELECT T2.cell_mobile_number FROM Student_Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id ORDER BY T1.monthly_rental ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.cell_mobile_number FROM Student_Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.student_id  =  T2.student_id ORDER BY T1.monthly_rental ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the monthly rentals of student addresses in Texas state?
question.pl: Jakie są miesięczne opłaty za wynajem adresów studentów w stanie Teksas?

query.en: SELECT T2.monthly_rental FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T1.state_province_county  =  "Texas"
query.pl: SELECT T2.monthly_rental FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T1.state_province_county  =  "Teksas"

question.en: What are the first names and last names of students with address in Wisconsin state?
question.pl: Jakie są imiona i nazwiska uczniów z adresem w stanie Wisconsin?

query.en: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T1.state_province_county  =  "Wisconsin"
query.pl: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T1.state_province_county  =  "Wisconsin"

question.en: What are the line 1 and average monthly rentals of all student addresses?
question.pl: Jaka jest linia 1 i średni miesięczny czynsz dla wszystkich adresów studentów?

query.en: SELECT T1.line_1 ,  avg(T2.monthly_rental) FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id GROUP BY T2.address_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.line_1 ,  avg(T2.monthly_rental) FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Student_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id GROUP BY T2.address_id

question.en: What is the zip code of the address where the teacher with first name "Lyla" lives?
question.pl: Jaki jest kod pocztowy adresu, pod którym mieszka nauczycielka o imieniu "Lyla"?

query.en: SELECT T1.zip_postcode FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T2.first_name  =  "Lyla"
query.pl: SELECT T1.zip_postcode FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T2.first_name  =  "Lyla"

question.en: What are the email addresses of teachers whose address has zip code "918"?
question.pl: Jakie są adresy e-mail nauczycieli, których adres ma kod pocztowy "918"?

query.en: SELECT T2.email_address FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T1.zip_postcode  =  "918"
query.pl: SELECT T2.email_address FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id WHERE T1.zip_postcode  =  "918"

question.en: How many students are not involved in any behavior incident?
question.pl: Ilu uczniów nie uczestniczy w żadnym incydencie związanym z zachowaniem?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM STUDENTS WHERE student_id NOT IN ( SELECT student_id FROM Behavior_Incident )
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM STUDENTS WHERE student_id NOT IN ( SELECT student_id FROM Behavior_Incident )

question.en: Find the last names of teachers who are not involved in any detention.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska nauczycieli, którzy nie biorą udziału w zatrzymaniu.

query.en: SELECT last_name FROM Teachers EXCEPT SELECT T1.last_name FROM Teachers AS T1 JOIN Detention AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id
query.pl: SELECT last_name FROM Teachers EXCEPT SELECT T1.last_name FROM Teachers AS T1 JOIN Detention AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id

question.en: What are the line 1 of addresses shared by some students and some teachers?
question.pl: Jaka jest linia 1 adresów współdzielonych przez niektórych uczniów i niektórych nauczycieli?

query.en: SELECT T1.line_1 FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id INTERSECT SELECT T1.line_1 FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.line_1 FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Students AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id INTERSECT SELECT T1.line_1 FROM Addresses AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.address_id  =  T2.address_id

question.en: Which assets have 2 parts and have less than 2 fault logs? List the asset id and detail.
question.pl: Które zasoby mają 2 części i mniej niż 2 dzienniki błędów? Wymień identyfikator zasobu i szczegóły.

query.en: SELECT T1.asset_id ,  T1.asset_details FROM Assets AS T1 JOIN Asset_Parts AS T2 ON T1.asset_id  =  T2.asset_id GROUP BY T1.asset_id HAVING count(*)  =  2 INTERSECT SELECT T1.asset_id ,  T1.asset_details FROM Assets AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log AS T2 ON T1.asset_id  =  T2.asset_id GROUP BY T1.asset_id HAVING count(*)  <  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.asset_id ,  T1.asset_details FROM Assets AS T1 JOIN Asset_Parts AS T2 ON T1.asset_id  =  T2.asset_id GROUP BY T1.asset_id HAVING count(*)  =  2 INTERSECT SELECT T1.asset_id ,  T1.asset_details FROM Assets AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log AS T2 ON T1.asset_id  =  T2.asset_id GROUP BY T1.asset_id HAVING count(*)  <  2

question.en: How many assets does each maintenance contract contain? List the number and the contract id.
question.pl: Ile zasobów zawiera każda umowa serwisowa? Wymień liczbę i identyfikator umowy.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.maintenance_contract_id FROM Maintenance_Contracts AS T1 JOIN Assets AS T2 ON T1.maintenance_contract_id  =  T2.maintenance_contract_id GROUP BY T1.maintenance_contract_id
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.maintenance_contract_id FROM Maintenance_Contracts AS T1 JOIN Assets AS T2 ON T1.maintenance_contract_id  =  T2.maintenance_contract_id GROUP BY T1.maintenance_contract_id

question.en: How many assets does each third party company supply? List the count and the company id.
question.pl: Ile aktywów dostarcza każda firma zewnętrzna? Wymień liczbę i identyfikator firmy.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.company_id FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Assets AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.supplier_company_id GROUP BY T1.company_id
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.company_id FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Assets AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.supplier_company_id GROUP BY T1.company_id

question.en: Which third party companies have at least 2 maintenance engineers or have at least 2 maintenance contracts? List the company id and name.
question.pl: Które firmy zewnętrzne zatrudniają co najmniej 2 inżynierów utrzymania ruchu lub mają co najmniej 2 umowy serwisowe? Wymień identyfikator i nazwę firmy.

query.en: SELECT T1.company_id ,  T1.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Maintenance_Engineers AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.company_id GROUP BY T1.company_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2 UNION SELECT T3.company_id ,  T3.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T3 JOIN Maintenance_Contracts AS T4 ON T3.company_id  =  T4.maintenance_contract_company_id GROUP BY T3.company_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.company_id ,  T1.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Maintenance_Engineers AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.company_id GROUP BY T1.company_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2 UNION SELECT T3.company_id ,  T3.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T3 JOIN Maintenance_Contracts AS T4 ON T3.company_id  =  T4.maintenance_contract_company_id GROUP BY T3.company_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What is the name and id of the staff who recorded the fault log but has not contacted any visiting engineers?
question.pl: Jakie jest imię i nazwisko oraz identyfikator pracownika, który zarejestrował dziennik usterek, ale nie skontaktował się z żadnym inżynierem?

query.en: SELECT T1.staff_name ,  T1.staff_id FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.recorded_by_staff_id EXCEPT SELECT T3.staff_name ,  T3.staff_id FROM Staff AS T3 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T4 ON T3.staff_id  =  T4.contact_staff_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.staff_name ,  T1.staff_id FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.recorded_by_staff_id EXCEPT SELECT T3.staff_name ,  T3.staff_id FROM Staff AS T3 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T4 ON T3.staff_id  =  T4.contact_staff_id

question.en: Which engineer has visited the most times? Show the engineer id, first name and last name.
question.pl: Który inżynier odwiedził Cię najwięcej razy? Pokaż identyfikator inżyniera, imię i nazwisko.

query.en: SELECT T1.engineer_id ,  T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 GROUP BY T1.engineer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.engineer_id ,  T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 GROUP BY T1.engineer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which parts have more than 2 faults? Show the part name and id.
question.pl: Które części mają więcej niż 2 usterki? Pokaż nazwę i identyfikator części.

query.en: SELECT T1.part_name ,  T1.part_id FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Part_Faults AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id GROUP BY T1.part_id HAVING count(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.part_name ,  T1.part_id FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Part_Faults AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id GROUP BY T1.part_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

question.en: List all every engineer's first name, last name, details and coresponding skill description.
question.pl: Wymień imię, nazwisko, szczegóły i opis umiejętności każdego inżyniera.

query.en: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.other_details ,  T3.skill_description FROM Maintenance_Engineers AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Skills AS T2 ON T1.engineer_id  =  T2.engineer_id JOIN Skills AS T3 ON T2.skill_id  =  T3.skill_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.other_details ,  T3.skill_description FROM Maintenance_Engineers AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Skills AS T2 ON T1.engineer_id  =  T2.engineer_id JOIN Skills AS T3 ON T2.skill_id  =  T3.skill_id

question.en: For all the faults of different parts, what are all the decriptions of the skills required to fix them? List the name of the faults and the skill description.
question.pl: Dla wszystkich usterek różnych części, jakie są opisy umiejętności wymaganych do ich usunięcia? Wymień nazwy usterek i opis umiejętności.

query.en: SELECT T1.fault_short_name ,  T3.skill_description FROM Part_Faults AS T1 JOIN Skills_Required_To_Fix AS T2 ON T1.part_fault_id  =  T2.part_fault_id JOIN Skills AS T3 ON T2.skill_id  =  T3.skill_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.fault_short_name ,  T3.skill_description FROM Part_Faults AS T1 JOIN Skills_Required_To_Fix AS T2 ON T1.part_fault_id  =  T2.part_fault_id JOIN Skills AS T3 ON T2.skill_id  =  T3.skill_id

question.en: How many assets can each parts be used in? List the part name and the number.
question.pl: W ilu zasobach mogą być używane poszczególne części? Wymień nazwę i numer części.

query.en: SELECT T1.part_name ,  count(*) FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Asset_Parts AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id GROUP BY T1.part_name
query.pl: SELECT T1.part_name ,  count(*) FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Asset_Parts AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id GROUP BY T1.part_name

question.en: What are all the fault descriptions and the fault status of all the faults recoreded in the logs?
question.pl: Jakie są opisy i statusy wszystkich usterek zarejestrowanych w dziennikach?

query.en: SELECT T1.fault_description ,  T2.fault_status FROM Fault_Log AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log_Parts AS T2 ON T1.fault_log_entry_id  =  T2.fault_log_entry_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.fault_description ,  T2.fault_status FROM Fault_Log AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log_Parts AS T2 ON T1.fault_log_entry_id  =  T2.fault_log_entry_id

question.en: How many engineer visits are required at most for a single fault log? List the number and the log entry id.
question.pl: Ile wizyt inżyniera jest wymaganych dla pojedynczego dziennika usterek? Wymień liczbę i identyfikator wpisu w dzienniku.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.fault_log_entry_id FROM Fault_Log AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.fault_log_entry_id  =  T2.fault_log_entry_id GROUP BY T1.fault_log_entry_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.fault_log_entry_id FROM Fault_Log AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.fault_log_entry_id  =  T2.fault_log_entry_id GROUP BY T1.fault_log_entry_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are all the distinct last names of all the engineers?
question.pl: Jakie są różne nazwiska wszystkich inżynierów?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers

question.en: How many fault status codes are recorded in the fault log parts table?
question.pl: Ile kodów statusu usterek jest zapisanych w tabeli części dziennika usterek?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT fault_status FROM Fault_Log_Parts
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT fault_status FROM Fault_Log_Parts

question.en: Which engineers have never visited to maintain the assets? List the engineer first name and last name.
question.pl: Którzy inżynierowie nigdy nie odwiedzili Cię w celu konserwacji zasobów? Wymień imię i nazwisko inżyniera.

query.en: SELECT first_name ,  last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers WHERE engineer_id NOT IN (SELECT engineer_id FROM Engineer_Visits)
query.pl: SELECT first_name ,  last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers WHERE engineer_id NOT IN (SELECT engineer_id FROM Engineer_Visits)

question.en: List the asset id, details, make and model for every asset.
question.pl: Wyświetl identyfikator zasobu, szczegóły, markę i model dla każdego zasobu.

query.en: SELECT asset_id ,  asset_details ,  asset_make ,  asset_model FROM Assets
query.pl: SELECT asset_id ,  asset_details ,  asset_make ,  asset_model FROM Assets

question.en: When was the first asset acquired?
question.pl: Kiedy nabyto pierwszy składnik aktywów?

query.en: SELECT asset_acquired_date FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_acquired_date ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT asset_acquired_date FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_acquired_date ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which part fault requires the most number of skills to fix? List part id and name.
question.pl: Usunięcie usterki której części wymaga najwięcej umiejętności? Wymień identyfikator i nazwę części.

query.en: SELECT T1.part_id ,  T1.part_name FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Part_Faults AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id JOIN Skills_Required_To_Fix AS T3 ON T2.part_fault_id  =  T3.part_fault_id GROUP BY T1.part_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.part_id ,  T1.part_name FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Part_Faults AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id JOIN Skills_Required_To_Fix AS T3 ON T2.part_fault_id  =  T3.part_fault_id GROUP BY T1.part_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which kind of part has the least number of faults? List the part name.
question.pl: Który rodzaj części ma najmniejszą liczbę usterek? Wymień nazwę części.

query.en: SELECT T1.part_name FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Part_Faults AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id GROUP BY T1.part_name ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.part_name FROM Parts AS T1 JOIN Part_Faults AS T2 ON T1.part_id  =  T2.part_id GROUP BY T1.part_name ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: Among those engineers who have visited, which engineer makes the least number of visits? List the engineer id, first name and last name.
question.pl: Który z inżynierów odwiedził Twoją firmę najmniej razy? Wymień identyfikator, imię i nazwisko inżyniera.

query.en: SELECT T1.engineer_id ,  T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.engineer_id  =  T2.engineer_id GROUP BY T1.engineer_id ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.engineer_id ,  T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM Maintenance_Engineers AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.engineer_id  =  T2.engineer_id GROUP BY T1.engineer_id ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which staff have contacted which engineers? List the staff name and the engineer first name and last name.
question.pl: Którzy pracownicy kontaktowali się z którymi inżynierami? Wymień imię i nazwisko pracownika oraz imię i nazwisko inżyniera.

query.en: SELECT T1.staff_name ,  T3.first_name ,  T3.last_name FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.contact_staff_id JOIN Maintenance_Engineers AS T3 ON T2.engineer_id  =  T3.engineer_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.staff_name ,  T3.first_name ,  T3.last_name FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.contact_staff_id JOIN Maintenance_Engineers AS T3 ON T2.engineer_id  =  T3.engineer_id

question.en: Which fault log included the most number of faulty parts? List the fault log id, description and record time.
question.pl: Który dziennik usterek zawierał najwięcej uszkodzonych części? Wymień identyfikator dziennika usterek, opis i czas rejestracji.

query.en: SELECT T1.fault_log_entry_id ,  T1.fault_description ,  T1.fault_log_entry_datetime FROM Fault_Log AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log_Parts AS T2 ON T1.fault_log_entry_id  =  T2.fault_log_entry_id GROUP BY T1.fault_log_entry_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.fault_log_entry_id ,  T1.fault_description ,  T1.fault_log_entry_datetime FROM Fault_Log AS T1 JOIN Fault_Log_Parts AS T2 ON T1.fault_log_entry_id  =  T2.fault_log_entry_id GROUP BY T1.fault_log_entry_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which skill is used in fixing the most number of faults? List the skill id and description.
question.pl: Która umiejętność jest używana do naprawy największej liczby usterek? Wymień identyfikator i opis umiejętności.

query.en: SELECT T1.skill_id ,  T1.skill_description FROM Skills AS T1 JOIN Skills_Required_To_Fix AS T2 ON T1.skill_id  =  T2.skill_id GROUP BY T1.skill_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.skill_id ,  T1.skill_description FROM Skills AS T1 JOIN Skills_Required_To_Fix AS T2 ON T1.skill_id  =  T2.skill_id GROUP BY T1.skill_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are all the distinct asset models?
question.pl: Jakie są różne modele aktywów?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT asset_model FROM Assets
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT asset_model FROM Assets

question.en: List the all the assets make, model, details by the disposed date ascendingly.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie marki, modele i szczegóły aktywów według daty usunięcia rosnąco.

query.en: SELECT asset_make ,  asset_model ,  asset_details FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_disposed_date ASC
query.pl: SELECT asset_make ,  asset_model ,  asset_details FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_disposed_date ASC

question.en: Which part has the least chargeable amount? List the part id and amount.
question.pl: Która część ma najmniejszą kwotę do zapłaty? Wymień identyfikator części i kwotę.

query.en: SELECT part_id ,  chargeable_amount FROM Parts ORDER BY chargeable_amount ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT part_id ,  chargeable_amount FROM Parts ORDER BY chargeable_amount ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which company started the earliest the maintenance contract? Show the company name.
question.pl: Która firma najwcześniej zawarła umowę serwisową? Podaj nazwę firmy.

query.en: SELECT T1.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Maintenance_Contracts AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.maintenance_contract_company_id ORDER BY T2.contract_start_date ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Maintenance_Contracts AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.maintenance_contract_company_id ORDER BY T2.contract_start_date ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the description of the type of the company who concluded its contracts most recently?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis typu firmy, która ostatnio zawarła umowy?

query.en: SELECT T1.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Maintenance_Contracts AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.maintenance_contract_company_id JOIN Ref_Company_Types AS T3 ON T1.company_type_code  =  T3.company_type_code ORDER BY T2.contract_end_date DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.company_name FROM Third_Party_Companies AS T1 JOIN Maintenance_Contracts AS T2 ON T1.company_id  =  T2.maintenance_contract_company_id JOIN Ref_Company_Types AS T3 ON T1.company_type_code  =  T3.company_type_code ORDER BY T2.contract_end_date DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which gender makes up the majority of the staff?
question.pl: Która płeć stanowi większość pracowników?

query.en: SELECT gender FROM staff GROUP BY gender ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT gender FROM staff GROUP BY gender ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: How many engineers did each staff contact? List both the contact staff name and number of engineers contacted.
question.pl: Z iloma inżynierami skontaktował się każdy z pracowników? Wymień zarówno nazwisko osoby kontaktowej, jak i liczbę inżynierów, z którymi się skontaktowano.

query.en: SELECT T1.staff_name ,  count(*) FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.contact_staff_id GROUP BY T1.staff_name
query.pl: SELECT T1.staff_name ,  count(*) FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Engineer_Visits AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.contact_staff_id GROUP BY T1.staff_name

question.en: Which assets did not incur any fault log? List the asset model.
question.pl: Które zasoby nie zostały zarejestrowane w dzienniku błędów? Wymień model zasobu.

query.en: SELECT asset_model FROM Assets WHERE asset_id NOT IN (SELECT asset_id FROM Fault_Log)
query.pl: SELECT asset_model FROM Assets WHERE asset_id NOT IN (SELECT asset_id FROM Fault_Log)

question.en: list the local authorities and services provided by all stations.
question.pl: Wymień lokalne władze i usługi świadczone przez wszystkie stacje.

query.en: SELECT local_authority ,  services FROM station
query.pl: SELECT local_authority ,  services FROM station

question.en: show all train numbers and names ordered by their time from early to late.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie numery i nazwy pociągów uporządkowane według czasu od wczesnego do późnego.

query.en: SELECT train_number ,  name FROM train ORDER BY TIME
query.pl: SELECT train_number ,  name FROM train ORDER BY TIME

question.en: Give me the times and numbers of all trains that go to Chennai, ordered by time.
question.pl: Podaj mi godziny i numery wszystkich pociągów jadących do Chennai, uporządkowane według czasu.

query.en: SELECT TIME ,  train_number FROM train WHERE destination  =  'Chennai' ORDER BY TIME
query.pl: SELECT TIME ,  train_number FROM train WHERE destination  =  'Chennai' ORDER BY TIME

question.en: How many trains have 'Express' in their names?
question.pl: Ile pociągów ma w nazwie słowo "Express"?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM train WHERE name LIKE "%Express%"
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM train WHERE name LIKE "%Express%"

question.en: Find the number and time of the train that goes from Chennai to Guruvayur.
question.pl: Znajdź numer i godzinę pociągu kursującego z Chennai do Guruvayur.

query.en: SELECT train_number ,  TIME FROM train WHERE origin  =  'Chennai' AND destination  =  'Guruvayur'
query.pl: SELECT train_number ,  TIME FROM train WHERE origin  =  'Chennai' AND destination  =  'Guruvayur'

question.en: Find the number of trains starting from each origin.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę pociągów wyruszających z każdego miejsca początkowego.

query.en: SELECT origin ,  count(*) FROM train GROUP BY origin
query.pl: SELECT origin ,  count(*) FROM train GROUP BY origin

question.en: Find the name of the train whose route runs through greatest number of stations.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę pociągu, którego trasa przebiega przez największą liczbę stacji.

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM train AS t1 JOIN route AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.train_id GROUP BY t2.train_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM train AS t1 JOIN route AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.train_id GROUP BY t2.train_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the number of trains for each station, as well as the station network name and services.
question.pl: Znajdź liczbę pociągów na każdej stacji, a także nazwę sieci stacji i usługi.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  t1.network_name ,  t1.services FROM station AS t1 JOIN route AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.station_id GROUP BY t2.station_id
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  t1.network_name ,  t1.services FROM station AS t1 JOIN route AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.station_id GROUP BY t2.station_id

question.en: What is the average high temperature for each day of week?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia wysoka temperatura dla każdego dnia tygodnia?

query.en: SELECT avg(high_temperature) ,  day_of_week FROM weekly_weather GROUP BY day_of_week
query.pl: SELECT avg(high_temperature) ,  day_of_week FROM weekly_weather GROUP BY day_of_week

question.en: Give me the maximum low temperature and average precipitation at the Amersham station.
question.pl: Podaj maksymalną niską temperaturę i średnie opady na stacji Amersham.

query.en: SELECT max(t1.low_temperature) ,  avg(t1.precipitation) FROM weekly_weather AS t1 JOIN station AS t2 ON t1.station_id  =  t2.id WHERE t2.network_name  =  "Amersham"
query.pl: SELECT max(t1.low_temperature) ,  avg(t1.precipitation) FROM weekly_weather AS t1 JOIN station AS t2 ON t1.station_id  =  t2.id WHERE t2.network_name  =  "Amersham"

question.en: Find names and times of trains that run through stations for the local authority Chiltern.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy i godziny pociągów przejeżdżających przez stacje lokalnych władz Chiltern.

query.en: SELECT t3.name ,  t3.time FROM station AS t1 JOIN route AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.station_id JOIN train AS t3 ON t2.train_id  =  t3.id WHERE t1.local_authority  =  "Chiltern"
query.pl: SELECT t3.name ,  t3.time FROM station AS t1 JOIN route AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.station_id JOIN train AS t3 ON t2.train_id  =  t3.id WHERE t1.local_authority  =  "Chiltern"

question.en: How many different services are provided by all stations?
question.pl: Ile różnych usług jest świadczonych przez wszystkie stacje?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT services) FROM station
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT services) FROM station

question.en: Find the id and local authority of the station with has the highest average high temperature.
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikator i władze lokalne stacji o najwyższej średniej wysokiej temperaturze.

query.en: SELECT t2.id ,  t2.local_authority FROM weekly_weather AS t1 JOIN station AS t2 ON t1.station_id  =  t2.id GROUP BY t1.station_id ORDER BY avg(high_temperature) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t2.id ,  t2.local_authority FROM weekly_weather AS t1 JOIN station AS t2 ON t1.station_id  =  t2.id GROUP BY t1.station_id ORDER BY avg(high_temperature) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the id and local authority of the station whose maximum precipitation is higher than 50.
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikator i władze lokalne stacji, której maksymalny opad jest wyższy niż 50.

query.en: SELECT t2.id ,  t2.local_authority FROM weekly_weather AS t1 JOIN station AS t2 ON t1.station_id  =  t2.id GROUP BY t1.station_id HAVING max(t1.precipitation)  >  50
query.pl: SELECT t2.id ,  t2.local_authority FROM weekly_weather AS t1 JOIN station AS t2 ON t1.station_id  =  t2.id GROUP BY t1.station_id HAVING max(t1.precipitation)  >  50

question.en: show the lowest low temperature and highest wind speed in miles per hour.
question.pl: pokaż najniższą niską temperaturę i najwyższą prędkość wiatru w milach na godzinę.

query.en: SELECT min(low_temperature) ,  max(wind_speed_mph) FROM weekly_weather

query.en: SELECT T1.school_code FROM department AS T1 JOIN professor AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.school_code ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the max, average, and minimum gpa of all students in each department.

question.en: What is the name and the average gpa of department whose students have the highest average gpa?
question.pl: Jaka jest nazwa i średnia gpa wydziału, którego studenci mają najwyższą średnią gpa?

query.en: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  avg(T1.stu_gpa) FROM student AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY avg(T1.stu_gpa) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  avg(T1.stu_gpa) FROM student AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY avg(T1.stu_gpa) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  avg(T1.stu_gpa) FROM student AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY avg(T1.stu_gpa) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  avg(T1.stu_gpa) FROM student AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY avg(T1.stu_gpa) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the first names of all students who got a grade C in a class?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT stu_fname FROM student AS T1 JOIN enroll AS T2 ON T1.stu_num  =  T2.stu_num WHERE enroll_grade  =  'C'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT stu_fname FROM student AS T1 JOIN enroll AS T2 ON T1.stu_num  =  T2.stu_num WHERE enroll_grade  =  'C'

question.en: What is the name of department where has the smallest number of professors?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się wydział, na którym jest najmniej profesorów?

query.en: SELECT T2.dept_name FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.dept_name FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the name of the department with the fewest professors?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się wydział z najmniejszą liczbą profesorów?

query.en: SELECT T2.dept_name FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.dept_name FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the name of department where has the largest number of professors with a Ph.D. degree?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się wydział, na którym jest najwięcej profesorów ze stopniem doktora?

query.en: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  T1.dept_code FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code WHERE T1.prof_high_degree  =  'Ph.D.' GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  T1.dept_code FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code WHERE T1.prof_high_degree  =  'Ph.D.' GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which department has the most professors with a Ph.D.?
question.pl: Który wydział ma najwięcej profesorów z tytułem doktora?

query.en: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  T1.dept_code FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code WHERE T1.prof_high_degree  =  'Ph.D.' GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.dept_name ,  T1.dept_code FROM professor AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_code  =  T2.dept_code WHERE T1.prof_high_degree  =  'Ph.D.' GROUP BY T1.dept_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the first names of the professors who do not teach a class.
question.pl: Jakie są imiona profesorów, którzy nie prowadzą zajęć.

query.en: SELECT emp_fname FROM employee WHERE emp_jobcode  =  'PROF' EXCEPT SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN CLASS AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.prof_num
query.pl: SELECT emp_fname FROM employee WHERE emp_jobcode  =  'PROF' EXCEPT SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN CLASS AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.prof_num

query.en: SELECT emp_fname FROM employee WHERE emp_jobcode  =  'PROF' EXCEPT SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN CLASS AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.prof_num
query.pl: SELECT emp_fname FROM employee WHERE emp_jobcode  =  'PROF' EXCEPT SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN CLASS AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.prof_num

question.en: What is the first names of the professors from the history department who do not teach a class.
question.pl: Podaj imiona i nazwiska profesorów z wydziału historii, którzy nie prowadzą zajęć.

query.en: SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN professor AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.emp_num JOIN department AS T3 ON T2.dept_code  =  T3.dept_code WHERE T3.dept_name  =  'History' EXCEPT SELECT T4.emp_fname FROM employee AS T4 JOIN CLASS AS T5 ON T4.emp_num  =  T5.prof_num
query.pl: SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN professor AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.emp_num JOIN department AS T3 ON T2.dept_code  =  T3.dept_code WHERE T3.dept_name  =  'Historia' EXCEPT SELECT T4.emp_fname FROM employee AS T4 JOIN CLASS AS T5 ON T4.emp_num  =  T5.prof_num

query.en: SELECT T1.crs_code FROM CLASS AS T1 JOIN enroll AS T2 ON T1.class_code  =  T2.class_code JOIN student AS T3 ON T3.stu_num  =  T2.stu_num WHERE T3.stu_lname  =  'Smithson'

query.en: SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN CLASS AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.prof_num WHERE crs_code  =  'CIS-220' INTERSECT SELECT T1.emp_fname FROM employee AS T1 JOIN CLASS AS T2 ON T1.emp_num  =  T2.prof_num WHERE crs_code  =  'QM-261'

question.en: Find the first name of student who is taking classes from accounting and Computer Info. Systems departments

Systems'

question.en: Find the first name and gpa of the students whose gpa is lower than the average gpa of all students.

question.en: Find the name of the company that produces both furnitures with less than 6 components and furnitures with more than 10 components.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę firmy, która produkuje zarówno meble składające się z mniej niż 6 elementów, jak i meble składające się z więcej niż 10 elementów.

query.en: SELECT t3.name FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID JOIN manufacturer AS t3 ON t2.manufacturer_id  =  t3.manufacturer_id WHERE t1.num_of_component  <  6 INTERSECT SELECT t3.name FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID JOIN manufacturer AS t3 ON t2.manufacturer_id  =  t3.manufacturer_id WHERE t1.num_of_component  >  10
query.pl: SELECT t3.name FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID JOIN manufacturer AS t3 ON t2.manufacturer_id  =  t3.manufacturer_id WHERE t1.num_of_component  <  6 INTERSECT SELECT t3.name FROM furniture AS t1 JOIN furniture_manufacte AS t2 ON t1.Furniture_ID  =  t2.Furniture_ID JOIN manufacturer AS t3 ON t2.manufacturer_id  =  t3.manufacturer_id WHERE t1.num_of_component  >  10

question.en: Find employee with ID and name of the country presently where (s)he is working.
question.pl: Znajdź pracownika z identyfikatorem i nazwą kraju, w którym obecnie pracuje.

query.en: SELECT T1.employee_id ,  T4.country_name FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN locations AS T3 ON T2.location_id  =  T3.location_id JOIN countries AS T4 ON T3.country_id  =  T4.country_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.employee_id ,  T4.country_name FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN locations AS T3 ON T2.location_id  =  T3.location_id JOIN countries AS T4 ON T3.country_id  =  T4.country_id

query.pl: SELECT T1.employee_id ,  T4.country_name FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN locations AS T3 ON T2.location_id  =  T3.location_id JOIN countries AS T4 ON T3.country_id  =  T4.country_id

query.en: SELECT T2.department_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id GROUP BY T2.department_name
query.pl: SELECT T2.department_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id GROUP BY T2.department_name

question.en: Give the name of each department and the number of employees in each.
question.pl: Podaj nazwę każdego działu i liczbę pracowników w każdym z nich.

query.en: SELECT T2.department_name ,  COUNT(*) FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id GROUP BY T2.department_name

question.en: Can you return all detailed info of jobs which was done by any of the employees who is presently earning a salary on and above 12000?
question.pl: Czy możesz zwrócić wszystkie szczegółowe informacje o zadaniach, które zostały wykonane przez któregokolwiek z pracowników, którzy obecnie zarabiają pensję powyżej 12000?

query.en: SELECT * FROM  job_history AS T1 JOIN employees AS T2 ON T1.employee_id  =  T2.employee_id WHERE T2.salary  >=  12000
query.pl: SELECT * FROM  job_history AS T1 JOIN employees AS T2 ON T1.employee_id  =  T2.employee_id WHERE T2.salary  >=  12000

question.en: display job title and average salary of employees.
question.pl: Wyświetl nazwę stanowiska i średnie wynagrodzenie pracowników.

query.en: SELECT job_title ,  AVG(salary) FROM employees AS T1 JOIN jobs AS T2 ON T1.job_id  =  T2.job_id GROUP BY T2.job_title

query.en: SELECT department_id ,  SUM(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: display the department ID, full name (first and last name), salary for those employees who is highest salary in every department.
question.pl: wyświetl identyfikator działu, pełne imię i nazwisko (imię i nazwisko), wynagrodzenie dla tych pracowników, którzy mają najwyższe wynagrodzenie w każdym dziale.

question.en: display the first and last name, department, city, and state province for each employee.
question.pl: wyświetl imię i nazwisko, dział, miasto i województwo dla każdego pracownika.

query.en: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T2.department_name ,  T3.city ,  T3.state_province FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN locations AS T3 ON T2.location_id  =  T3.location_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name ,  T2.department_name ,  T3.city ,  T3.state_province FROM employees AS T1 JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN locations AS T3 ON T2.location_id  =  T3.location_id

question.en: List the name and country of origin for all singers who have produced songs with rating above 9.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.artist_name ,  T1.country FROM artist AS T1 JOIN song AS T2 ON T1.artist_name  =  T2.artist_name WHERE T2.rating  >  9

question.en: Return the gender and name of artist who produced the song with the lowest resolution.

question.en: What are the names of the songs whose rating is below the rating of all songs in English?

query.en: SELECT song_name FROM song WHERE rating  <   (SELECT min(rating) FROM song WHERE languages  =  'english')
query.pl: SELECT song_name FROM song WHERE rating  <   (SELECT min(rating) FROM song WHERE languages  =  'angielski')

question.en: What are the song names for every song whose rating is less than the minimum rating for English songs?

query.pl: SELECT song_name FROM song WHERE rating  <   (SELECT min(rating) FROM song WHERE languages  =  'angielski')

query.en: SELECT f_id FROM song WHERE resolution  >  (SELECT max(resolution) FROM song WHERE rating  <  8)

question.en: What is ids of the songs whose resolution is higher than the average resolution of songs in modern genre?

question.en: Find the top 3 artists who have the largest number of songs works whose language is Bangla.
question.pl: Znajdź 3 najlepszych artystów, którzy mają największą liczbę utworów w języku Bangla.

query.en: SELECT T1.artist_name FROM artist AS T1 JOIN song AS T2 ON T1.artist_name  =  T2.artist_name WHERE T2.languages  =  "bangla" GROUP BY T2.artist_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT T1.artist_name FROM artist AS T1 JOIN song AS T2 ON T1.artist_name  =  T2.artist_name WHERE T2.languages  =  "bangla" GROUP BY T2.artist_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3

question.en: List the id, genre and artist name of English songs ordered by rating.
question.pl: Wymień id, gatunek i nazwę wykonawcy angielskich piosenek uporządkowanych według oceny.

query.en: SELECT f_id ,  genre_is ,  artist_name FROM song WHERE languages  =   "english" ORDER BY rating
query.pl: SELECT f_id ,  genre_is ,  artist_name FROM song WHERE languages  =   "angielski" ORDER BY rating

question.en: List the duration, file size and format of songs whose genre is pop, ordered by title?
question.pl: Wymień czas trwania, rozmiar pliku i format utworów, których gatunek to pop, uporządkowanych według tytułu?

query.en: SELECT T1.duration ,  T1.file_size ,  T1.formats FROM files AS T1 JOIN song AS T2 ON T1.f_id  =  T2.f_id WHERE T2.genre_is  =  "pop" ORDER BY T2.song_name
query.pl: SELECT T1.duration ,  T1.file_size ,  T1.formats FROM files AS T1 JOIN song AS T2 ON T1.f_id  =  T2.f_id WHERE T2.genre_is  =  "pop" ORDER BY T2.song_name

query.pl: SELECT T2.team_id ,  T2.rank FROM home_game AS T1 JOIN team AS T2 ON T1.team_id  =  T2.team_id WHERE T1.year  =  2014 GROUP BY T1.team_id ORDER BY avg(T1.attendance) DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: Which team offers the lowest average salary? Give me the name and id of the team.
question.pl: Która drużyna oferuje najniższą średnią pensję? Podaj nazwę i identyfikator drużyny.

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.team_id FROM team AS T1 JOIN salary AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.team_id GROUP BY T1.team_id ORDER BY avg(T2.salary) ASC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.team_id FROM team AS T1 JOIN salary AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.team_id GROUP BY T1.team_id ORDER BY avg(T2.salary) ASC LIMIT 1;

query.pl: SELECT state FROM park GROUP BY state HAVING count(*)  >  2;

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM team_franchise WHERE active = 'Y';

question.en: Which cities have 2 to 4 parks?
question.pl: Które miasta mają od 2 do 4 parków?

query.en: SELECT city FROM park GROUP BY city HAVING count(*) BETWEEN 2 AND 4;

question.en: Which park had most attendances in 2008?
question.pl: Który park miał największą frekwencję w 2008 roku?

query.en: SELECT T2.park_name FROM home_game AS T1 JOIN park AS T2 ON T1.park_id  =  T2.park_id WHERE T1.year = 2008 ORDER BY T1.attendance DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT T2.park_name FROM home_game AS T1 JOIN park AS T2 ON T1.park_id  =  T2.park_id WHERE T1.year = 2008 ORDER BY T1.attendance DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: Which park did the most people attend in 2008?
question.pl: Do którego parku uczęszczało najwięcej osób w 2008 roku?

query.en: SELECT T2.park_name FROM home_game AS T1 JOIN park AS T2 ON T1.park_id  =  T2.park_id WHERE T1.year = 2008 ORDER BY T1.attendance DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: How many camera lenses have a focal length longer than 15 mm?

query.en: SELECT max(height) ,  avg(height) FROM mountain
query.pl: SELECT max(height) ,  avg(height) FROM mountain

question.en: What are the average prominence of the mountains in country 'Morocco'?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia wysokość gór w kraju Maroko?

query.en: SELECT avg(prominence) FROM mountain WHERE country  =  'Morocco'
query.pl: SELECT avg(prominence) FROM mountain WHERE country  =  'Maroko'

question.en: What are the name, height and prominence of mountains which do not belong to the range 'Aberdare Range'?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się góry, które nie należą do pasma "Aberdare Range"?

query.en: SELECT name ,  height ,  prominence FROM mountain WHERE range != 'Aberdare Range'
query.pl: SELECT name ,  height ,  prominence FROM mountain WHERE range != 'Aberdare Range'

question.en: What are the id and name of the photos for mountains?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i nazwa zdjęć gór?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id WHERE T1.height  >  4000
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id WHERE T1.height  >  4000

question.en: What are the id and name of the mountains that have at least 2 photos?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory i nazwy gór, które mają co najmniej 2 zdjęcia?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What are the names of the cameras that have taken picture of the most mountains?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się aparaty, które sfotografowały najwięcej gór?

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM photos AS T1 JOIN camera_lens AS T2 ON T1.camera_lens_id  =  T2.id GROUP BY T2.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM photos AS T1 JOIN camera_lens AS T2 ON T1.camera_lens_id  =  T2.id GROUP BY T2.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the names of photos taken with the lens brand 'Sigma' or 'Olympus'?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się zdjęcia wykonane obiektywem marki "Sigma" lub "Olympus"?

query.en: SELECT T1.name FROM camera_lens AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T1.id WHERE T1.brand  =  'Sigma' OR T1.brand  =  'Olympus'
query.pl: SELECT T1.name FROM camera_lens AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T1.id WHERE T1.brand  =  'Sigma' OR T1.brand  =  'Olympus'

question.en: How many different kinds of lens brands are there?
question.pl: Ile jest różnych marek obiektywów?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT brand) FROM camera_lens
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT brand) FROM camera_lens

question.en: How many camera lenses are not used in taking any photos?
question.pl: Ile obiektywów aparatu nie jest używanych do robienia zdjęć?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM camera_lens WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT camera_lens_id FROM photos )
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM camera_lens WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT camera_lens_id FROM photos )

question.en: How many distinct kinds of camera lenses are used to take photos of mountains in the country 'Ethiopia'?
question.pl: Ile różnych rodzajów obiektywów jest używanych do robienia zdjęć gór w kraju "Etiopia"?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT T2.camera_lens_id) FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id WHERE T1.country  =  'Ethiopia'
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT T2.camera_lens_id) FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id WHERE T1.country  =  'Etiopia'

question.en: List the brands of lenses that took both a picture of mountains with range 'Toubkal Atlas' and a picture of mountains with range 'Lasta Massif'
question.pl: Wymień marki obiektywów, którymi wykonano zarówno zdjęcie gór o nazwie "Atlas Toubkal", jak i zdjęcie gór o nazwie "Masyw Lasta".

query.en: SELECT T3.brand FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id JOIN camera_lens AS T3 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.range  =  'Toubkal Atlas' INTERSECT SELECT T3.brand FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id JOIN camera_lens AS T3 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.range  =  'Lasta Massif'
query.pl: SELECT T3.brand FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id JOIN camera_lens AS T3 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.range  =  'Atlas Toubkal' INTERSECT SELECT T3.brand FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id JOIN camera_lens AS T3 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T3.id WHERE T1.range  =  'Masyw Lasta'

query.en: SELECT name ,  prominence FROM mountain EXCEPT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.prominence FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id JOIN camera_lens AS T3 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.brand  =  'Sigma'
query.pl: SELECT name ,  prominence FROM mountain EXCEPT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.prominence FROM mountain AS T1 JOIN photos AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.mountain_id JOIN camera_lens AS T3 ON T2.camera_lens_id  =  T3.id WHERE T3.brand  =  'Sigma'

question.en: Which claims caused more than 2 settlements or have the maximum claim value? List the date the claim was made and the claim id.
question.pl: Które roszczenia spowodowały więcej niż 2 ugody lub mają maksymalną wartość roszczenia? Podaj datę zgłoszenia roszczenia i jego identyfikator.

query.en: SELECT T1.Date_Claim_Made ,  T1.Claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.Claim_id  =  T2.Claim_id GROUP BY T1.Claim_id HAVING count(*)  >  2 UNION SELECT T1.Date_Claim_Made ,  T1.Claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.Claim_id  =  T2.Claim_id WHERE T1.Amount_Claimed  =  ( SELECT max(Amount_Claimed) FROM Claims )
query.pl: SELECT T1.Date_Claim_Made ,  T1.Claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.Claim_id  =  T2.Claim_id GROUP BY T1.Claim_id HAVING count(*)  >  2 UNION SELECT T1.Date_Claim_Made ,  T1.Claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.Claim_id  =  T2.Claim_id WHERE T1.Amount_Claimed  =  ( SELECT max(Amount_Claimed) FROM Claims )

question.en: Find the number of settlements each claim corresponds to. Show the number together with the claim id.

query.en: SELECT T1.Claim_id ,  count(*) FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.Claim_id ,  count(*) FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id

question.en: Which claim incurred the most number of settlements? List the claim id, the date the claim was made, and the number.
question.pl: Którego roszczenia dotyczyła największa liczba ugód? Wymień identyfikator roszczenia, datę jego złożenia i liczbę.

query.en: SELECT T1.claim_id ,  T1.date_claim_made ,  count(*) FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.claim_id ,  T1.date_claim_made ,  count(*) FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the claim id and claim date of the claim that incurred the most settlement count. Also tell me the count.

query.en: SELECT T1.claim_id ,  T1.date_claim_made ,  count(*) FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.claim_id ,  T1.date_claim_made ,  count(*) FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: How many settlements were made on the claim with the most recent claim settlement date? List the number and the claim id.
question.pl: Ile ugód zostało zawartych w związku z roszczeniem z ostatnią datą ugody? Wymień liczbę i identyfikator roszczenia.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY T1.Date_Claim_Settled DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY T1.Date_Claim_Settled DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the claim id and the number of settlements made for the claim with the most recent settlement date.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY T1.Date_Claim_Settled DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  T1.claim_id FROM Claims AS T1 JOIN Settlements AS T2 ON T1.claim_id  =  T2.claim_id GROUP BY T1.claim_id ORDER BY T1.Date_Claim_Settled DESC LIMIT 1

query.pl: SELECT T4.name FROM stay AS T1 JOIN patient AS T2 ON T1.Patient  =  T2.SSN JOIN Prescribes AS T3 ON T3.Patient  =  T2.SSN JOIN Medication AS T4 ON T3.Medication  =  T4.Code WHERE room  =  111

question.en: What is the name of the nurse has the most appointments?

question.en: Find the name of physicians who are affiliated with both Surgery and Psychiatry departments.

question.en: Find the names of patients who are not using the medication of Procrastin-X.

query.en: SELECT name FROM patient EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM patient AS T1 JOIN Prescribes AS T2 ON T2.Patient  =  T1.SSN JOIN Medication AS T3 ON T2.Medication  =  T3.Code WHERE T3.name  =  'Procrastin-X'

query.pl: SELECT Headquarters FROM company ORDER BY Sales_in_Billion DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the different headquarters and number of companies at each headquarter.

query.en: SELECT Headquarters ,  COUNT(*) FROM company GROUP BY Headquarters
query.pl: SELECT Headquarters ,  COUNT(*) FROM company GROUP BY Headquarters

question.en: Show the most common headquarter for companies.
question.pl: Pokaż najczęstsze siedziby firm.

query.en: SELECT Headquarters FROM company GROUP BY Headquarters ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the headquarters that have at least two companies.

query.en: SELECT Headquarters FROM company GROUP BY Headquarters HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT Headquarters FROM company GROUP BY Headquarters HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the headquarters that have both companies in banking industry and companies in oil and gas industry.
question.pl: Wskaż siedzibę, w której znajdują się zarówno firmy z branży bankowej, jak i firmy z branży naftowej i gazowej.

query.en: SELECT Headquarters FROM company WHERE Industry  =  "Banking" INTERSECT SELECT Headquarters FROM company WHERE Industry  =  "Oil and gas"
query.pl: SELECT Headquarters FROM company WHERE Industry  =  "Bankowość" INTERSECT SELECT Headquarters FROM company WHERE Industry  =  "Ropa i gaz"

question.en: Show the names of companies and of employees.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy firm i pracowników.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Name FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Name FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID

question.en: Show names of companies and that of employees in descending order of number of years working for that employee.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy firm i pracowników w porządku malejącym według liczby lat pracy dla danego pracownika.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Name FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID ORDER BY T1.Year_working
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Name FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID ORDER BY T1.Year_working

question.en: Show the names of employees that work for companies with sales bigger than 200.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska pracowników, którzy pracują dla firm o sprzedaży większej niż 200.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID WHERE T3.Sales_in_Billion  >  200
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID WHERE T3.Sales_in_Billion  >  200

question.en: Show the names of companies and the number of employees they have
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy firm i liczbę zatrudnianych przez nie pracowników.

query.en: SELECT T3.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID GROUP BY T3.Name
query.pl: SELECT T3.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM employment AS T1 JOIN people AS T2 ON T1.People_ID  =  T2.People_ID JOIN company AS T3 ON T1.Company_ID  =  T3.Company_ID GROUP BY T3.Name

question.en: List the names of people that are not employed by any company

question.en: What are the names of the employees who authorised the destruction and the employees who destroyed the corresponding documents?

query.en: SELECT T2.employee_name ,  T3.employee_name FROM Documents_to_be_destroyed AS T1 JOIN Employees AS T2 ON T1.Destruction_Authorised_by_Employee_ID = T2.employee_id JOIN Employees AS T3 ON T1.Destroyed_by_Employee_ID = T3.employee_id;

question.en: What are the distinct grant amount for the grants where the documents were sent before '1986-08-26 20:49:27' and grant were ended after '1989-03-16 18:27:16'?
question.pl: Jaka jest odrębna kwota dotacji dla dotacji, w przypadku których dokumenty zostały wysłane przed "1986-08-26 20:49:27", a dotacja została zakończona po "1989-03-16 18:27:16"?

query.en: SELECT T1.grant_amount FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id WHERE T2.sent_date  <  '1986-08-26 20:49:27' INTERSECT SELECT grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_end_date  >  '1989-03-16 18:27:16'
query.pl: SELECT T1.grant_amount FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id WHERE T2.sent_date  <  '1986-08-26 20:49:27' INTERSECT SELECT grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_end_date  >  '1989-03-16 18:27:16'

query.en: SELECT T1.grant_amount FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id WHERE T2.sent_date  <  '1986-08-26 20:49:27' INTERSECT SELECT grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_end_date  >  '1989-03-16 18:27:16'
query.pl: SELECT T1.grant_amount FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id WHERE T2.sent_date  <  '1986-08-26 20:49:27' INTERSECT SELECT grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_end_date  >  '1989-03-16 18:27:16'

question.en: List the project details of the project both producing patent and paper as outcomes.
question.pl: Wymień szczegóły projektu, zarówno patent, jak i papier jako wyniki.

query.en: SELECT T1.project_details FROM Projects AS T1 JOIN Project_outcomes AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id WHERE T2.outcome_code  =  'Paper' INTERSECT SELECT T1.project_details FROM Projects AS T1 JOIN Project_outcomes AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id WHERE T2.outcome_code  =  'Patent'
query.pl: SELECT T1.project_details FROM Projects AS T1 JOIN Project_outcomes AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id WHERE T2.outcome_code  =  'Papier' INTERSECT SELECT T1.project_details FROM Projects AS T1 JOIN Project_outcomes AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id WHERE T2.outcome_code  =  'Patent'

question.en: What is the total grant amount of the organisations described as research?
question.pl: Jaka jest łączna kwota dotacji dla organizacji określanych jako badawcze?

query.en: SELECT sum(grant_amount) FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Organisations AS T2 ON T1.organisation_id  =  T2.organisation_id JOIN organisation_Types AS T3 ON T2.organisation_type  =  T3.organisation_type WHERE T3.organisation_type_description  =  'Research'
query.pl: SELECT sum(grant_amount) FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Organisations AS T2 ON T1.organisation_id  =  T2.organisation_id JOIN organisation_Types AS T3 ON T2.organisation_type  =  T3.organisation_type WHERE T3.organisation_type_description  =  'Badania'

query.en: SELECT sum(grant_amount) FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Organisations AS T2 ON T1.organisation_id  =  T2.organisation_id JOIN organisation_Types AS T3 ON T2.organisation_type  =  T3.organisation_type WHERE T3.organisation_type_description  =  'Research'
query.pl: SELECT sum(grant_amount) FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Organisations AS T2 ON T1.organisation_id  =  T2.organisation_id JOIN organisation_Types AS T3 ON T2.organisation_type  =  T3.organisation_type WHERE T3.organisation_type_description  =  'Badania'

question.en: List from which date and to which date these staff work: project staff of the project which hires the most staffs
question.pl: Wymień, od kiedy i do kiedy pracuje ten personel: personel projektu, który zatrudnia najwięcej pracowników

query.en: SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE project_id IN( SELECT project_id FROM Project_Staff GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE role_code  =  'leader'
query.pl: SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE project_id IN( SELECT project_id FROM Project_Staff GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE role_code  =  'lider'

question.en: From what date and to what date do the staff work on a project that has the most staff and has staff in a leader role?

query.en: SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE project_id IN( SELECT project_id FROM Project_Staff GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE role_code  =  'leader'
query.pl: SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE project_id IN( SELECT project_id FROM Project_Staff GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION SELECT date_from ,  date_to FROM Project_Staff WHERE role_code  =  'lider'

question.en: Find the organisation ids and details of the organisations which are involved in

query.pl: SELECT T2.organisation_id ,  T2.organisation_details FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Organisations AS T2 ON T1.organisation_id  =  T2.organisation_id GROUP BY T2.organisation_id HAVING sum(T1.grant_amount)  >  6000

question.en: Find out the send dates of the documents with the grant amount of more than 5000 were granted by organisation type described
question.pl: Sprawdź daty wysłania dokumentów z kwotą dotacji powyżej 5000, które zostały przyznane według opisanego typu organizacji.

query.en: SELECT T1.sent_date FROM documents AS T1 JOIN Grants AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Organisations AS T3 ON T2.organisation_id  =  T3.organisation_id JOIN organisation_Types AS T4 ON T3.organisation_type  =  T4.organisation_type WHERE T2.grant_amount  >  5000 AND T4.organisation_type_description  =  'Research'
query.pl: SELECT T1.sent_date FROM documents AS T1 JOIN Grants AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Organisations AS T3 ON T2.organisation_id  =  T3.organisation_id JOIN organisation_Types AS T4 ON T3.organisation_type  =  T4.organisation_type WHERE T2.grant_amount  >  5000 AND T4.organisation_type_description  =  'Badania'

question.en: What are the response received dates for the documents described as 'Regular' or granted with more than 100?
question.pl: Jakie są daty otrzymania odpowiedzi dla dokumentów opisanych jako "Regularne" lub przyznanych z liczbą ponad 100?

query.en: SELECT T1.response_received_date FROM Documents AS T1 JOIN Document_Types AS T2 ON T1.document_type_code  =  T2.document_type_code JOIN Grants AS T3 ON T1.grant_id  =  T3.grant_id WHERE T2.document_description  =  'Regular' OR T3.grant_amount  >  100
query.pl: SELECT T1.response_received_date FROM Documents AS T1 JOIN Document_Types AS T2 ON T1.document_type_code  =  T2.document_type_code JOIN Grants AS T3 ON T1.grant_id  =  T3.grant_id WHERE T2.document_description  =  'Regularny' OR T3.grant_amount  >  100

query.en: SELECT T1.response_received_date FROM Documents AS T1 JOIN Document_Types AS T2 ON T1.document_type_code  =  T2.document_type_code JOIN Grants AS T3 ON T1.grant_id  =  T3.grant_id WHERE T2.document_description  =  'Regular' OR T3.grant_amount  >  100
query.pl: SELECT T1.response_received_date FROM Documents AS T1 JOIN Document_Types AS T2 ON T1.document_type_code  =  T2.document_type_code JOIN Grants AS T3 ON T1.grant_id  =  T3.grant_id WHERE T2.document_description  =  'Regularny' OR T3.grant_amount  >  100

query.en: SELECT T1.task_details ,  T1.task_id ,  T2.project_id FROM Tasks AS T1 JOIN Projects AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id WHERE T2.project_details  =  'omnis' UNION SELECT T1.task_details ,  T1.task_id ,  T2.project_id FROM Tasks AS T1 JOIN Projects AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id JOIN Project_outcomes AS T3 ON T2.project_id  =  T3.project_id GROUP BY T2.project_id HAVING count(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.task_details ,  T1.task_id ,  T2.project_id FROM Tasks AS T1 JOIN Projects AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id WHERE T2.project_details  =  'omnis' UNION SELECT T1.task_details ,  T1.task_id ,  T2.project_id FROM Tasks AS T1 JOIN Projects AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id JOIN Project_outcomes AS T3 ON T2.project_id  =  T3.project_id GROUP BY T2.project_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

query.pl: SELECT T1.task_details ,  T1.task_id ,  T2.project_id FROM Tasks AS T1 JOIN Projects AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id WHERE T2.project_details  =  'omnis' UNION SELECT T1.task_details ,  T1.task_id ,  T2.project_id FROM Tasks AS T1 JOIN Projects AS T2 ON T1.project_id  =  T2.project_id JOIN Project_outcomes AS T3 ON T2.project_id  =  T3.project_id GROUP BY T2.project_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

question.en: For grants with both documents described as 'Regular' and documents described as 'Initial Application', list its start date.
question.pl: W przypadku dotacji z dokumentami opisanymi jako "Regularne" i dokumentami opisanymi jako "Wstępny wniosek", podaj datę ich rozpoczęcia.

query.en: SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Regular' INTERSECT SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Initial Application'
query.pl: SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Regularny' INTERSECT SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Aplikacja początkowa'

question.en: For grants that have descriptions of Regular and Initial Applications, what are their start dates?
question.pl: Jakie są daty rozpoczęcia grantów opisanych jako wnioski regularne i wstępne?

query.en: SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Regular' INTERSECT SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Initial Application'
query.pl: SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Regularny' INTERSECT SELECT T1.grant_start_date FROM Grants AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.grant_id  =  T2.grant_id JOIN Document_Types AS T3 ON T2.document_type_code  =  T3.document_type_code WHERE T3.document_description  =  'Aplikacja początkowa'

question.en: How many documents can one grant have at most? List the grant id and number.
question.pl: Ile dokumentów może zawierać jedna dotacja? Wymień identyfikator i numer grantu.

query.en: SELECT grant_id ,  count(*) FROM Documents GROUP BY grant_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT grant_id ,  count(*) FROM Documents GROUP BY grant_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: For each grant id, how many documents does it have, and which one has the most?
question.pl: Ile dokumentów ma każdy identyfikator dotacji i który z nich ma ich najwięcej?

query.en: SELECT grant_id ,  count(*) FROM Documents GROUP BY grant_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT grant_id ,  count(*) FROM Documents GROUP BY grant_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Jak nazywają się wszyscy przyjaciele Alice?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T4.name FROM PersonFriend AS T1 JOIN Person AS T2 ON T1.name  =  T2.name JOIN PersonFriend AS T3 ON T1.friend  =  T3.name JOIN PersonFriend AS T4 ON T3.friend  =  T4.name WHERE T2.name  =  'Alice' AND T4.name != 'Alice'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T4.name FROM PersonFriend AS T1 JOIN Person AS T2 ON T1.name  =  T2.name JOIN PersonFriend AS T3 ON T1.friend  =  T3.name JOIN PersonFriend AS T4 ON T3.friend  =  T4.name WHERE T2.name  =  'Alice' AND T4.name != 'Alice'

question.en: How many members are there?
