query.pl: SELECT Name FROM member WHERE Country  =  "Stany Zjednoczone" OR Country  =  "Kanada"

question.en: Show the different countries and the number of members from each.
question.pl: Pokaż różne kraje i liczbę członków z każdego z nich.

query.en: SELECT Country ,  COUNT(*) FROM member GROUP BY Country

question.en: Show the most common country across members.
question.pl: Pokaż najpopularniejszy kraj wśród członków.

query.en: SELECT Country FROM member GROUP BY Country ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Country FROM member GROUP BY Country ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the leader names and locations of colleges.
question.pl: Pokaż liderom nazwy i lokalizacje uczelni.

query.en: SELECT Leader_Name ,  College_Location FROM college
query.pl: SELECT Leader_Name ,  College_Location FROM college

question.en: Show the names of members and names of colleges they go to.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska członków i nazwy uczelni, do których uczęszczają.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Name FROM college AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.College_ID  =  T2.College_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Name FROM college AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.College_ID  =  T2.College_ID

query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.Leader_Name FROM college AS T1 JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.College_ID  =  T2.College_ID WHERE T2.Country  =  "Kanada"

question.en: List the name of a building along with the name of a company whose office is in the building.
question.pl: Wymień nazwę budynku wraz z nazwą firmy, której biuro znajduje się w tym budynku.

query.en: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id
query.pl: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id

question.en: For each company, return the company name and the name of the building its office is located in.

query.en: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id
query.pl: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id

question.en: Show the names of the buildings that have more than one company offices.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy budynków, w których znajduje się więcej niż jedno biuro firmy.

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T1.building_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T1.building_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T1.building_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T1.building_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T1.building_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T1.building_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM Office_locations AS T1 JOIN buildings AS T2 ON T1.building_id  =  T2.id JOIN Companies AS T3 ON T1.company_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T1.building_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.pl: SELECT T1.Product_Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM Products AS T1 JOIN Products_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Product_ID  =  T2.Product_ID GROUP BY T1.Product_Name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

query.en: SELECT T1.Product_Name FROM Products AS T1 JOIN Products_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Product_ID  =  T2.Product_ID GROUP BY T1.Product_Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2 ORDER BY T1.Product_Name
query.pl: SELECT T1.Product_Name FROM Products AS T1 JOIN Products_in_Events AS T2 ON T1.Product_ID  =  T2.Product_ID GROUP BY T1.Product_Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2 ORDER BY T1.Product_Name

question.en: For each nomination, show the name of the artwork and name of the festival where it is nominated.
question.pl: Przy każdej nominacji podaj nazwę dzieła i nazwę festiwalu, na którym zostało nominowane.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Festival_Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T3.Festival_Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID

question.en: Show distinct types of artworks that are nominated in festivals in 2007.
question.pl: Pokaż różne rodzaje dzieł sztuki, które są nominowane na festiwalach w 2007 roku.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Type FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID WHERE T3.Year  =  2007
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T2.Type FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID WHERE T3.Year  =  2007

question.en: Show the names of artworks in ascending order of the year they are nominated in.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy dzieł sztuki w kolejności rosnącej od roku, w którym zostały nominowane.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID ORDER BY T3.Year
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID ORDER BY T3.Year

query.en: SELECT T3.Festival_Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID WHERE T2.Type  =  "Program Talent Show"
query.pl: SELECT T3.Festival_Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID WHERE T2.Type  =  "Program Talent Show"

question.en: Show the ids and names of festivals that have at least two nominations for artworks.
question.pl: Pokaż identyfikatory i nazwy festiwali, które mają co najmniej dwie nominacje do dzieł sztuki.

query.en: SELECT T1.Festival_ID ,  T3.Festival_Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID GROUP BY T1.Festival_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.Festival_ID ,  T3.Festival_Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID GROUP BY T1.Festival_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the id, name of each festival and the number of artworks it has nominated.
question.pl: Pokaż identyfikator, nazwę każdego festiwalu i liczbę nominowanych dzieł sztuki.

query.en: SELECT T1.Festival_ID ,  T3.Festival_Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID GROUP BY T1.Festival_ID
query.pl: SELECT T1.Festival_ID ,  T3.Festival_Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID GROUP BY T1.Festival_ID

question.en: Please show different types of artworks with the corresponding number of artworks of each type.

query.en: SELECT TYPE ,  COUNT(*) FROM artwork GROUP BY TYPE

question.en: List the year in which there are more than one festivals.

query.en: SELECT YEAR FROM festival_detail GROUP BY YEAR HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

question.en: List the name of artworks that are not nominated.

question.en: Show the number of audience in year 2008 or 2010.

question.en: What are the total number of the audiences who visited any of the festivals?

query.pl: SELECT sum(Num_of_Audience) FROM festival_detail

question.en: In which year are there festivals both inside the 'United States' and outside the 'United States'?
question.pl: W którym roku odbywają się festiwale zarówno w Stanach Zjednoczonych, jak i poza nimi?

query.en: SELECT YEAR FROM festival_detail WHERE LOCATION  =  'United States' INTERSECT SELECT YEAR FROM festival_detail WHERE LOCATION != 'United States'
query.pl: SELECT YEAR FROM festival_detail WHERE LOCATION  =  'Stany Zjednoczone' INTERSECT SELECT YEAR FROM festival_detail WHERE LOCATION != 'Stany Zjednoczone'

question.en: Show all distinct product categories along with the number of mailshots in each category.

query.en: SELECT product_category ,  count(*) FROM mailshot_campaigns GROUP BY product_category
query.pl: SELECT product_category ,  count(*) FROM mailshot_campaigns GROUP BY product_category

question.en: Show the name and phone of the customer without any mailshot.

query.en: SELECT customer_name ,  customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM mailshot_customers)
query.pl: SELECT customer_name ,  customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM mailshot_customers)

question.en: Show the name and phone for customers with a mailshot with outcome code 'No Response'.
question.pl: Pokaż imię i nazwisko oraz numer telefonu dla klientów, którzy otrzymali wiadomość e-mail z kodem wyniku "Brak odpowiedzi".

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_phone FROM customers AS T1 JOIN mailshot_customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.outcome_code  =  'No Response'
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_phone FROM customers AS T1 JOIN mailshot_customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.outcome_code  =  'Brak odpowiedzi'

question.en: Show the outcome code of mailshots along with the number of mailshots in each outcome code.
question.pl: Pokaż kod wyniku wiadomości e-mail wraz z liczbą wiadomości e-mail w każdym kodzie wyniku.

query.en: SELECT outcome_code ,  count(*) FROM mailshot_customers GROUP BY outcome_code
query.pl: SELECT outcome_code ,  count(*) FROM mailshot_customers GROUP BY outcome_code

question.en: Show the names of customers who have at least 2 mailshots with outcome code 'Order'.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy klientów, którzy mają co najmniej 2 wiadomości e-mail z kodem wyniku "Zamówienie".

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE outcome_code  =  'Order' GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE outcome_code  =  'Zamówienie' GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the names of customers who have the most mailshots.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy klientów, którzy mają najwięcej wiadomości e-mail.

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the name and payment method of customers who have both mailshots in 'Order' outcome and mailshots in 'No Response' outcome.
question.pl: Jaka jest nazwa i metoda płatności klientów, którzy mają zarówno wiadomości e-mail w wyniku "Zamówienia", jak i wiadomości e-mail w wyniku "Brak odpowiedzi".

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  T2.payment_method FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T1.outcome_code  =  'Order' INTERSECT SELECT T2.customer_name ,  T2.payment_method FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T1.outcome_code  =  'No Response'
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  T2.payment_method FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T1.outcome_code  =  'Zamówienie' INTERSECT SELECT T2.customer_name ,  T2.payment_method FROM mailshot_customers AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T1.outcome_code  =  'Brak odpowiedzi'

question.en: Show the premise type and address type code for all customer addresses.

query.en: SELECT T2.premises_type ,  T1.address_type_code FROM customer_addresses AS T1 JOIN premises AS T2 ON T1.premise_id  =  T2.premise_id

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT address_type_code FROM customer_addresses

question.en: Show the shipping charge and customer id for customer orders with order status Cancelled or Paid.

question.en: How many department stores does the store chain South have?

question.en: Return the distinct name of customers whose order status is Pending, in the order of customer id.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "Pending" ORDER BY T2.customer_id
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "W toku" ORDER BY T2.customer_id

question.en: Find the name and address of the customers who have both New and Pending orders.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy i adresy klientów, którzy mają zarówno nowe, jak i oczekujące zamówienia.

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "New" INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "Pending"
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "Nowy" INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_address FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  "W toku"

question.en: Return ids of all the products that are supplied by supplier id 2 and are more expensive than the average price of all products.
question.pl: Zwróć identyfikatory wszystkich produktów, które są dostarczane przez dostawcę o identyfikatorze 2 i są droższe niż średnia cena wszystkich produktów.

query.en: SELECT T1.product_id FROM product_suppliers AS T1 JOIN products AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id WHERE T1.supplier_id  =  2 AND T2.product_price  >  (SELECT avg(product_price) FROM products)
query.pl: SELECT T1.product_id FROM product_suppliers AS T1 JOIN products AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id WHERE T1.supplier_id  =  2 AND T2.product_price  >  (SELECT avg(product_price) FROM products)

query.en: SELECT T1.supplier_name ,  T1.supplier_phone FROM Suppliers AS T1 JOIN supplier_addresses AS T2 ON T1.supplier_id  =  T2.supplier_id JOIN addresses AS T3 ON T2.address_id  =  T3.address_id ORDER BY T3.address_details

question.en: Return the ids of all products that were ordered more than three times or supplied more than 80000.

query.en: SELECT avg(T3.Total_Passengers) FROM aircraft AS T1 JOIN airport_aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN airport AS T3 ON T2.Airport_ID  =  T3.Airport_ID WHERE T1.Aircraft  =  "Robinson R-22"
query.pl: SELECT avg(T3.Total_Passengers) FROM aircraft AS T1 JOIN airport_aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN airport AS T3 ON T2.Airport_ID  =  T3.Airport_ID WHERE T1.Aircraft  =  "Robinson R-22"

query.pl: SELECT avg(T3.Total_Passengers) FROM aircraft AS T1 JOIN airport_aircraft AS T2 ON T1.Aircraft_ID  =  T2.Aircraft_ID JOIN airport AS T3 ON T2.Airport_ID  =  T3.Airport_ID WHERE T1.Aircraft  =  "Robinson R-22"

question.en: How many residents does each property have? List property id and resident count.
question.pl: Ilu mieszkańców ma każda nieruchomość? Podaj identyfikator nieruchomości i liczbę mieszkańców.

query.en: SELECT T1.property_id ,  count(*) FROM properties AS T1 JOIN residents AS T2 ON T1.property_id  =  T2.property_id GROUP BY T1.property_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.property_id ,  count(*) FROM properties AS T1 JOIN residents AS T2 ON T1.property_id  =  T2.property_id GROUP BY T1.property_id

question.en: What is the distinct service types that are provided by the organization which has detail 'Denesik and Sons Party'?
question.pl: Jakie są różne rodzaje usług świadczonych przez organizację, która ma szczegóły "Denesik and Sons Party"?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.service_type_code FROM services AS T1 JOIN organizations AS T2 ON T1.organization_id  =  T2.organization_id WHERE T2.organization_details  =  'Denesik and Sons Party'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.service_type_code FROM services AS T1 JOIN organizations AS T2 ON T1.organization_id  =  T2.organization_id WHERE T2.organization_details  =  'Impreza Denesik i Synowie'

question.en: How many services has each resident requested? List the resident id, details, and the count in descending order of the count.
question.pl: Ilu usług zażądał każdy mieszkaniec? Wymień identyfikator rezydenta, szczegóły i liczbę w kolejności malejącej.

query.en: SELECT T1.resident_id ,  T1.other_details ,  count(*) FROM Residents AS T1 JOIN Residents_Services AS T2 ON T1.resident_id  =  T2.resident_id GROUP BY T1.resident_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC
query.pl: SELECT T1.resident_id ,  T1.other_details ,  count(*) FROM Residents AS T1 JOIN Residents_Services AS T2 ON T1.resident_id  =  T2.resident_id GROUP BY T1.resident_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC

question.en: What is the maximum number that a certain service is provided? List the service id, details and number.
question.pl: Jaka jest maksymalna liczba osób, dla których świadczona jest dana usługa? Wymień identyfikator usługi, szczegóły i numer.

query.en: SELECT T1.service_id ,  T1.service_details ,  count(*) FROM Services AS T1 JOIN Residents_Services AS T2 ON T1.service_id  =  T2.service_id GROUP BY T1.service_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.service_id ,  T1.service_details ,  count(*) FROM Services AS T1 JOIN Residents_Services AS T2 ON T1.service_id  =  T2.service_id GROUP BY T1.service_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: List the id and type of each thing, and the details of the organization that owns it.

query.en: SELECT T1.thing_id ,  T1.type_of_Thing_Code ,  T2.organization_details FROM Things AS T1 JOIN Organizations AS T2 ON T1.organization_id  =  T2.organization_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.thing_id ,  T1.type_of_Thing_Code ,  T2.organization_details FROM Things AS T1 JOIN Organizations AS T2 ON T1.organization_id  =  T2.organization_id

question.en: What are the id and details of the customers who have at least 3 events?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator i szczegóły klientów, którzy mają co najmniej 3 wydarzenia?

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_id ,  T1.customer_details FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Customer_Events AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  3
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_id ,  T1.customer_details FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Customer_Events AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  3

query.en: SELECT T2.date_moved_in ,  T1.customer_id ,  T1.customer_details FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Customer_Events AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.date_moved_in ,  T1.customer_id ,  T1.customer_details FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Customer_Events AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id

question.en: Which events have the number of notes between one and three? List the event id and the property id.
question.pl: Które zdarzenia mają liczbę notatek od jednej do trzech? Wymień identyfikator zdarzenia i identyfikator właściwości.

query.en: SELECT T1.Customer_Event_ID  ,  T1.property_id FROM Customer_Events AS T1 JOIN Customer_Event_Notes AS T2 ON T1.Customer_Event_ID  =  T2.Customer_Event_ID GROUP BY T1.customer_event_id HAVING count(*) BETWEEN 1 AND 3
query.pl: SELECT T1.Customer_Event_ID  ,  T1.property_id FROM Customer_Events AS T1 JOIN Customer_Event_Notes AS T2 ON T1.Customer_Event_ID  =  T2.Customer_Event_ID GROUP BY T1.customer_event_id HAVING count(*) BETWEEN 1 AND 3

question.en: What are the distinct id and type of the thing that has the status 'Close' or has a status record before the date '2017-06-19 02:59:21'
question.pl: Jaki jest odrębny identyfikator i typ rzeczy, która ma status "Zamknij" lub ma rekord statusu przed datą "2017-06-19 02:59:21"?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T2.thing_id ,  T2.Type_of_Thing_Code FROM Timed_Status_of_Things AS T1 JOIN Things AS T2 ON T1.thing_id  =  T2.thing_id WHERE T1.Status_of_Thing_Code  =  'Close' OR T1.Date_and_Date  <  '2017-06-19 02:59:21'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T2.thing_id ,  T2.Type_of_Thing_Code FROM Timed_Status_of_Things AS T1 JOIN Things AS T2 ON T1.thing_id  =  T2.thing_id WHERE T1.Status_of_Thing_Code  =  'Zamknij' OR T1.Date_and_Date  <  '2017-06-19 02:59:21'

question.en: How many distinct locations have the things with service detail 'Unsatisfied' been located in?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT T2.Location_Code) FROM Things AS T1 JOIN Timed_Locations_of_Things AS T2 ON T1.thing_id  =  T2.thing_id WHERE T1.service_details  =  'Unsatisfied'
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT T2.Location_Code) FROM Things AS T1 JOIN Timed_Locations_of_Things AS T2 ON T1.thing_id  =  T2.thing_id WHERE T1.service_details  =  'Niezadowolony'

query.pl: SELECT T1.state FROM college AS T1 JOIN tryout AS T2 ON T1.cName  =  T2.cName WHERE T2.pPos  =  'napastnik'

query.pl: SELECT T1.pName FROM player AS T1 JOIN tryout AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T2.decision  =  'tak' AND T2.pPos  =  'napastnik'

question.pl: Znajdź stan uczelni, do której uczęszcza gracz Charles.

query.en: SELECT T1.state FROM college AS T1 JOIN tryout AS T2 ON T1.cName  =  T2.cName JOIN player AS T3 ON T2.pID  =  T3.pID WHERE T3.pName  =  'Charles'
query.pl: SELECT T1.state FROM college AS T1 JOIN tryout AS T2 ON T1.cName  =  T2.cName JOIN player AS T3 ON T2.pID  =  T3.pID WHERE T3.pName  =  'Charles'

question.en: Find the average and maximum hours for the students whose tryout decision is yes.
question.pl: Znajdź średnią i maksymalną liczbę godzin dla uczniów, którzy zdecydowali się na tryout.

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.HS) ,  max(T1.HS) FROM player AS T1 JOIN tryout AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T2.decision  =  'yes'

question.en: What is the maximum training hours for the students whose training hours is greater than 1000 in different positions?
question.pl: Jaka jest maksymalna liczba godzin treningowych dla uczniów, których liczba godzin treningowych na różnych stanowiskach przekracza 1000?

query.en: SELECT max(T1.HS) ,  pPos FROM player AS T1 JOIN tryout AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T1.HS  >  1000 GROUP BY T2.pPos

question.en: Which colleges do the tryout players whose name starts with letter D go to?
question.pl: Do jakich szkół wyższych trafiają zawodnicy, których nazwiska zaczynają się na literę D?

query.en: SELECT T1.cName FROM  tryout AS T1 JOIN player AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T2.pName LIKE 'D%'
query.pl: SELECT T1.cName FROM  tryout AS T1 JOIN player AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T2.pName LIKE 'D%'

question.pl: Która uczelnia ma jakiegokolwiek studenta, który jest bramkarzem i odniósł sukces w próbie.

question.en: Find the name of the tryout players who are from the college with largest size.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska testowanych graczy, którzy pochodzą z uczelni o największym rozmiarze.

query.en: SELECT T2.pName FROM  tryout AS T1 JOIN player AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T1.cName  =  (SELECT cName FROM college ORDER BY enr DESC LIMIT 1)
query.pl: SELECT T2.pName FROM  tryout AS T1 JOIN player AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T1.cName  =  (SELECT cName FROM college ORDER BY enr DESC LIMIT 1)

query.pl: SELECT T2.pName FROM  tryout AS T1 JOIN player AS T2 ON T1.pID  =  T2.pID WHERE T1.cName  =  (SELECT cName FROM college ORDER BY enr DESC LIMIT 1)

question.en: Find the names of either colleges in LA with greater than 15000 size or in state AZ with less than 13000 enrollment.

query.en: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr  <  13000 AND state = "AZ" UNION SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr  >  15000 AND state = "LA"
query.pl: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr  <  13000 AND state = "AZ" UNION SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr  >  15000 AND state = "LA"

query.pl: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr  <  13000 AND state = "AZ" UNION SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr  >  15000 AND state = "LA"

question.en: What is the description of the service type which offers both the photo product and the film product?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis typu usługi, która oferuje zarówno produkt fotograficzny, jak i filmowy?

query.en: SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'photo' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'film'
query.pl: SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'zdjęcie' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'film'

question.en: Give me the description of the service type that offers not only the photo product but also the film product.
question.pl: Podaj mi opis typu usługi, która oferuje nie tylko produkt fotograficzny, ale także filmowy.

query.en: SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'photo' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'film'
query.pl: SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'zdjęcie' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Service_Type_Description FROM Ref_Service_Types AS T1 JOIN Services AS T2 ON T1.Service_Type_Code  =  T2.Service_Type_Code WHERE T2.Product_Name  =  'film'

question.en: What instrument did the musician with last name "Heilo" use in the song "Le Pop"?

query.en: SELECT T4.instrument FROM Performance AS T1 JOIN Band AS T2 ON T1.bandmate  =  T2.id JOIN Songs AS T3 ON T3.SongId  =  T1.SongId JOIN Instruments AS T4 ON T4.songid  =  T3.songid AND T4.bandmateid  =  T2.id WHERE T2.lastname  =  "Heilo" AND T3.title  =  "Le Pop"
query.pl: SELECT T4.instrument FROM Performance AS T1 JOIN Band AS T2 ON T1.bandmate  =  T2.id JOIN Songs AS T3 ON T3.SongId  =  T1.SongId JOIN Instruments AS T4 ON T4.songid  =  T3.songid AND T4.bandmateid  =  T2.id WHERE T2.lastname  =  "Heilo" AND T3.title  =  "Le Pop"

query.en: SELECT T1.problem_id FROM problems AS T1 JOIN staff AS T2 ON T1.reported_by_staff_id = T2.staff_id WHERE date_problem_reported  <  ( SELECT min(date_problem_reported) FROM problems AS T3 JOIN staff AS T4 ON T3.reported_by_staff_id = T4.staff_id WHERE T4.staff_first_name = "Lysanne" AND T4.staff_last_name = "Turcotte" )

query.pl: SELECT T1.problem_id FROM problems AS T1 JOIN staff AS T2 ON T1.reported_by_staff_id = T2.staff_id WHERE date_problem_reported  >  ( SELECT max(date_problem_reported) FROM problems AS T3 JOIN staff AS T4 ON T3.reported_by_staff_id = T4.staff_id WHERE T4.staff_first_name = "Rylan" AND T4.staff_last_name = "Homenick" )

question.en: Find the first and last name of the staff members who reported problems from the product "rem" but not "aut"?

query.en: SELECT T3.staff_first_name ,  T3.staff_last_name FROM problems AS T1 JOIN product AS T2 JOIN staff AS T3 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id AND T1.reported_by_staff_id = T3.staff_id WHERE T2.product_name = "rem" EXCEPT SELECT T3.staff_first_name ,  T3.staff_last_name FROM problems AS T1 JOIN product AS T2 JOIN staff AS T3 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id AND T1.reported_by_staff_id = T3.staff_id WHERE T2.product_name = "aut"

question.en: Find the name of branches where have some members whose hometown is in Louisville, Kentucky and some in Hiram, Georgia.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy oddziałów, w których niektórzy członkowie pochodzą z Louisville w stanie Kentucky, a inni z Hiram w stanie Georgia.

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM membership_register_branch AS T1 JOIN branch AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id JOIN member AS T3 ON T1.member_id  =  T3.member_id WHERE T3.Hometown  =  'Louisville ,  Kentucky' INTERSECT SELECT T2.name FROM membership_register_branch AS T1 JOIN branch AS T2 ON T1.branch_id  =  T2.branch_id JOIN member AS T3 ON T1.member_id  =  T3.member_id WHERE T3.Hometown  =  'Hiram ,  Georgia'

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.Age) FROM STUDENT AS T1 JOIN VOTING_RECORD AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  SECRETARY_Vote WHERE T1.Sex  =  "F" AND T2.Election_Cycle  =  "Spring"
query.pl: SELECT avg(T1.Age) FROM STUDENT AS T1 JOIN VOTING_RECORD AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  SECRETARY_Vote WHERE T1.Sex  =  "F" AND T2.Election_Cycle  =  "Wiosna"

question.pl: Jaki jest średni wiek studentek głosujących na sekretarza w wiosennym cyklu wyborczym?

query.en: SELECT avg(T1.Age) FROM STUDENT AS T1 JOIN VOTING_RECORD AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  SECRETARY_Vote WHERE T1.Sex  =  "F" AND T2.Election_Cycle  =  "Spring"
query.pl: SELECT avg(T1.Age) FROM STUDENT AS T1 JOIN VOTING_RECORD AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  SECRETARY_Vote WHERE T1.Sex  =  "F" AND T2.Election_Cycle  =  "Wiosna"

question.en: Find the distinct first names of all the students who have vice president votes and whose city code is not PIT.
question.pl: Znajdź różne imiona wszystkich uczniów, którzy głosowali na wiceprezydenta i których kod miasta nie jest PIT.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.Fname FROM STUDENT AS T1 JOIN VOTING_RECORD AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  T2.VICE_PRESIDENT_Vote EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT Fname FROM STUDENT WHERE city_code  =  "PIT"
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.Fname FROM STUDENT AS T1 JOIN VOTING_RECORD AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  T2.VICE_PRESIDENT_Vote EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT Fname FROM STUDENT WHERE city_code  =  "PIT"

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.Fname FROM STUDENT AS T1 JOIN VOTING_RECORD AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  T2.VICE_PRESIDENT_Vote EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT Fname FROM STUDENT WHERE city_code  =  "PIT"

question.en: Find the id and color description of the products with at least 2 characteristics.
question.pl: Znajdź identyfikator i opis koloru produktów z co najmniej 2 cechami.

query.en: SELECT t1.product_id ,  t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code JOIN product_characteristics AS t3 ON t1.product_id  =  t3.product_id GROUP BY t1.product_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT t1.product_id ,  t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code JOIN product_characteristics AS t3 ON t1.product_id  =  t3.product_id GROUP BY t1.product_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

query.pl: SELECT t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code GROUP BY t2.color_description ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Return the color description that is most common across all products.
question.pl: Zwróć opis koloru, który jest najbardziej powszechny we wszystkich produktach.

query.en: SELECT t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code GROUP BY t2.color_description ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code GROUP BY t2.color_description ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the description of the color used by least products?
question.pl: Jaki jest opis koloru używanego przez najmniejsze produkty?

query.en: SELECT t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code GROUP BY t2.color_description ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code GROUP BY t2.color_description ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: Give the color description that is least common across products.
question.pl: Podaj opis koloru, który jest najmniej powszechny w różnych produktach.

query.en: SELECT t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code GROUP BY t2.color_description ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t2.color_description FROM products AS t1 JOIN ref_colors AS t2 ON t1.color_code  =  t2.color_code GROUP BY t2.color_description ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the characteristic name used by most number of the products?
question.pl: Jaka jest charakterystyczna nazwa używana przez większość produktów?

query.en: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Return the name of the characteristic that is most common across all products.
question.pl: Zwróć nazwę cechy, która jest najbardziej powszechna we wszystkich produktach.

query.en: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the names, details and data types of the characteristics which are never used by any product?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy, szczegóły i typy danych cech, które nigdy nie są używane przez żaden produkt?

query.en: SELECT characteristic_name ,  other_characteristic_details ,  characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS EXCEPT SELECT t1.characteristic_name ,  t1.other_characteristic_details ,  t1.characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.characteristic_id  =  t2.characteristic_id
query.pl: SELECT characteristic_name ,  other_characteristic_details ,  characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS EXCEPT SELECT t1.characteristic_name ,  t1.other_characteristic_details ,  t1.characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.characteristic_id  =  t2.characteristic_id

question.en: Give the names, details, and data types of characteristics that are not found in any product.
question.pl: Podaj nazwy, szczegóły i typy danych cech, które nie występują w żadnym produkcie.

query.en: SELECT characteristic_name ,  other_characteristic_details ,  characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS EXCEPT SELECT t1.characteristic_name ,  t1.other_characteristic_details ,  t1.characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.characteristic_id  =  t2.characteristic_id
query.pl: SELECT characteristic_name ,  other_characteristic_details ,  characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS EXCEPT SELECT t1.characteristic_name ,  t1.other_characteristic_details ,  t1.characteristic_data_type FROM CHARACTERISTICS AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.characteristic_id  =  t2.characteristic_id

question.en: What are characteristic names used at least twice across all products?
question.pl: Jakie są charakterystyczne nazwy używane co najmniej dwukrotnie we wszystkich produktach?

query.en: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name HAVING count(*)  >= 2
query.pl: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name HAVING count(*)  >= 2

question.en: Give the names of characteristics that are in two or more products?
question.pl: Podaj nazwy cech, które występują w dwóch lub więcej produktach?

query.en: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name HAVING count(*)  >= 2
query.pl: SELECT t3.characteristic_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN product_characteristics AS t2 ON t1.product_id  =  t2.product_id JOIN CHARACTERISTICS AS t3 ON t2.characteristic_id  =  t3.characteristic_id GROUP BY t3.characteristic_name HAVING count(*)  >= 2

question.en: How many colors are never used by any product?
question.pl: Ile kolorów nigdy nie jest używanych przez żaden produkt?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Ref_colors WHERE color_code NOT IN ( SELECT color_code FROM products )
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Ref_colors WHERE color_code NOT IN ( SELECT color_code FROM products )

question.en: Count the number of colors that are not used in any products.
question.pl: Policz liczbę kolorów, które nie są używane w żadnych produktach.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Ref_colors WHERE color_code NOT IN ( SELECT color_code FROM products )
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM Ref_colors WHERE color_code NOT IN ( SELECT color_code FROM products )

question.en: How many events are there?
question.pl: Ile jest wydarzeń?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM event
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM event

question.en: List all the event names by year from the most recent to the oldest.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie nazwy wydarzeń według lat, od najnowszych do najstarszych.

query.en: SELECT name FROM event ORDER BY YEAR DESC
query.pl: SELECT name FROM event ORDER BY YEAR DESC

question.en: What is the name of the event that happened in the most recent year?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się wydarzenie, które miało miejsce w ostatnim roku?

query.en: SELECT name FROM event ORDER BY YEAR DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT name FROM event ORDER BY YEAR DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: How many stadiums are there?
question.pl: Ile jest stadionów?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM stadium
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM stadium

question.en: Find the name of the stadium that has the maximum capacity.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę stadionu, który ma maksymalną pojemność.

query.en: SELECT name FROM stadium ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT name FROM stadium ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the names of stadiums whose capacity is smaller than the average capacity.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy stadionów, których pojemność jest mniejsza niż średnia pojemność.

query.en: SELECT name FROM stadium WHERE capacity  <  (SELECT avg(capacity) FROM stadium)
query.pl: SELECT name FROM stadium WHERE capacity  <  (SELECT avg(capacity) FROM stadium)

question.en: Find the country that has the most stadiums.
question.pl: Znajdź kraj, który ma najwięcej stadionów.

query.en: SELECT country FROM stadium GROUP BY country ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT country FROM stadium GROUP BY country ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which country has at most 3 stadiums listed?
question.pl: Który kraj ma co najmniej 3 stadiony na liście?

query.en: SELECT country FROM stadium GROUP BY country HAVING count(*)  <=  3
query.pl: SELECT country FROM stadium GROUP BY country HAVING count(*)  <=  3

question.en: Which country has both stadiums with capacity greater than 60000 and stadiums with capacity less than 50000?
question.pl: Który kraj ma zarówno stadiony o pojemności większej niż 60000, jak i stadiony o pojemności mniejszej niż 50000?

query.en: SELECT country FROM stadium WHERE capacity  >  60000 INTERSECT SELECT country FROM stadium WHERE capacity  <  50000
query.pl: SELECT country FROM stadium WHERE capacity  >  60000 INTERSECT SELECT country FROM stadium WHERE capacity  <  50000

question.en: How many cities have a stadium that was opened before the year of 2006?
question.pl: Ile miast ma stadion, który został otwarty przed 2006 rokiem?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT city) FROM stadium WHERE opening_year  <  2006
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT city) FROM stadium WHERE opening_year  <  2006

question.en: How many stadiums does each country have?
question.pl: Ile stadionów ma każdy kraj?

query.en: SELECT country ,  count(*) FROM stadium GROUP BY country
query.pl: SELECT country ,  count(*) FROM stadium GROUP BY country

question.en: Which countries do not have a stadium that was opened after 2006?
question.pl: Które kraje nie mają stadionu otwartego po 2006 roku?

query.en: SELECT country FROM stadium EXCEPT SELECT country FROM stadium WHERE opening_year  >  2006
query.pl: SELECT country FROM stadium EXCEPT SELECT country FROM stadium WHERE opening_year  >  2006

question.en: How many stadiums are not in country "Russia"?
question.pl: Ile stadionów nie znajduje się w kraju "Rosja"?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM stadium WHERE country != 'Russia'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM stadium WHERE country != 'Rosja'

question.en: Find the names of all swimmers, sorted by their 100 meter scores in ascending order.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska wszystkich pływaków posortowane według ich wyników na 100 metrów w kolejności rosnącej.

query.en: SELECT name FROM swimmer ORDER BY meter_100
query.pl: SELECT name FROM swimmer ORDER BY meter_100

question.en: How many different countries are all the swimmers from?
question.pl: Z ilu różnych krajów pochodzą wszyscy pływacy?

query.en: SELECT count(DISTINCT nationality) FROM swimmer
query.pl: SELECT count(DISTINCT nationality) FROM swimmer

question.en: List countries that have more than one swimmer.
question.pl: Wymień kraje, które mają więcej niż jednego pływaka.

query.en: SELECT nationality ,  count(*) FROM swimmer GROUP BY nationality HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT nationality ,  count(*) FROM swimmer GROUP BY nationality HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: Find all 200 meter and 300 meter results of swimmers with nationality "Australia".
question.pl: Znajdź wszystkie wyniki pływaków na 200 i 300 metrów z narodowością "Australia".

query.en: SELECT meter_200 ,  meter_300 FROM swimmer WHERE nationality  =  'Australia'
query.pl: SELECT meter_200 ,  meter_300 FROM swimmer WHERE nationality  =  'Australia'

question.en: Find the names of swimmers who has a result of "win".
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska pływaków, którzy uzyskali wynik "wygrana".

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Win'
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Wygraj'

question.en: What is the name of the stadium which held the most events?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się stadion, na którym odbyło się najwięcej wydarzeń?

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM stadium AS t1 JOIN event AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.stadium_id GROUP BY t2.stadium_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM stadium AS t1 JOIN event AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.stadium_id GROUP BY t2.stadium_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name and capacity of the stadium where the event named "World Junior" happened.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę i pojemność stadionu, na którym odbyło się wydarzenie o nazwie "World Junior".

query.en: SELECT t1.name ,  t1.capacity FROM stadium AS t1 JOIN event AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.stadium_id WHERE t2.name  =  'World Junior'
query.pl: SELECT t1.name ,  t1.capacity FROM stadium AS t1 JOIN event AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.stadium_id WHERE t2.name  =  'World Junior'

question.en: Find the names of stadiums which have never had any event.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy stadionów, na których nigdy nie odbyło się żadne wydarzenie.

query.en: SELECT name FROM stadium WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT stadium_id FROM event)
query.pl: SELECT name FROM stadium WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT stadium_id FROM event)

question.en: Find the name of the swimmer who has the most records.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwisko pływaka, który ma najwięcej rekordów.

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id GROUP BY t2.swimmer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id GROUP BY t2.swimmer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name of the swimmer who has at least 2 records.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwisko pływaka, który ma co najmniej 2 rekordy.

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id GROUP BY t2.swimmer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id GROUP BY t2.swimmer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Find the name and nationality of the swimmer who has won (i.e., has a result of "win") more than 1 time.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwisko i narodowość pływaka, który wygrał (tj. uzyskał wynik "wygrana") więcej niż 1 raz.

query.en: SELECT t1.name ,  t1.nationality FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Win' GROUP BY t2.swimmer_id HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT t1.name ,  t1.nationality FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Wygraj' GROUP BY t2.swimmer_id HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: Find the names of the swimmers who have no record.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska pływaków, którzy nie mają rekordów.

query.en: SELECT name FROM swimmer WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT swimmer_id FROM record)
query.pl: SELECT name FROM swimmer WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT swimmer_id FROM record)

question.en: Find the names of the swimmers who have both "win" and "loss" results in the record.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska pływaków, którzy mają w rekordzie zarówno wyniki "wygrane", jak i "przegrane".

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Win' INTERSECT SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Loss'
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Wygraj' INTERSECT SELECT t1.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id WHERE RESULT  =  'Strata'

question.en: Find the names of stadiums that some Australian swimmers have been to.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy stadionów, na których pływali niektórzy australijscy pływacy.

query.en: SELECT t4.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id JOIN event AS t3 ON t2.event_id  =  t3.id JOIN stadium AS t4 ON t4.id  =  t3.stadium_id WHERE t1.nationality  =  'Australia'
query.pl: SELECT t4.name FROM swimmer AS t1 JOIN record AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.swimmer_id JOIN event AS t3 ON t2.event_id  =  t3.id JOIN stadium AS t4 ON t4.id  =  t3.stadium_id WHERE t1.nationality  =  'Australia'

question.en: Find the names of stadiums that the most swimmers have been to.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy stadionów, na których było najwięcej pływaków.

query.en: SELECT t3.name FROM record AS t1 JOIN event AS t2 ON t1.event_id  =  t2.id JOIN stadium AS t3 ON t3.id  =  t2.stadium_id GROUP BY t2.stadium_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t3.name FROM record AS t1 JOIN event AS t2 ON t1.event_id  =  t2.id JOIN stadium AS t3 ON t3.id  =  t2.stadium_id GROUP BY t2.stadium_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find all details for each swimmer.
question.pl: Znajdź wszystkie szczegóły dotyczące każdego pływaka.

query.en: SELECT * FROM swimmer
query.pl: SELECT * FROM swimmer

question.en: What is the average capacity of the stadiums that were opened in year 2005?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia pojemność stadionów otwartych w 2005 roku?

query.en: SELECT avg(capacity) FROM stadium WHERE opening_year  =  2005
query.pl: SELECT avg(capacity) FROM stadium WHERE opening_year  =  2005

question.en: How many railways are there?
question.pl: Ile jest linii kolejowych?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM railway
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM railway

question.en: List the builders of railways in ascending alphabetical order.
question.pl: Wymień budowniczych linii kolejowych w rosnącej kolejności alfabetycznej.

query.en: SELECT Builder FROM railway ORDER BY Builder ASC
query.pl: SELECT Builder FROM railway ORDER BY Builder ASC

question.pl: Wymień koła i lokalizacje linii kolejowych.

query.en: SELECT Wheels ,  LOCATION FROM railway
query.pl: SELECT Wheels ,  LOCATION FROM railway

question.en: What is the maximum level of managers in countries that are not "Australia"?
question.pl: Jaki jest maksymalny poziom menedżerów w krajach, które nie są "Australią"?

query.en: SELECT max(LEVEL) FROM manager WHERE Country != "Australia	"
query.pl: SELECT max(LEVEL) FROM manager WHERE Country != "Australia"

question.en: What is the average age for all managers?
question.pl: Jaki jest średni wiek wszystkich menedżerów?

query.en: SELECT avg(Age) FROM manager
query.pl: SELECT avg(Age) FROM manager

question.en: What are the names of managers in ascending order of level?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się menedżerowie w kolejności rosnącej według poziomu?

query.en: SELECT Name FROM manager ORDER BY LEVEL ASC
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM manager ORDER BY LEVEL ASC

question.en: What are the names and arrival times of trains?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy i godziny przyjazdu pociągów?

query.en: SELECT Name ,  Arrival FROM train
query.pl: SELECT Name ,  Arrival FROM train

question.en: What is the name of the oldest manager?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się najstarszy menedżer?

query.en: SELECT Name FROM manager ORDER BY Age DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM manager ORDER BY Age DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the names of trains and locations of railways they are in.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy pociągów i lokalizacje linii kolejowych, na których się znajdują.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Location FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Location FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID

question.en: Show the builder of railways associated with the trains named "Andaman Exp".
question.pl: Wskaż budowniczego linii kolejowych związanych z pociągami o nazwie "Andaman Exp".

query.en: SELECT T1.Builder FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID WHERE T2.Name  =  "Andaman Exp"
query.pl: SELECT T1.Builder FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID WHERE T2.Name  =  "Andaman Exp"

question.en: Show id and location of railways that are associated with more than one train.
question.pl: Pokaż identyfikator i lokalizację linii kolejowych, które są powiązane z więcej niż jednym pociągiem.

query.en: SELECT T2.Railway_ID ,  T1.Location FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID GROUP BY T2.Railway_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Railway_ID ,  T1.Location FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID GROUP BY T2.Railway_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

question.en: Show the id and builder of the railway that are associated with the most trains.
question.pl: Wskaż nazwę i budowniczego linii kolejowej, z którą związanych jest najwięcej pociągów.

query.en: SELECT T2.Railway_ID ,  T1.Builder FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID GROUP BY T2.Railway_ID ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Railway_ID ,  T1.Builder FROM railway AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.Railway_ID  =  T2.Railway_ID GROUP BY T2.Railway_ID ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show different builders of railways, along with the corresponding number of railways using each builder.
question.pl: Pokaż różnych budowniczych linii kolejowych wraz z odpowiadającą im liczbą linii kolejowych wykorzystujących każdego budowniczego.

query.en: SELECT Builder ,  COUNT(*) FROM railway GROUP BY Builder
query.pl: SELECT Builder ,  COUNT(*) FROM railway GROUP BY Builder

question.en: Show the most common builder of railways.
question.pl: Wskaż najpopularniejszego budowniczego linii kolejowych.

query.en: SELECT Builder FROM railway GROUP BY Builder ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Builder FROM railway GROUP BY Builder ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show different locations of railways along with the corresponding number of railways at each location.
question.pl: Pokaż różne lokalizacje linii kolejowych wraz z odpowiadającą im liczbą linii kolejowych w każdej lokalizacji.

query.en: SELECT LOCATION ,  COUNT(*) FROM railway GROUP BY LOCATION
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION ,  COUNT(*) FROM railway GROUP BY LOCATION

question.en: Show the locations that have more than one railways.
question.pl: Pokaż lokalizacje, w których znajduje się więcej niż jedna linia kolejowa.

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM railway GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM railway GROUP BY LOCATION HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

question.en: List the object number of railways that do not have any trains.
question.pl: Wymień liczbę linii kolejowych, na których nie ma pociągów.

query.en: SELECT ObjectNumber FROM railway WHERE Railway_ID NOT IN (SELECT Railway_ID FROM train)
query.pl: SELECT ObjectNumber FROM railway WHERE Railway_ID NOT IN (SELECT Railway_ID FROM train)

question.en: Show the countries that have both managers of age above 50 and managers of age below 46.
question.pl: Wskaż kraje, w których są zarówno menedżerowie w wieku powyżej 50 lat, jak i menedżerowie w wieku poniżej 46 lat.

query.en: SELECT Country FROM manager WHERE Age  >  50 INTERSECT SELECT Country FROM manager WHERE Age  <  46
query.pl: SELECT Country FROM manager WHERE Age  >  50 INTERSECT SELECT Country FROM manager WHERE Age  <  46

question.en: Show the distinct countries of managers.
question.pl: Pokaż różne kraje menedżerów.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT Country FROM manager
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT Country FROM manager

question.en: Show the working years of managers in descending order of their level.
question.pl: Pokaż lata pracy menedżerów w porządku malejącym według ich poziomu.

query.en: SELECT Working_year_starts FROM manager ORDER BY LEVEL DESC
query.pl: SELECT Working_year_starts FROM manager ORDER BY LEVEL DESC

question.en: Show the countries that have managers of age above 50 or below 46.
question.pl: Wskaż kraje, w których menedżerowie mają powyżej 50 lub poniżej 46 lat.

query.en: SELECT Country FROM manager WHERE Age  >  50 OR Age  <  46
query.pl: SELECT Country FROM manager WHERE Age  >  50 OR Age  <  46

question.en: How many addresses are there in country USA?
question.pl: Ile adresów jest w kraju USA?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM addresses WHERE country  =  'USA'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM addresses WHERE country  =  'USA'

question.en: Show all distinct cities in the address record.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie odrębne miasta w rekordzie adresu.

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM addresses
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM addresses

question.en: Show each state and the number of addresses in each state.
question.pl: Pokaż każdy stan i liczbę adresów w każdym stanie.

query.en: SELECT state_province_county ,  count(*) FROM addresses GROUP BY state_province_county
query.pl: SELECT state_province_county ,  count(*) FROM addresses GROUP BY state_province_county

question.en: Show names and phones of customers who do not have address information.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwiska i telefony klientów, którzy nie mają danych adresowych.

query.en: SELECT customer_name ,  customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_address_history)
query.pl: SELECT customer_name ,  customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_address_history)

question.en: Show the name of the customer who has the most orders.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę klienta, który ma najwięcej zamówień.

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the product type codes which have at least two products.
question.pl: Pokaż kody typów produktów, które mają co najmniej dwa produkty.

query.en: SELECT product_type_code FROM products GROUP BY product_type_code HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT product_type_code FROM products GROUP BY product_type_code HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the names of customers who have both an order in completed status and an order in part status.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy klientów, którzy mają zarówno zamówienie w statusie ukończone, jak i zamówienie w statusie części.

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  'Completed' INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  'Part'
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  'Zakończone' INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status_code  =  'Część'

question.en: Show the name, phone, and payment method code for all customers in descending order of customer number.
question.pl: Pokaż imię i nazwisko, telefon i kod metody płatności dla wszystkich klientów w kolejności malejącej według numeru klienta.

query.en: SELECT customer_name ,  customer_phone ,  payment_method_code FROM customers ORDER BY customer_number DESC
query.pl: SELECT customer_name ,  customer_phone ,  payment_method_code FROM customers ORDER BY customer_number DESC

question.en: Show the product name and total order quantity for each product.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę produktu i całkowitą ilość zamówienia dla każdego produktu.

query.en: SELECT T1.product_name ,  sum(T2.order_quantity) FROM products AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id GROUP BY T1.product_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.product_name ,  sum(T2.order_quantity) FROM products AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id GROUP BY T1.product_id

question.en: Show the minimum, maximum, average price for all products.
question.pl: Pokaż minimalną, maksymalną i średnią cenę dla wszystkich produktów.

query.en: SELECT min(product_price) ,  max(product_price) ,  avg(product_price) FROM products
query.pl: SELECT min(product_price) ,  max(product_price) ,  avg(product_price) FROM products

question.en: How many products have a price higher than the average?
question.pl: Ile produktów ma cenę wyższą niż średnia?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM products WHERE product_price  >  (SELECT avg(product_price) FROM products)
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM products WHERE product_price  >  (SELECT avg(product_price) FROM products)

question.en: Show the customer name, customer address city, date from, and date to for each customer address history.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę klienta, miasto adresu klienta, datę od i datę do dla każdej historii adresu klienta.

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  T3.city ,  T1.date_from ,  T1.date_to FROM customer_address_history AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS T3 ON T1.address_id  =  T3.address_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  T3.city ,  T1.date_from ,  T1.date_to FROM customer_address_history AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS T3 ON T1.address_id  =  T3.address_id

question.en: Show the names of customers who use Credit Card payment method and have more than 2 orders.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy klientów, którzy korzystają z metody płatności kartą kredytową i mają więcej niż 2 zamówienia.

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T1.payment_method_code  =  'Credit Card' GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T1.payment_method_code  =  'Karta kredytowa' GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

question.en: What are the name and phone of the customer with the most ordered product quantity?
question.pl: Jakie jest imię i nazwisko oraz numer telefonu klienta z największą ilością zamówionych produktów?

query.en: SELECT  T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_phone FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T3.order_id  =  T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(T3.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT  T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_phone FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T3.order_id  =  T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(T3.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the product type and name for the products with price higher than 1000 or lower than 500.

query.en: SELECT product_type_code ,  product_name FROM products WHERE product_price  >  1000 OR product_price  <  500

question.en: Find the name of dorms which have both TV Lounge and Study Room as amenities.

query.en: SELECT T1.dorm_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid WHERE T3.amenity_name  =  'TV Lounge' INTERSECT SELECT T1.dorm_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid WHERE T3.amenity_name  =  'Study Room'

question.en: What is the name and capacity of the dorm with the fewest amount of amenities?

query.en: SELECT T1.dorm_name ,  T1.student_capacity FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid GROUP BY T2.dormid ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.dorm_name ,  T1.student_capacity FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid GROUP BY T2.dormid ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the name of dorms that do not have amenity TV Lounge.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy akademików, w których nie ma salonu telewizyjnego z udogodnieniami.

query.en: SELECT dorm_name FROM dorm EXCEPT SELECT T1.dorm_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid WHERE T3.amenity_name  =  'TV Lounge'
query.pl: SELECT dorm_name FROM dorm EXCEPT SELECT T1.dorm_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid WHERE T3.amenity_name  =  'Salon telewizyjny'

question.en: What are the names of the dorm that does not have a TV Lounge?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się akademiki, w których nie ma salonu telewizyjnego?

query.en: SELECT dorm_name FROM dorm EXCEPT SELECT T1.dorm_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid WHERE T3.amenity_name  =  'TV Lounge'
query.pl: SELECT dorm_name FROM dorm EXCEPT SELECT T1.dorm_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid WHERE T3.amenity_name  =  'Salon telewizyjny'

question.en: Find the first and last name of students who are living in the dorms that have amenity TV Lounge.
question.pl: Znajdź imiona i nazwiska studentów, którzy mieszkają w akademikach z udogodnieniami TV Lounge.

query.en: SELECT T1.fname ,  T1.lname FROM student AS T1 JOIN lives_in AS T2 ON T1.stuid  =  T2.stuid WHERE T2.dormid IN (SELECT T3.dormid FROM has_amenity AS T3 JOIN dorm_amenity AS T4 ON T3.amenid  =  T4.amenid WHERE T4.amenity_name  =  'TV Lounge')
query.pl: SELECT T1.fname ,  T1.lname FROM student AS T1 JOIN lives_in AS T2 ON T1.stuid  =  T2.stuid WHERE T2.dormid IN (SELECT T3.dormid FROM has_amenity AS T3 JOIN dorm_amenity AS T4 ON T3.amenid  =  T4.amenid WHERE T4.amenity_name  =  'Salon telewizyjny')

query.en: SELECT T1.fname ,  T1.lname FROM student AS T1 JOIN lives_in AS T2 ON T1.stuid  =  T2.stuid WHERE T2.dormid IN (SELECT T3.dormid FROM has_amenity AS T3 JOIN dorm_amenity AS T4 ON T3.amenid  =  T4.amenid WHERE T4.amenity_name  =  'TV Lounge')

query.en: SELECT T1.fname ,  T1.age FROM student AS T1 JOIN lives_in AS T2 ON T1.stuid  =  T2.stuid WHERE T2.dormid NOT IN (SELECT T3.dormid FROM has_amenity AS T3 JOIN dorm_amenity AS T4 ON T3.amenid  =  T4.amenid WHERE T4.amenity_name  =  'TV Lounge')

question.en: Find the name of amenities of the dorm where the student with last name Smith is living in.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwę udogodnień w akademiku, w którym mieszka student o nazwisku Smith.

query.en: SELECT T3.amenity_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid JOIN lives_in AS T4 ON T4.dormid  =  T1.dormid JOIN student AS T5 ON T5.stuid  =  T4.stuid WHERE T5.lname  =  'Smith'
query.pl: SELECT T3.amenity_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid JOIN lives_in AS T4 ON T4.dormid  =  T1.dormid JOIN student AS T5 ON T5.stuid  =  T4.stuid WHERE T5.lname  =  'Smith'

question.en: What are the amenities in the dorm that a student who has the last name of Smith lives in?
question.pl: Jakie są udogodnienia w akademiku, w którym mieszka student o nazwisku Smith?

query.en: SELECT T3.amenity_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid JOIN lives_in AS T4 ON T4.dormid  =  T1.dormid JOIN student AS T5 ON T5.stuid  =  T4.stuid WHERE T5.lname  =  'Smith'
query.pl: SELECT T3.amenity_name FROM dorm AS T1 JOIN has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid JOIN lives_in AS T4 ON T4.dormid  =  T1.dormid JOIN student AS T5 ON T5.stuid  =  T4.stuid WHERE T5.lname  =  'Smith'

question.pl: Podaj imiona i nazwiska 5 najlepszych pracowników, którzy rozpatrzyli największą liczbę skarg?

query.en: SELECT t1.first_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id  =  t2.staff_id GROUP BY t2.staff_id ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 5
query.pl: SELECT t1.first_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id  =  t2.staff_id GROUP BY t2.staff_id ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 5

query.en: SELECT t1.first_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id  =  t2.staff_id GROUP BY t2.staff_id ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 5
query.pl: SELECT t1.first_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id  =  t2.staff_id GROUP BY t2.staff_id ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 5

question.en: Show the authors of submissions and the acceptance results of their submissions.
question.pl: Pokaż autorów zgłoszeń i wyniki akceptacji ich zgłoszeń.

query.en: SELECT T2.Author ,  T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Author ,  T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID

question.en: For each submission, find its author and acceptance result.
question.pl: Dla każdego zgłoszenia znajdź jego autora i wynik akceptacji.

query.en: SELECT T2.Author ,  T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Author ,  T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID

question.en: Show the result of the submission with the highest score.
question.pl: Pokaż wynik zgłoszenia z najwyższym wynikiem.

query.en: SELECT T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID ORDER BY T2.Scores DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID ORDER BY T2.Scores DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which submission received the highest score in acceptance result. Show me the result.
question.pl: Które zgłoszenie otrzymało najwyższy wynik w wynikach akceptacji. Pokaż mi wynik.

query.en: SELECT T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID ORDER BY T2.Scores DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.Result FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID ORDER BY T2.Scores DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show each author and the number of workshops they submitted to.
question.pl: Pokaż każdego autora i liczbę warsztatów, do których się zgłosił.

query.en: SELECT T2.Author ,  COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id) FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author
query.pl: SELECT T2.Author ,  COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id) FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author

question.en: How many workshops did each author submit to? Return the author name and the number of workshops.
question.pl: Na ile warsztatów zgłosił się każdy z autorów? Zwróć nazwisko autora i liczbę warsztatów.

query.en: SELECT T2.Author ,  COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id) FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author
query.pl: SELECT T2.Author ,  COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id) FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author

question.en: Show the authors who have submissions to more than one workshop.
question.pl: Pokaż autorów, którzy zgłosili się do więcej niż jednego warsztatu.

query.en: SELECT T2.Author FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Author FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id)  >  1

question.en: Which authors have submitted to more than one workshop?
question.pl: Którzy autorzy zgłosili się do więcej niż jednego warsztatu?

query.en: SELECT T2.Author FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T2.Author FROM acceptance AS T1 JOIN submission AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.workshop_id)  >  1

question.en: Show the date and venue of each workshop in ascending alphabetical order of the venue.

question.en: Show the description of transaction type with code "PUR".

query.en: SELECT transaction_type_description FROM Ref_Transaction_Types WHERE transaction_type_code	  =  "PUR"
query.pl: SELECT transaction_type_description FROM Ref_Transaction_Types WHERE transaction_type_code	  =  "PUR"

question.en: Show the minimum amount of transactions whose type code is "PUR" and whose share count is bigger than 50.

query.pl: SELECT min(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE transaction_type_code  =  "PUR" AND share_count  >  50

question.en: Show the maximum share count of transactions where the amount is smaller than 10000
question.pl: Pokaż maksymalną liczbę udziałów w transakcjach, w których kwota jest mniejsza niż 10000.

query.en: SELECT max(share_count) FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE amount_of_transaction  <  10000
query.pl: SELECT max(share_count) FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE amount_of_transaction  <  10000

question.en: Show the dates of transactions if the share count is bigger than 100 or the amount is bigger than 1000.
question.pl: Pokaż daty transakcji, jeśli liczba akcji jest większa niż 100 lub kwota jest większa niż 1000.

query.en: SELECT date_of_transaction FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE share_count  >  100 OR amount_of_transaction  >  1000
query.pl: SELECT date_of_transaction FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE share_count  >  100 OR amount_of_transaction  >  1000

question.en: Show the transaction type descriptions and dates if the share count is smaller than 10.
question.pl: Pokaż opisy typów transakcji i daty, jeśli liczba akcji jest mniejsza niż 10.

query.en: SELECT T1.transaction_type_description ,  T2.date_of_transaction FROM Ref_Transaction_Types AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.transaction_type_code  =  T2.transaction_type_code WHERE T2.share_count  <  10
query.pl: SELECT T1.transaction_type_description ,  T2.date_of_transaction FROM Ref_Transaction_Types AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.transaction_type_code  =  T2.transaction_type_code WHERE T2.share_count  <  10

question.en: Show details of all investors if they make any transaction with share count greater than 100.
question.pl: Pokaż szczegóły wszystkich inwestorów, jeśli dokonają jakiejkolwiek transakcji z liczbą akcji większą niż 100.

query.en: SELECT T1.Investor_details FROM  INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id WHERE T2.share_count  >  100
query.pl: SELECT T1.Investor_details FROM  INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id WHERE T2.share_count  >  100

query.en: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_type_code) FROM TRANSACTIONS
query.pl: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_type_code) FROM TRANSACTIONS

question.en: Return the lot details and investor ids.

query.en: SELECT lot_details ,  investor_id FROM LOTS
query.pl: SELECT lot_details ,  investor_id FROM LOTS

question.en: Return the lot details of lots that belong to investors with details "l"?
question.pl: Zwracasz szczegóły działek należących do inwestorów ze szczegółami "l"?

query.en: SELECT T2.lot_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN LOTS AS T2 ON  T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id WHERE T1.Investor_details  =  "l"
query.pl: SELECT T2.lot_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN LOTS AS T2 ON  T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id WHERE T1.Investor_details  =  "l"

question.en: What are the purchase details of transactions with amount bigger than 10000?
question.pl: Jakie są szczegóły zakupu transakcji na kwotę większą niż 10000?

query.en: SELECT T1.purchase_details FROM PURCHASES AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.purchase_transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id WHERE T2.amount_of_transaction  >  10000
query.pl: SELECT T1.purchase_details FROM PURCHASES AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.purchase_transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id WHERE T2.amount_of_transaction  >  10000

question.en: What are the sale details and dates of transactions with amount smaller than 3000?
question.pl: Jakie są szczegóły sprzedaży i daty transakcji na kwotę mniejszą niż 3000?

query.en: SELECT T1.sales_details ,  T2.date_of_transaction FROM SALES AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.sales_transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id WHERE T2.amount_of_transaction  <  3000
query.pl: SELECT T1.sales_details ,  T2.date_of_transaction FROM SALES AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.sales_transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id WHERE T2.amount_of_transaction  <  3000

question.en: What are the lot details of lots associated with transactions with share count smaller than 50?
question.pl: Jakie są szczegóły lotów powiązanych z transakcjami z liczbą akcji mniejszą niż 50?

query.en: SELECT T1.lot_details FROM LOTS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS_LOTS AS T2 ON T1.lot_id  =  T2.transaction_id JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T3 ON T2.transaction_id  =  T3.transaction_id WHERE T3.share_count  <  50
query.pl: SELECT T1.lot_details FROM LOTS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS_LOTS AS T2 ON T1.lot_id  =  T2.transaction_id JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T3 ON T2.transaction_id  =  T3.transaction_id WHERE T3.share_count  <  50

question.en: What are the lot details of lots associated with transactions whose share count is bigger than 100 and whose type code is "PUR"?
question.pl: Jakie są szczegóły lotów powiązanych z transakcjami, których liczba akcji jest większa niż 100 i których kod typu to "PUR"?

query.en: SELECT T1.lot_details FROM LOTS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS_LOTS AS T2 ON  T1.lot_id  =  T2.transaction_id JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T3 ON T2.transaction_id  =  T3.transaction_id WHERE T3.share_count  >  100 AND T3.transaction_type_code  =  "PUR"
query.pl: SELECT T1.lot_details FROM LOTS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS_LOTS AS T2 ON  T1.lot_id  =  T2.transaction_id JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T3 ON T2.transaction_id  =  T3.transaction_id WHERE T3.share_count  >  100 AND T3.transaction_type_code  =  "PUR"

question.en: Show the average transaction amount for different transaction types.

query.en: SELECT transaction_type_code ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY transaction_type_code
query.pl: SELECT transaction_type_code ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY transaction_type_code

query.pl: SELECT transaction_type_code ,  max(share_count) ,  min(share_count) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY transaction_type_code

query.pl: SELECT investor_id ,  avg(share_count) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY investor_id

question.en: Show the average share count of transactions each each investor, ordered by average share count.
