query.en: SELECT investor_id ,  avg(share_count) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY investor_id ORDER BY avg(share_count)
query.pl: SELECT investor_id ,  avg(share_count) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY investor_id ORDER BY avg(share_count)

question.en: Show the average amount of transactions for different investors.
question.pl: Pokaż średnią kwotę transakcji dla różnych inwestorów.

query.en: SELECT investor_id ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY investor_id
query.pl: SELECT investor_id ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY investor_id

question.en: Show the average amount of transactions for different lots.
question.pl: Pokaż średnią liczbę transakcji dla różnych lotów.

query.en: SELECT T2.lot_id ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS AS T1 JOIN Transactions_Lots AS T2 ON T1.transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id GROUP BY T2.lot_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.lot_id ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS AS T1 JOIN Transactions_Lots AS T2 ON T1.transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id GROUP BY T2.lot_id

question.en: Show the average amount of transactions for different lots, ordered by average amount of transactions.
question.pl: Pokaż średnią kwotę transakcji dla różnych lotów, uporządkowaną według średniej kwoty transakcji.

query.en: SELECT T2.lot_id ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS AS T1 JOIN Transactions_Lots AS T2 ON T1.transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id GROUP BY T2.lot_id ORDER BY avg(amount_of_transaction)
query.pl: SELECT T2.lot_id ,  avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM TRANSACTIONS AS T1 JOIN Transactions_Lots AS T2 ON T1.transaction_id  =  T2.transaction_id GROUP BY T2.lot_id ORDER BY avg(amount_of_transaction)

question.en: Show the transaction type code that occurs the fewest times.

query.en: SELECT transaction_type_code FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY transaction_type_code ORDER BY COUNT(*) ASC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT transaction_type_code FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY transaction_type_code ORDER BY COUNT(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the transaction type code that occurs the most frequently.
question.pl: Pokaż kod typu transakcji, który występuje najczęściej.

query.en: SELECT transaction_type_code FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY transaction_type_code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT transaction_type_code FROM TRANSACTIONS GROUP BY transaction_type_code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the description of the transaction type that occurs most frequently.
question.pl: Pokaż opis najczęściej występującego typu transakcji.

query.en: SELECT T1.transaction_type_description FROM Ref_Transaction_Types AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.transaction_type_code  =  T2.transaction_type_code GROUP BY T1.transaction_type_code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.transaction_type_description FROM Ref_Transaction_Types AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.transaction_type_code  =  T2.transaction_type_code GROUP BY T1.transaction_type_code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the id and details of the investor that has the largest number of transactions.
question.pl: Pokaż identyfikator i szczegóły inwestora, który ma największą liczbę transakcji.

query.en: SELECT T2.investor_id ,  T1.Investor_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id GROUP BY T2.investor_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T2.investor_id ,  T1.Investor_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id GROUP BY T2.investor_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the id and details for the investors who have the top 3 number of transactions.
question.pl: Pokaż identyfikator i szczegóły inwestorów, którzy mają 3 największe liczby transakcji.

query.en: SELECT T2.investor_id ,  T1.Investor_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id GROUP BY T2.investor_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT T2.investor_id ,  T1.Investor_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id GROUP BY T2.investor_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3

question.en: Show the ids of the investors who have at least two transactions.
question.pl: Pokaż identyfikatory inwestorów, którzy mają co najmniej dwie transakcje.

query.en: SELECT T2.investor_id FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id GROUP BY T2.investor_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.investor_id FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id GROUP BY T2.investor_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

question.en: Show the ids and details of the investors who have at least two transactions with type code "SALE".

query.en: SELECT T2.investor_id ,  T1.Investor_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id WHERE T2.transaction_type_code  =  "SALE" GROUP BY T2.investor_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.investor_id ,  T1.Investor_details FROM INVESTORS AS T1 JOIN TRANSACTIONS AS T2 ON T1.investor_id  =  T2.investor_id WHERE T2.transaction_type_code  =  "SPRZEDAŻ" GROUP BY T2.investor_id HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

query.pl: SELECT T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN VISITS AS T2 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T2.Tourist_Attraction_ID JOIN VISITORS AS T3 ON T2.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID WHERE T3.Tourist_Details  =  "Vincent"

question.en: What are the names of the tourist attractions and the dates when the tourists named Vincent or Vivian visited there?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się atrakcje turystyczne i kiedy odwiedzili je turyści o imieniu Vincent lub Vivian?

query.en: SELECT T1.Name ,  T3.Visit_Date FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN VISITORS AS T2 JOIN VISITS AS T3 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T3.Tourist_Attraction_ID AND T2.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID WHERE T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Vincent" OR T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Vivian"
query.pl: SELECT T1.Name ,  T3.Visit_Date FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN VISITORS AS T2 JOIN VISITS AS T3 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T3.Tourist_Attraction_ID AND T2.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID WHERE T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Vincent" OR T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Vivian"

question.en: Show the transportation method most people choose to get to tourist attractions.
question.pl: Wskaż metodę transportu wybieraną przez większość osób w celu dotarcia do atrakcji turystycznych.

query.en: SELECT How_to_Get_There FROM Tourist_Attractions GROUP BY How_to_Get_There ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT How_to_Get_There FROM Tourist_Attractions GROUP BY How_to_Get_There ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Which transportation method is used the most often to get to tourist attractions?

query.en: SELECT How_to_Get_There FROM Tourist_Attractions GROUP BY How_to_Get_There ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT How_to_Get_There FROM Tourist_Attractions GROUP BY How_to_Get_There ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T1.Attraction_Type_Description ,  T2.Attraction_Type_Code FROM Ref_Attraction_Types AS T1 JOIN Tourist_Attractions AS T2 ON T1.Attraction_Type_Code  =  T2.Attraction_Type_Code GROUP BY T2.Attraction_Type_Code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.Attraction_Type_Description ,  T2.Attraction_Type_Code FROM Ref_Attraction_Types AS T1 JOIN Tourist_Attractions AS T2 ON T1.Attraction_Type_Code  =  T2.Attraction_Type_Code GROUP BY T2.Attraction_Type_Code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

query.en: SELECT T2.Name FROM Locations AS T1 JOIN Tourist_Attractions AS T2 ON T1.Location_ID  =  T2.Location_ID WHERE T1.Address  =  "660 Shea Crescent" OR T2.How_to_Get_There  =  "walk"
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM Locations AS T1 JOIN Tourist_Attractions AS T2 ON T1.Location_ID  =  T2.Location_ID WHERE T1.Address  =  "660 Shea Crescent" OR T2.How_to_Get_There  =  "spacer"

query.pl: SELECT T2.Name FROM Locations AS T1 JOIN Tourist_Attractions AS T2 ON T1.Location_ID  =  T2.Location_ID WHERE T1.Address  =  "660 Shea Crescent" OR T2.How_to_Get_There  =  "spacer"

question.en: What are the names of the tourist attractions that have parking or shopping as their feature details?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się atrakcje turystyczne, których cechą charakterystyczną jest parking lub zakupy?

query.en: SELECT T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN Tourist_Attraction_Features AS T2 ON T1.tourist_attraction_id  =  T2.tourist_attraction_id JOIN Features AS T3 ON T2.Feature_ID  =  T3.Feature_ID WHERE T3.feature_Details  =  'park' UNION SELECT T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN Tourist_Attraction_Features AS T2 ON T1.tourist_attraction_id  =  T2.tourist_attraction_id JOIN Features AS T3 ON T2.Feature_ID  =  T3.Feature_ID WHERE T3.feature_Details  =  'shopping'

query.en: SELECT T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN VISITORS AS T2 JOIN VISITS AS T3 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T3.Tourist_Attraction_ID AND T2.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID WHERE T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Vincent" INTERSECT SELECT T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN VISITORS AS T2 JOIN VISITS AS T3 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T3.Tourist_Attraction_ID AND T2.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID WHERE T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Marcelle"

query.pl: SELECT T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN VISITORS AS T2 JOIN VISITS AS T3 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T3.Tourist_Attraction_ID AND T2.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID WHERE T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Alison" EXCEPT SELECT T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN VISITORS AS T2 JOIN VISITS AS T3 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T3.Tourist_Attraction_ID AND T2.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID WHERE T2.Tourist_Details  =  "Rosalinda"

question.en: Find the last and first name of students who are playing Football or Lacrosse.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwisko i imię uczniów, którzy grają w piłkę nożną lub lacrosse.

query.en: SELECT T2.lname ,  T2.fname FROM SportsInfo AS T1 JOIN Student AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  T2.StuID WHERE T1.SportName  =  "Football" OR T1.SportName  =  "Lacrosse"

question.en: What is the average time span of contact channels in the database?
question.pl: Jaki jest średni czas trwania kanałów kontaktowych w bazie danych?

query.en: SELECT avg(active_to_date - active_from_date) FROM customer_contact_channels
query.pl: SELECT avg(active_to_date - active_from_date) FROM customer_contact_channels

question.en: Compute the average active time span of contact channels.
question.pl: Oblicz średni czas aktywności kanałów kontaktowych.

query.en: SELECT avg(active_to_date - active_from_date) FROM customer_contact_channels
query.pl: SELECT avg(active_to_date - active_from_date) FROM customer_contact_channels

question.en: What is the channel code and contact number of the customer contact channel that was active for the longest time?
question.pl: Jaki jest kod kanału i numer kontaktowy kanału kontaktu z klientem, który był aktywny najdłużej?

query.en: SELECT channel_code ,  contact_number FROM customer_contact_channels WHERE active_to_date - active_from_date  =  (SELECT active_to_date - active_from_date FROM customer_contact_channels ORDER BY (active_to_date - active_from_date) DESC LIMIT 1)
query.pl: SELECT channel_code ,  contact_number FROM customer_contact_channels WHERE active_to_date - active_from_date  =  (SELECT active_to_date - active_from_date FROM customer_contact_channels ORDER BY (active_to_date - active_from_date) DESC LIMIT 1)

question.en: What is the name of the customer that made the order with the largest quantity?
question.pl: Jak nazywa się klient, który złożył zamówienie o największej wartości?

query.en: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id WHERE t3.order_quantity  =  ( SELECT max(order_quantity) FROM order_items)
query.pl: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id WHERE t3.order_quantity  =  ( SELECT max(order_quantity) FROM order_items)

query.pl: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id GROUP BY t1.customer_name ORDER BY sum(t3.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Find the names of customers who never ordered product Latte.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska klientów, którzy nigdy nie zamówili produktu Latte.

question.en: Find the names of customers who ordered both products Latte and Americano.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska klientów, którzy zamówili zarówno produkt Latte, jak i Americano.

query.en: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id JOIN products AS t4 ON t3.product_id  =  t4.product_id WHERE t4.product_details  =  'Latte' INTERSECT SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id JOIN products AS t4 ON t3.product_id  =  t4.product_id WHERE t4.product_details  =  'Americano'
query.pl: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id JOIN products AS t4 ON t3.product_id  =  t4.product_id WHERE t4.product_details  =  'Latte' INTERSECT SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id JOIN products AS t4 ON t3.product_id  =  t4.product_id WHERE t4.product_details  =  'Americano'

query.pl: SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id JOIN products AS t4 ON t3.product_id  =  t4.product_id WHERE t4.product_details  =  'Latte' INTERSECT SELECT t1.customer_name FROM customers AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id  =  t2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS t3 ON t2.order_id  =  t3.order_id JOIN products AS t4 ON t3.product_id  =  t4.product_id WHERE t4.product_details  =  'Americano'

question.en: What are the issue dates of volumes associated with the artist aged 23 or younger?
question.pl: Jakie są daty wydania tomów związanych z artystą w wieku 23 lat lub młodszym?

query.en: SELECT Issue_Date FROM artist AS T1 JOIN volume AS T2 ON T1.Artist_ID  =  T2.Artist_ID WHERE T1.age  <=  23
query.pl: SELECT Issue_Date FROM artist AS T1 JOIN volume AS T2 ON T1.Artist_ID  =  T2.Artist_ID WHERE T1.age  <=  23

question.en: Return the issue dates of volumes by artists who are at most 23 years old?
question.pl: Zwróć daty wydania tomów autorstwa artystów, którzy mają co najwyżej 23 lata?

query.en: SELECT Issue_Date FROM artist AS T1 JOIN volume AS T2 ON T1.Artist_ID  =  T2.Artist_ID WHERE T1.age  <=  23
query.pl: SELECT Issue_Date FROM artist AS T1 JOIN volume AS T2 ON T1.Artist_ID  =  T2.Artist_ID WHERE T1.age  <=  23

question.en: How many roller coasters are there?

question.en: List the names of roller coasters by ascending order of length.

query.pl: SELECT LENGTH ,  Height FROM roller_coaster

question.en: List the names of countries whose language is not "German".

query.en: SELECT Name FROM country WHERE Languages != "German"
query.pl: SELECT Name FROM country WHERE Languages != "Niemiecki"

question.en: Show the statuses of roller coasters longer than 3300 or higher than 100.
question.pl: Pokaż statusy kolejek górskich dłuższych niż 3300 lub wyższych niż 100.

query.en: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster WHERE LENGTH  >  3300 OR Height  >  100
query.pl: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster WHERE LENGTH  >  3300 OR Height  >  100

question.en: What are the speeds of the longest roller coaster?
question.pl: Jakie są prędkości najdłuższej kolejki górskiej?

query.en: SELECT Speed FROM roller_coaster ORDER BY LENGTH DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Speed FROM roller_coaster ORDER BY LENGTH DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What is the average speed of roller coasters?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia prędkość kolejek górskich?

query.en: SELECT avg(Speed) FROM roller_coaster
query.pl: SELECT avg(Speed) FROM roller_coaster

question.en: Show the different statuses and the numbers of roller coasters for each status.
question.pl: Pokaż różne statusy i liczbę kolejek górskich dla każdego statusu.

query.en: SELECT Status ,  COUNT(*) FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status
query.pl: SELECT Status ,  COUNT(*) FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status

question.en: Please show the most common status of roller coasters.
question.pl: Wskaż najbardziej powszechny status kolejek górskich.

query.en: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: List the status shared by more than two roller coaster.
question.pl: Wymień status współdzielony przez więcej niż dwie kolejki górskie.

query.en: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status HAVING COUNT(*)  >  2
query.pl: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status HAVING COUNT(*)  >  2

question.en: Show the park of the roller coaster with the highest speed.
question.pl: Pokaż park kolejki górskiej o największej prędkości.

query.en: SELECT Park FROM roller_coaster ORDER BY Speed DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT Park FROM roller_coaster ORDER BY Speed DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the names of roller coasters and names of country they are in.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy kolejek górskich i nazwy krajów, w których się znajdują.

query.en: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Name FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID
query.pl: SELECT T2.Name ,  T1.Name FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID

question.en: Show the names of countries that have more than one roller coaster.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy krajów, które mają więcej niż jedną kolejkę górską.

query.en: SELECT T1.Name FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID GROUP BY T1.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.Name FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID GROUP BY T1.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

question.en: Show the name and population of the country that has the highest roller coaster.
question.pl: Podaj nazwę i populację kraju, w którym znajduje się najwyższa kolejka górska.

query.en: SELECT T1.Name ,  T1.population FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID ORDER BY T2.Height DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.Name ,  T1.population FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID ORDER BY T2.Height DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: Show the names of countries and the average speed of roller coasters from each country.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwy krajów i średnią prędkość kolejek górskich z każdego kraju.

query.en: SELECT T1.Name ,  avg(T2.Speed) FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID GROUP BY T1.Name
query.pl: SELECT T1.Name ,  avg(T2.Speed) FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID GROUP BY T1.Name

question.en: How many countries do not have an roller coaster longer than 3000?
question.pl: Ile krajów nie ma kolejki górskiej dłuższej niż 3000?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM country WHERE country_id NOT IN ( SELECT country_id FROM roller_coaster WHERE LENGTH  >  3000 )
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM country WHERE country_id NOT IN ( SELECT country_id FROM roller_coaster WHERE LENGTH  >  3000 )

question.en: What are the country names, area and population which has both roller coasters with speed higher
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy krajów, ich powierzchnia i populacja, w których znajdują się kolejki górskie o większej prędkości?

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.area ,  T1.population FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID WHERE T2.speed  >  60 INTERSECT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.area ,  T1.population FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID WHERE T2.speed  <  55
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.area ,  T1.population FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID WHERE T2.speed  >  60 INTERSECT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.area ,  T1.population FROM country AS T1 JOIN roller_coaster AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID  =  T2.Country_ID WHERE T2.speed  <  55

question.en: Find the cities which were once a host city after 2010?

query.en: SELECT T3.venue FROM city AS T1 JOIN hosting_city AS T2 ON T1.city_id = T2.host_city JOIN MATCH AS T3 ON T2.match_id = T3.match_id WHERE T1.city = "Nanjing ( Jiangsu )" AND T3.competition = "1994 FIFA World Cup qualification"
query.pl: SELECT T3.venue FROM city AS T1 JOIN hosting_city AS T2 ON T1.city_id = T2.host_city JOIN MATCH AS T3 ON T2.match_id = T3.match_id WHERE T1.city = "Nanjing ( Jiangsu )" AND T3.competition = "kwalifikacje do Mistrzostw Świata FIFA 1994"

question.en: Find the last name of the latest contact individual of the organization "Labour Party".
question.pl: Znajdź nazwisko ostatniej osoby kontaktowej organizacji "Partia Pracy".

query.en: SELECT t3.individual_last_name FROM organizations AS t1 JOIN organization_contact_individuals AS t2 ON t1.organization_id  =  t2.organization_id JOIN individuals AS t3 ON t2.individual_id  =  t3.individual_id WHERE t1.organization_name  =  "Labour Party" ORDER BY t2.date_contact_to DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t3.individual_last_name FROM organizations AS t1 JOIN organization_contact_individuals AS t2 ON t1.organization_id  =  t2.organization_id JOIN individuals AS t3 ON t2.individual_id  =  t3.individual_id WHERE t1.organization_name  =  "Partia Pracy" ORDER BY t2.date_contact_to DESC LIMIT 1

query.pl: SELECT party FROM driver WHERE home_city  =  'Hartford' AND age  >  40

query.pl: SELECT home_city FROM driver WHERE age  >  40 GROUP BY home_city HAVING count(*)  >=  2

query.pl: SELECT home_city FROM driver EXCEPT SELECT home_city FROM driver WHERE age  >  40

query.pl: SELECT name FROM driver WHERE driver_id NOT IN (SELECT driver_id FROM school_bus)

query.pl: SELECT TYPE FROM school GROUP BY TYPE HAVING count(*)  =  2

query.en: SELECT T2.school ,  T3.name FROM school_bus AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id JOIN driver AS T3 ON T1.driver_id  =  T3.driver_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.school ,  T3.name FROM school_bus AS T1 JOIN school AS T2 ON T1.school_id  =  T2.school_id JOIN driver AS T3 ON T1.driver_id  =  T3.driver_id

query.en: SELECT max(years_working) ,  min(years_working) ,  avg(years_working) FROM school_bus
query.pl: SELECT max(years_working) ,  min(years_working) ,  avg(years_working) FROM school_bus

question.en: Show the school name and type for schools without a school bus.

query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM driver WHERE home_city  =  'Hartford' OR age  <  40

query.pl: SELECT name FROM driver WHERE home_city  =  'Hartford' AND age  <  40

question.en: find the name of driver who is driving the school bus with the longest working history.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwisko kierowcy, który prowadzi autobus szkolny z najdłuższą historią pracy.

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM driver AS t1 JOIN school_bus AS t2 ON t1.driver_id  =  t2.driver_id ORDER BY years_working DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM driver AS t1 JOIN school_bus AS t2 ON t1.driver_id  =  t2.driver_id ORDER BY years_working DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Podaj numer lotu pojazdu, datę i pilota wszystkich lotów, uporządkowane według wysokości.

query.pl: SELECT vehicle_flight_number ,  date ,  pilot FROM flight ORDER BY altitude ASC

question.en: List the id, country, city and name of the airports ordered alphabetically by the name.

query.pl: SELECT avg(velocity) FROM flight WHERE pilot  =  'Thompson'

question.en: What are the names and types of the companies that have ever operated a flight?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy i rodzaje firm, które kiedykolwiek obsługiwały loty?

query.en: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.type FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id
query.pl: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.type FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id

question.en: What are the names of the airports which are not in the country 'Iceland'?

query.en: SELECT name FROM airport WHERE country != 'Iceland'

question.en: What are the distinct types of the companies that have operated any flights with velocity less than 200?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.type FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id WHERE T2.velocity  <  200
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.type FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id WHERE T2.velocity  <  200

question.en: What are the ids and names of the companies that operated more than one flight?
question.pl: Jakie są identyfikatory i nazwy firm, które obsługiwały więcej niż jeden lot?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >  1

question.en: What is the id, name and IATA code of the airport that had most number of flights?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator, nazwa i kod IATA lotniska, z którego odbyło się najwięcej lotów?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.IATA FROM airport AS T1 JOIN flight AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.airport_id GROUP BY T2.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.IATA FROM airport AS T1 JOIN flight AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.airport_id GROUP BY T2.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the different pilot names who had piloted a flight in the country 'United States' or in the airport named 'Billund Airport'?
question.pl: Jakie są różne nazwiska pilotów, którzy pilotowali lot w kraju "Stany Zjednoczone" lub na lotnisku o nazwie "Lotnisko Billund"?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T2.pilot FROM airport AS T1 JOIN flight AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.airport_id WHERE T1.country  =  'United States' OR T1.name  =  'Billund Airport'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T2.pilot FROM airport AS T1 JOIN flight AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.airport_id WHERE T1.country  =  'Stany Zjednoczone' OR T1.name  =  'Lotnisko Billund'

question.en: What is the most common company type, and how many are there?

query.en: SELECT TYPE ,  count(*) FROM operate_company GROUP BY TYPE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT TYPE ,  count(*) FROM operate_company GROUP BY TYPE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: How many airports haven't the pilot 'Thompson' driven an aircraft?
question.pl: Na ilu lotniskach pilot "Thompson" nie prowadził samolotu?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM airport WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT airport_id FROM flight WHERE pilot  =  'Thompson' );
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM airport WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT airport_id FROM flight WHERE pilot  =  'Thompson' );

question.en: List the name of the pilots who have flied for both a company that mainly provide 'Cargo' services and a company that runs 'Catering services' activities.
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska pilotów, którzy latali zarówno dla firmy świadczącej głównie usługi "Cargo", jak i dla firmy świadczącej usługi "Catering".

query.en: SELECT T2.pilot FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id WHERE T1.principal_activities  =  'Cargo' INTERSECT SELECT T2.pilot FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id WHERE T1.principal_activities  =  'Catering services'
query.pl: SELECT T2.pilot FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id WHERE T1.principal_activities  =  'Ładunek' INTERSECT SELECT T2.pilot FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id WHERE T1.principal_activities  =  'Usługi cateringowe'

query.pl: SELECT T3.id ,  count(*) FROM operate_company AS T1 JOIN flight AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.company_id JOIN airport AS T3 ON T2.airport_id  =  T3.id GROUP BY T3.id

question.en: Find the names of scientists who are not working on the project with the highest hours.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwiska naukowców, którzy nie pracują nad projektem o największej liczbie godzin.

query.en: SELECT name FROM scientists EXCEPT SELECT T3.name FROM assignedto AS T1 JOIN projects AS T2 ON T1.project  =  T2.code JOIN scientists AS T3 ON T1.scientist  =  T3.SSN WHERE T2.hours  =  (SELECT max(hours) FROM projects)
query.pl: SELECT name FROM scientists EXCEPT SELECT T3.name FROM assignedto AS T1 JOIN projects AS T2 ON T1.project  =  T2.code JOIN scientists AS T3 ON T1.scientist  =  T3.SSN WHERE T2.hours  =  (SELECT max(hours) FROM projects)

question.en: List all the scientists' names, their projects' names, and the hours worked by that scientist on each project, in alphabetical order of project name, and then scientist name.

query.en: SELECT T1.Name ,  T3.Name ,  T3.Hours FROM Scientists AS T1 JOIN AssignedTo AS T2 ON T1.SSN = T2.Scientist JOIN Projects AS T3 ON T2.Project = T3.Code ORDER BY T3.Name ,  T1.Name
query.pl: SELECT T1.Name ,  T3.Name ,  T3.Hours FROM Scientists AS T1 JOIN AssignedTo AS T2 ON T1.SSN = T2.Scientist JOIN Projects AS T3 ON T2.Project = T3.Code ORDER BY T3.Name ,  T1.Name

query.en: SELECT T1.Name ,  T3.Name ,  T3.Hours FROM Scientists AS T1 JOIN AssignedTo AS T2 ON T1.SSN = T2.Scientist JOIN Projects AS T3 ON T2.Project = T3.Code ORDER BY T3.Name ,  T1.Name

question.en: Find the top 3 wineries with the greatest number of wines made of white color grapes.
question.pl: Znajdź 3 najlepsze winiarnie z największą liczbą win wyprodukowanych z białych winogron.

query.en: SELECT T2.Winery FROM GRAPES AS T1 JOIN WINE AS T2 ON T1.GRAPE  =  T2.GRAPE WHERE T1.Color  =  "White" GROUP BY T2.Winery ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3
query.pl: SELECT T2.Winery FROM GRAPES AS T1 JOIN WINE AS T2 ON T1.GRAPE  =  T2.GRAPE WHERE T1.Color  =  "Biały" GROUP BY T2.Winery ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3

query.pl: SELECT T2.Winery FROM GRAPES AS T1 JOIN WINE AS T2 ON T1.GRAPE  =  T2.GRAPE WHERE T1.Color  =  "Biały" GROUP BY T2.Winery ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3

query.pl: SELECT avg(total_passengers) ,  max(total_passengers) FROM station WHERE LOCATION  =  'Londyn' OR LOCATION  =  'Glasgow'

question.en: Show all locations and the total number of platforms and passengers for all train stations in each location.

query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM station EXCEPT SELECT LOCATION FROM station WHERE number_of_platforms  >=  15

question.en: Show the station name and number of trains in each station.
question.pl: Pokaż nazwę stacji i liczbę pociągów na każdej stacji.

query.en: SELECT T2.name ,  count(*) FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id GROUP BY T1.station_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.name ,  count(*) FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id GROUP BY T1.station_id

query.en: SELECT T2.name ,  T3.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id
query.pl: SELECT T2.name ,  T3.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id

question.en: Show all train names and times in stations in London in descending order by train time.
question.pl: Pokaż wszystkie nazwy i czasy pociągów na stacjach w Londynie w kolejności malejącej według czasu pociągu.

query.en: SELECT T3.name ,  T3.time FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id WHERE T2.location  =  'London' ORDER BY T3.time DESC
query.pl: SELECT T3.name ,  T3.time FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id WHERE T2.location  =  'Londyn' ORDER BY T3.time DESC

question.en: What are the names of the stations which serve both "Ananthapuri Express" and "Guruvayur Express" trains?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się stacje obsługujące pociągi "Ananthapuri Express" i "Guruvayur Express"?

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id WHERE T3.Name  =  "Ananthapuri Express" INTERSECT SELECT T2.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id WHERE T3.Name  =  "Guruvayur Express"
query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id WHERE T3.Name  =  "Ananthapuri Express" INTERSECT SELECT T2.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.station_id  =  T2.station_id JOIN train AS T3 ON T3.train_id  =  T1.train_id WHERE T3.Name  =  "Guruvayur Express"

query.en: SELECT T2.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.train_id  =  T2.train_id WHERE T1.station_id NOT IN (SELECT T4.station_id FROM train_station AS T3 JOIN station AS T4 ON T3.station_id  =  T4.station_id WHERE t4.location  =  "London")
query.pl: SELECT T2.name FROM train_station AS T1 JOIN train AS T2 ON T1.train_id  =  T2.train_id WHERE T1.station_id NOT IN (SELECT T4.station_id FROM train_station AS T3 JOIN station AS T4 ON T3.station_id  =  T4.station_id WHERE t4.location  =  "Londyn")

query.en: SELECT T2.city FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Addresses AS T2 ON T1.customer_address_id = T2.address_id GROUP BY T2.city ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;
query.pl: SELECT T2.city FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Addresses AS T2 ON T1.customer_address_id = T2.address_id GROUP BY T2.city ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

question.en: How much in total does customer with first name as Carole and last name as Bernhard paid?
question.pl: Ile łącznie zapłacił klient o imieniu Carole i nazwisku Bernhard?

query.en: SELECT sum(T1.amount_payment) FROM Customer_Payments AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = "Carole" AND T2.last_name = "Bernhard"
query.pl: SELECT sum(T1.amount_payment) FROM Customer_Payments AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = "Carole" AND T2.last_name = "Bernhard"

question.en: What is the total amount of moeny paid by the customer Carole Bernhard?

query.pl: SELECT sum(T1.amount_payment) FROM Customer_Payments AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = "Carole" AND T2.last_name = "Bernhard"

question.en: List the number of customers that did not have any payment history.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM Customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN ( SELECT customer_id FROM Customer_Payments );

question.en: List first name and last name of customers that have more than 2 payments.
question.pl: Wymień imię i nazwisko klientów, którzy dokonali więcej niż 2 płatności.

query.en: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Customer_Payments AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >  2;
query.pl: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Customer_Payments AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >  2;

question.en: What are the first and last names of all customers with more than 2 payments?

query.en: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Customer_Payments AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >  2;
query.pl: SELECT T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Customer_Payments AS T1 JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >  2;

question.en: List lesson id of all lessons taught by staff with first name as Janessa, last name as Sawayn and nickname containing letter 's'.

query.en: SELECT T1.lesson_id FROM Lessons AS T1 JOIN Staff AS T2 ON T1.staff_id = T2.staff_id WHERE T2.first_name = "Janessa" AND T2.last_name = "Sawayn" AND nickname LIKE "%s%";

question.en: For each country and airline name, how many routes are there?

query.en: SELECT T1.country ,  T1.name ,  count(*) FROM airlines AS T1 JOIN routes AS T2 ON T1.alid  =  T2.alid GROUP BY T1.country ,  T1.name

question.en: Find the number of routes with destination airports in Italy.

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM routes AS T1 JOIN airports AS T2 ON T1.dst_apid  =  T2.apid JOIN airlines AS T3 ON T1.alid  =  T3.alid WHERE T2.country  =  'Italy' AND T3.name  =  'American Airlines'

question.en: Find the name of airline which runs the most number of routes.

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_id FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status = "On Road" INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_id FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status = "Shipped"
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_id FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status = "Na drodze" INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_id FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.order_status = "Wysłane"

question.en: When was the order placed whose shipment tracking number is 3452? Give me the date.
question.pl: Kiedy zostało złożone zamówienie, którego numer śledzenia przesyłki to 3452? Podaj mi datę.

query.en: SELECT T1.date_order_placed FROM orders AS T1 JOIN shipments AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id WHERE T2.shipment_tracking_number = 3452
query.pl: SELECT T1.date_order_placed FROM orders AS T1 JOIN shipments AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id WHERE T2.shipment_tracking_number = 3452

question.en: List the count and id of each product in all the orders.
question.pl: Wyświetl liczbę i identyfikator każdego produktu we wszystkich zamówieniach.

query.en: SELECT count(*) ,  T3.product_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 JOIN products AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id AND T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_id
query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  T3.product_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 JOIN products AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id AND T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_id

query.pl: SELECT count(*) ,  T3.product_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 JOIN products AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id AND T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_id

query.en: SELECT T3.product_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 JOIN products AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id AND T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_id
query.pl: SELECT T3.product_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 JOIN products AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id AND T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_id

question.en: For each product, show its name and the number of times it was ordered.
question.pl: Dla każdego produktu podaj jego nazwę i liczbę zamówień.

query.en: SELECT T3.product_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 JOIN products AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id AND T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_id
query.pl: SELECT T3.product_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 JOIN products AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id AND T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_id

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name

query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM orders ORDER BY date_order_placed

question.en: What is the id of the order which has the most items?
question.pl: Jaki jest identyfikator zamówienia z największą liczbą pozycji?

query.en: SELECT T1.order_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.order_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.order_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.order_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Które zamówienie zawiera najwięcej pozycji? Zwróć identyfikator zamówienia.

query.pl: SELECT T1.order_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.order_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Jak nazywa się klient, który ma największą liczbę zamówień?

query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: For each customer who has at least two orders, find the customer name and number of orders made.
question.pl: Dla każdego klienta, który złożył co najmniej dwa zamówienia, znajdź nazwę klienta i liczbę złożonych zamówień.

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Which customers have made at least two orders? Give me each customer name and number of orders made.
question.pl: Którzy klienci złożyli co najmniej dwa zamówienia? Podaj nazwę każdego klienta i liczbę złożonych zamówień.

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: Find the name of the customers who have at most two orders.
question.pl: Znajdź nazwy klientów, którzy mają co najwyżej dwa zamówienia.

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  <=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  <=  2

question.en: What are the names of the customers who have made two or less orders?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy klientów, którzy złożyli dwa lub mniej zamówień?

query.en: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  <=  2
query.pl: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  <=  2

question.en: List the names of the customers who have once bought product "food".
question.pl: Wymień nazwiska klientów, którzy kiedyś kupili produkt "żywność".

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_name = "jedzenie" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

question.en: What are the names of the customers who bought product "food" at least once?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się klienci, którzy przynajmniej raz kupili produkt "jedzenie"?

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_name = "jedzenie" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

question.en: List the names of customers who have once canceled the purchase of the product "food" (the item status is "Cancel").
question.pl: Wyświetl listę nazwisk klientów, którzy raz anulowali zakup produktu "jedzenie" (status produktu to "Anuluj").

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T3.order_item_status = "Cancel" AND T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T3.order_item_status = "Anuluj" AND T4.product_name = "jedzenie" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

question.en: Which customers have ever canceled the purchase of the product "food" (the item status is "Cancel")?
question.pl: Którzy klienci kiedykolwiek anulowali zakup produktu "jedzenie" (status produktu to "Anuluj")?

query.en: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T3.order_item_status = "Cancel" AND T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T3.order_item_status = "Anuluj" AND T4.product_name = "jedzenie" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

question.en: How many architects are female?
question.pl: Ilu architektów to kobiety?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM architect WHERE gender  =  'female'
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM architect WHERE gender  =  'kobieta'

question.en: List the name, nationality and id of all male architects ordered by their names lexicographically.
question.pl: Wymień imię, narodowość i identyfikator wszystkich architektów płci męskiej uporządkowanych leksykograficznie według ich imion.

query.en: SELECT name ,  nationality ,  id FROM architect WHERE gender  =  'male' ORDER BY name
query.pl: SELECT name ,  nationality ,  id FROM architect WHERE gender  =  'mężczyzna' ORDER BY name

question.en: What is the maximum length in meters for the bridges and what are the architects' names?
question.pl: Jaka jest maksymalna długość mostów w metrach i jak nazywają się architekci?

query.en: SELECT max(T1.length_meters) ,  T2.name FROM bridge AS T1 JOIN architect AS T2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id
query.pl: SELECT max(T1.length_meters) ,  T2.name FROM bridge AS T1 JOIN architect AS T2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id

question.en: What is the average length in feet of the bridges?
question.pl: Jaka jest średnia długość mostów w stopach?

query.en: SELECT avg(length_feet) FROM bridge
query.pl: SELECT avg(length_feet) FROM bridge

question.en: What are the names and year of construction for the mills of 'Grondzeiler' type?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwy i rok budowy młynów typu "Grondzeiler"?

query.en: SELECT name ,  built_year FROM mill WHERE TYPE  =  'Grondzeiler'
query.pl: SELECT name ,  built_year FROM mill WHERE TYPE  =  'Grondzeiler'

question.en: What are the distinct names and nationalities of the architects who have ever built a mill?
question.pl: Jakie są różne nazwiska i narodowości architektów, którzy kiedykolwiek zbudowali młyn?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name ,  T1.nationality FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name ,  T1.nationality FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id

question.en: What are the names of the mills which are not located in 'Donceel'?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się młyny, które nie znajdują się w "Donceel"?

query.en: SELECT name FROM mill WHERE LOCATION != 'Donceel'
query.pl: SELECT name FROM mill WHERE LOCATION != 'Donceel'

question.en: What are the distinct types of mills that are built by American or Canadian architects?
question.pl: Jakie są rodzaje młynów budowanych przez amerykańskich lub kanadyjskich architektów?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.type FROM mill AS T1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.nationality  =  'American' OR T2.nationality  =  'Canadian'
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.type FROM mill AS T1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.nationality  =  'Amerykanin' OR T2.nationality  =  'Kanadyjczyk'

question.en: What are the ids and names of the architects who built at least 3 bridges ?
question.pl: Jakie są nazwiska i imiona architektów, którzy zbudowali co najmniej 3 mosty?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM architect AS T1 JOIN bridge AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  3
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM architect AS T1 JOIN bridge AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  3

question.en: What is the id, name and nationality of the architect who built most mills?
question.pl: Jakie jest imię, nazwisko i narodowość architekta, który zbudował większość młynów?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.nationality FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.nationality FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: What are the ids, names and genders of the architects who built two bridges or one mill?
question.pl: Jakie są imiona, nazwiska i płeć architektów, którzy zbudowali dwa mosty lub jeden młyn?

query.en: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.gender FROM architect AS T1 JOIN bridge AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  =  2 UNION SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.gender FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  =  1
query.pl: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.gender FROM architect AS T1 JOIN bridge AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  =  2 UNION SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.gender FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  =  1

question.en: What is the location of the bridge named 'Kolob Arch' or 'Rainbow Bridge'?
question.pl: Jaka jest lokalizacja mostu o nazwie "Kolob Arch" lub "Rainbow Bridge"?

query.en: SELECT LOCATION FROM bridge WHERE name  =  'Kolob Arch' OR name  =  'Rainbow Bridge'
query.pl: SELECT LOCATION FROM bridge WHERE name  =  'Kolob Arch' OR name  =  'Tęczowy Most'

question.en: Which of the mill names contains the french word 'Moulin'?
question.pl: Która z nazw młynów zawiera francuskie słowo "Moulin"?

query.en: SELECT name FROM mill WHERE name LIKE '%Moulin%'
query.pl: SELECT name FROM mill WHERE name LIKE '%Moulin%'

question.en: What are the distinct name of the mills built by the architects who have also built a bridge longer than 80 meters?
question.pl: Jak nazywają się młyny zbudowane przez architektów, którzy również zbudowali most dłuższy niż 80 metrów?

query.en: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name FROM mill AS T1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id JOIN bridge AS T3 ON T3.architect_id  =  T2.id WHERE T3.length_meters  >  80
query.pl: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name FROM mill AS T1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id JOIN bridge AS T3 ON T3.architect_id  =  T2.id WHERE T3.length_meters  >  80

question.en: What is the most common mill type, and how many are there?
question.pl: Jaki jest najpopularniejszy typ młyna i ile ich jest?

query.en: SELECT TYPE ,  count(*) FROM mill GROUP BY TYPE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
query.pl: SELECT TYPE ,  count(*) FROM mill GROUP BY TYPE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.en: How many architects haven't built a mill before year 1850?
question.pl: Ilu architektów nie zbudowało młyna przed rokiem 1850?

query.en: SELECT count(*) FROM architect WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT architect_id FROM mill WHERE built_year  <  1850 );
query.pl: SELECT count(*) FROM architect WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT architect_id FROM mill WHERE built_year  <  1850 );

question.en: show the name of all bridges that was designed by american archtect, and sort the result by the bridge feet length.
question.pl: wyświetl nazwę wszystkich mostów zaprojektowanych przez amerykańskiego architekta i posortuj wyniki według długości stóp mostu.

query.en: SELECT t1.name FROM bridge AS t1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON t1.architect_id  =  t2.id WHERE t2.nationality  =  'American' ORDER BY t1.length_feet
query.pl: SELECT t1.name FROM bridge AS t1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON t1.architect_id  =  t2.id WHERE t2.nationality  =  'Amerykanin' ORDER BY t1.length_feet

question.en: Show the years, book titles, and publishers for all books, in descending order by year.

query.en: SELECT YEAR ,  book_title ,  publisher FROM book_club ORDER BY YEAR DESC

question.en: Show all publishers and the number of books for each publisher.

question.en: What is the publisher with most number of books?

query.en: SELECT publisher FROM book_club GROUP BY publisher ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question.pl: Zwróć wydawcę, który opublikował najwięcej książek.

question.en: List categories that have at least two books after year 1989.
question.pl: Wymień kategorie, które mają co najmniej dwie książki po roku 1989.

query.en: SELECT category FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  >  1989 GROUP BY category HAVING count(*)  >=  2
query.pl: SELECT category FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  >  1989 GROUP BY category HAVING count(*)  >=  2

question.en: What categories have two or more corresponding books that were made after 1989?

question.en: What is the title and director for the movie with highest worldwide gross in the year 2000 or before?

question.en: List all company names with a book published by Alyson.
question.pl: Wymień wszystkie nazwy firm z książką wydaną przez Alyson.

query.en: SELECT T1.company_name FROM culture_company AS T1 JOIN book_club AS T2 ON T1.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.publisher  =  'Alyson'
query.pl: SELECT T1.company_name FROM culture_company AS T1 JOIN book_club AS T2 ON T1.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.publisher  =  'Alyson'

question.en: Show the movie titles and book titles for all companies in China.
question.pl: Pokaż tytuły filmów i książek dla wszystkich firm w Chinach.

query.en: SELECT T1.title ,  T3.book_title FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id JOIN book_club AS T3 ON T3.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.incorporated_in  =  'China'
query.pl: SELECT T1.title ,  T3.book_title FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id JOIN book_club AS T3 ON T3.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.incorporated_in  =  'Chiny'

query.en: SELECT T1.title ,  T3.book_title FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id JOIN book_club AS T3 ON T3.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.incorporated_in  =  'China'
query.pl: SELECT T1.title ,  T3.book_title FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id JOIN book_club AS T3 ON T3.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.incorporated_in  =  'Chiny'
